title: Paleo Diet CookBook & Recipes
description:
Trying to live the Paleo Diet or Primal lifestyle but struggling with recipe boredom?  Paleo CookBook is full of wide variety of hundreds of great Paleo Diet recipes for main courses, side dishes, appetizers, desserts, soups, salads and drinks.  

Recipes are included with step-by-step instructions and nutritional information including macronutrients (calories, fat, carbohydrates, protein) and micronutrients (vitamins and minerals) so you can choose the recipe that is right for you.

Those familiar with the Paleo Diet know that the word ‚ÄúPaleo‚Äù doesn‚Äôt mean the same thing to everybody.  If you have special dietary requirements outside the broad definition of Paleo, you can specify dietary Intolerances (or Allergies) such as Dairy, Eggs, Gluten, Peanuts, Seafood and more.  Furthermore, you may elect to filter out recipes that have ingredients you don‚Äôt like or that don‚Äôt suit your dietary goals.  

SEARCH RECIPES BASED ON YOUR ALLERGIES
Filter out foods you are allergic to including dairy, eggs, gluten, peanuts, seafood, sesame, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nuts and wheat

*************************************
MORE GREAT APP FEATURES
*************************************
- Save interesting recipes for later, or schedule them for a specific meal in the future
- Save recipes you liked and keep modifications (needs more coconut oil) for next time
- Create a shopping list.  Add the ingredients of any recipe directly to your shopping list with one click. 
- Modify existing recipes to suit your tastes
- Filter out foods and ingredients you dislike

***************************************
BENEFITS OF THE PALEO DIET
***************************************
The Paleo (or Primal) Diet is associated with many health benefits due to the restriction of processed foods and refined sugar and an emphasis on whole, real foods such as meat, fish and vegetables.  Those who eat paleo typically start to see benefits such as increased energy and an improved mood in a matter of days, followed by weight loss and a leaner, more muscular physique.  The paleo diet has also been associated with better blood glucose control, better sleep, reduced inflammation, increased insulin sensitivity and improved gut health.  The paleo diet also naturally avoids wheat and gluten which are problematic or proinflammatory foods for many people.

What‚Äôs more the paleo diet is quite easy for most people to follow because it is simple and doesn‚Äôt require you to count calories or even worry about restricting the amount of food you eat.    

Basics of the Paleo (or Primal) Diet:
The following foods are allowed:  Meat, fish, eggs, vegetables, fruit, nuts, sweet potatoes
The following foods are not allowed:  Legumes, grains, dairy, refined sugar, processed foods


************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making this app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the app, do not forget to rate us on play store.

Icon made by Freepik from www.flaticon.com

If you have special dietary requirements outside the broad definition of Paleo, you can specify dietary Intolerances (or Allergies) such as Dairy, Eggs, Gluten, Peanuts, Seafood and more. Furthermore, you may elect to filter out recipes that have ingredients you don‚Äôt like or that don‚Äôt suit your dietary goals.

SEARCH RECIPES BASED ON YOUR ALLERGIES
Filter out foods you are allergic to including dairy, eggs, gluten, peanuts, seafood, sesame, shellfish, soy, sulfite, tree nuts and wheat

*************************************
MORE GREAT APP FEATURES
*************************************
- Save interesting recipes for later, or schedule them for a specific meal in the future
- Save recipes you liked and keep modifications (needs more coconut oil) for next time
- Create a shopping list. Add the ingredients of any recipe directly to your shopping list with one click.
- Modify existing recipes to suit your tastes
- Filter out foods and ingredients you dislike

***************************************
BENEFITS OF THE PALEO DIET
***************************************
The Paleo (or Primal) Diet is associated with many health benefits due to the restriction of processed foods and refined sugar and an emphasis on whole, real foods such as meat, fish and vegetables. Those who eat paleo typically start to see benefits such as increased energy and an improved mood in a matter of days, followed by weight loss and a leaner, more muscular physique. The paleo diet has also been associated with better blood glucose control, better sleep, reduced inflammation, increased insulin sensitivity and improved gut health. The paleo diet also naturally avoids wheat and gluten which are problematic or proinflammatory foods for many people.

What‚Äôs more the paleo diet is quite easy for most people to follow because it is simple and doesn‚Äôt require you to count calories or even worry about restricting the amount of food you eat.

Basics of the Paleo (or Primal) Diet:
The following foods are allowed: Meat, fish, eggs, vegetables, fruit, nuts, sweet potatoes
The following foods are not allowed: Legumes, grains, dairy, refined sugar, processed foods


************************
SAY HELLO
************************
We are constantly working hard on making this app better and more useful for you. We need your constant support to get going. Please feel free to email us for any queries/suggestions/problems or if you just want to say hello. We would love to hear from you. If you have enjoyed any feature of the app, do not forget to rate us on play store.

summary: Search for Paleo Recipes, Build a Shopping List and Meal Plan
developer: Cook Applications - Workouts, Health and Utility
recentChanges: Minor bug fixes and UI improvements. Remove several recipes that do not meet the standard of the Paleo diet.
comments: Lots of great recipes and great meal planner. The shopping list is very simple and adding multiple items in a recipe is rather tedious. It adds items to the list without a very good description.

Super Paleo, super awesome! This app is so helpful for my Paleo family. It helps me stay on track by figuring out how to urilize the foods I have in my fridge in a Paleo way. If my kids are feeling like seafood (yes, my kids love seafood!) I just simply type in "shrimp" or "halibut" or whatever seafood I have handy and look for a recipe that I can make that's Paleo and delicious. I'm excited to try the desserts out in m6 household and see what my kids think! This app is awesome. We love it! Yes!
Great recipes to try for people that are new to the paleo diet and easy to follow cooking instructions.

Had to start cooking for family ,this is an easy app with great pics (cause I'm a guy) easy step by step for beginner chefs....simple ,healthy, with minimal ingredients! Having fun with it ....Family hasn't been disappointed yet .
We have multiple allergies and preferences in our family. This app is a lifesaver!

title: Food Allergy Scanner
description:
Welcome to the Food Allergy Scanner! 

This app allows you to identify your allergens in products by scanning their barcode. You can create personalized plans to accommodate various food allergies, as well as other food-related limitations, such as Celiac Disease and Lactose Intolerance. Scan the barcode of a product, and the Food Allergy Scanner will help you determine whether it fits within your food limitations.

By scanning the barcodes of products in grocery stores, you can access relevant information about what you can and cannot eat. 

With the Food Allergy Scanner, you can:
- Identify your allergens
- Scan the barcodes of products
- Receive relevant information about what you can and cannot eat
- Easily accommodate for your food allergies and/or food-related limitations


Information is available on over 800,000 products, including almost 200,000 US products. We use ingredients published by the non-profit organization  Open Food Facts   available under the  Open Database License and  Database Contents License

Please note: This is the Beta version of the app

We hope you enjoy!

summary: Scan the barcodes of products to detect allergens in products
recentChanges: Added more allergens and improved allergen matching.
comments: I was excited to use this app to avoid egg products. It seemed quite user friendly. I read previous reviews that it doesn't have a very good database for products. I scanned various items in my home (about 15) between condiments, various crackers, cookies, bars etc. Some I knew were egg-free, some I knew were not, some I didn't know and I only had 5 identify that they did not contain my allergen and the rest were not found. This won't be helpful for me and my family, so I uninstalled it.

This app is a great concept but needs a larger database to be more useful. it's lacking several common things such as cereals, pastas etc. I scanned about about 20 things from my pantry but only got results on 5. Keep expanding the data set, this could be a wonderful tool.
Would be helpful to put a chocolate anaphylactic allergy or an option for people to edit the allergy list. Also would be nice for audio playback for those that have a hard time seeing
It has absolutly no database it was a great concept but this app is useless

Do not get this app if you are trying to acually use it. Thos app was created by a middle school atusent and doesn't work when you scan most products I scanned milk to test it and the app said I could have it. Before you scan anything the app asks for your allergies and I put Dairy and then is when I scanned the milk and it said I could have it. Over all this app is NOT a function app.

title: Ingredian: Scan Food Labels
description:
If a healthy diet is important to you, then take a moment to look at a few food ingredient labels at your local grocery store. You'll find dangerous additives such as monosodium glutamate (MSG), butylated hydroxytoluene (BHT) and even worse! The U.S. Food and Drug Administration claims these are "generally recognized as safe", however independent research suggests otherwise. But what about the safety of other common additives such as propyl gallate or sodium nitrate? 

Introducing Ingredian, the food scanner. Ingredian uses your phone's camera to scan ingredient label text for quickly detecting additives and other potentially harmful chemicals lurking in your food. All detected ingredients are sorted in order by category with web links that provide additional information about each one. 

Ingredian can also assist in detecting allergens such as eggs, dairy, fish, nuts, soy and wheat.  The Ingredian Pro paid version supports an Alpha-gal diet, i.e., red meat allergy diet. 

This app scans ingredient label text on the product container.  Similar apps scan bar codes, which are frequently out of date or missing entirely from the connected server's database.

Features:
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredient categories: Allergens, Anti-caking agents, Anti-foaming agents, Bleaching agents, Buffering agents, Colorings, Countries of origin, Emulsifiers, Enzymes, Flavorings, Miscellaneous, Nutrients, Oils, Preservatives, Solvents, Spices/Herbs, Stabilizers & Sweeteners
 ¬† ‚úî Diets supported: Dairy-free, Fish-free, Gluten-free, Nut-free, Vegan & Vegetarian
 ¬† ‚úî Performs fast real-time scans - No need to crop a picture and wait for results
 ¬† ‚úî Supports scanning of large labels such as found on frozen pizza boxes
 ¬† ‚úî Ingredients are detected by the device with no server intervention
 ¬† ‚úî Detected ingredients scroll across the screen for quick review
 ¬† ‚úî Detects country of origin when listed on the ingredients label
 ¬† ‚úî Supports customization of detectable ingredients and diets
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Zoom option for setting initial zoom from 0 - 100% 
 ¬† ‚úî Speech Synthesizer option to speak ingredients detected
 ¬† ‚úî Detects over 300 allergens from Abalone to Zucchini
 ¬† ‚úî Web links to food safety gov and nutrition info sites
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Accuracy options: Good, Better & Best 
 ¬† ‚úî Scan Mode options: Automatic & Manual
 ¬† ‚úî Camera Flash option for use in low light
 ¬† ‚úî Unlimited number of scans permitted
 ¬† ‚úî High-contrasting user interface
 ¬† ‚úî Minimal permissions required
 ¬† ‚úî Low power consumption
 ¬† ‚úî Show diet compliancies
 ¬† ‚úî Small download size
 
This app is free with no data tracking and no required user sign-in. Intended only for the U.S.A. and its territories.

Note:  Some older Samsung Galaxy devices have camera autofocus issues that may prevent them from working with this and other Android apps. Click on this link for a possible remedy:
https://removeandreplace.com/2016/06/09/10-reasons-why-a-samsung-galaxy-phone-is-taking-blurry-pictures

Email us for any questions or to request a new database ingredient at CadresSoftware@gmail.com

comments: You have to check what ingredients you want to be alerted to everytime you scan a new item. I need to know about potassium and phosphorus or phosphates. Thats it. But there arw a lot of different ones under each list. Idont have time to recheck everything each individual time I need to scan a food. Make it so i can save my check list, or multiple checklists for different family members. I really wanted to use this for shopping and cooking for my renal diet.
I realized my mistake, I should have been scanning the ingredients list, not the barcode. thanks for the fast response. this app seams to work great.
very confusing, does not save any preferences i set if i close the app. no intuitive way to set preferences permanently. no way to contact provider.
Amazing. Allergic to eggs and this app helps find hidden ingredients.
I love how I can check for dairy. They have all these diets to choose from. They need one for diabetics, shows what has sugar, high in starch, etc...

Even without nutritional information knowing the basics to my diet I can take each recipe as is or adapt and pick out ingredients while I'm shopping that better suit my needs.

Just installed this app looks like good recipes but as a diabetic i need to know the nutrition facts there doesnt seem to be nutrition facts listed on any of the recipes. Cant use the recipe if have no facts.
Looks like a good app but haven't seen where it tells you how many carbs in each recipe
The recipes are easy to prepare simple directions and ingredients and tasty
Some really tasty Keto items. I enjoyed them.

title: Recipes Home - Free Recipes and Shopping List
description:
Whether your goal is to cook like a pro or make a quick family meal, Recipes Home has everything you need to improve life in the kitchen. Easily choose from thousands of free delicious food and drink recipes, save your favorite recipes to cook again later, and use the innovative search tool that allows you to filter by the ingredients you already have in your pantry. Keep your confidence in the kitchen and discover the joy of home cooking with our easy to use recipes app. 

380K+ FOOD AND DRINK RECIPES
Choose from over 380,000 recipes to fulfill your next cooking adventure. Easily browse meals based on the meal you are cooking, including breakfast, appetizers, dessert, alcoholic drinks, and many more. Have a craving for a specific cuisine? Choose between 25 different food origin categories, such as Thai, Southern, and Mexican, to easily browse and whip up a recipe that will leave you feeling satisfied. 

SAVE YOUR FAVORITE RECIPES
Saving your favorite recipes couldn‚Äôt be easier. Your favorites are stashed for safekeeping in a digital recipe box. Once saved, create collections for easy organization and viewing when cooking and grocery shopping. A single click lets you save and share your favorite recipes quickly and easily to refer to again later.

SEARCH RECIPES FOR INGREDIENTS YOU ALREADY HAVE
Don‚Äôt have time to go to the store? Don‚Äôt waste time browsing through the wrong recipes. Our impressive search filter allows you to search for recipes that include ingredients you already have in your pantry. 

EASILY ADD RECIPE INGREDIENTS TO YOUR SHOPPING LIST
Add entire or single recipe ingredients to the in-app shopping list for quick reference while completing your grocery shopping. Go through the list and check off ingredients as you shop. On a budget? Each recipe lets you know the cost per serving so you can plan before heading to the grocery store.

NUTRITION INFO
Are you tracking what you eat or have dietary restrictions or considerations? Each recipe has a list of nutritional information and serving size. Recipes include special diets such as gluten-free, keto, vegetarian, and vegan. 

RECIPE RECOMMENDATIONS
Did you have a main course in mind but need a delicious dessert to go with it? Each recipe has recommendations for other recipes within the app that pair well with it. If you want to make something specific but don‚Äôt like the recipe you found, the app suggests similar recipes that you can browse through right from that recipe card.

CROSS DEVICE SYNCING
Pick up on your tablet where you left off on your phone with cross-device syncing. Sign in and add items to your shopping list and they will sync across all your devices automatically. Share your account with family members or roommates to create a shared list that can be quickly referenced while shopping for recipe ingredients.

Download the free app today and have fun searching for and making your next meal.

Be aware of this if you do install app.. it has messed up existing apps. UPDATE: I was able to get my default screen back but still have the app on my phone. I read the developer reply and will be trying the extra step.

Does have alot of options. A couple things that I wish they would fix and add. 1.so many of the same recipes most being exactly the same so feed often has the same 5 recipes for about 50 recipes 2. Wish they would get rid of the stupid tab that you can't get rid of on the phones notifications 3. That they had a thing where you can put what you have in stocks at home and give you recipes you can make with those ingredients

You want recipes? Get ready for an app that installs 4 additional apps for videos, news, etc. It takes over your home screen with its own version you cant disable. It disables the uninstall icon. This app should be treated as a virus. Why is it even in the Google Play marketplace. Avoid at all costs.

My experience is so horrible it is indescribable. Don't recall how this nightmare got on my phone but it has completely taken over & WILL NOT let me get it off. I tried to write you about this already but my comment vanished in midair & took me straight back to the app again. If you do not rid my phone of this horror, I will disconnect my service provider ; do without a phone rather than be victimized like this.
Its nice to have multiple recipes at your finger tips. I've tried a couple of recipes and they turned out great.

title: Uber Eats: Food Delivery
description:
Find Food Options For Your Budget. 

Hungry? Find the food you crave and order from restaurants easily with the Uber Eats app. Track your food order in real-time. Get your food delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app.

FIND YOUR FAVORITE RESTAURANTS
Browse nearby restaurants and search for food by cuisine, restaurant name, dish, meal. Choose from a variety of food to order: Pizza. Burritos. Burgers. Sushi. Chinese food. Skip the line and reservations. Order food using the Uber Eats app now.

SIMPLE ORDERING
Pick your food order from any menu and add it to your cart with a few taps. That‚Äôs it.
Order food to be delivered by delivery people as soon as possible.
Or, schedule your food order in advance for a delivery person to pick it up later. Your choice!

ORDER AHEAD, PICKUP, OR DELIVERY
Now you can also order food ahead for Pickup instead of just ordering delivery. Select Pickup, add food items to your cart, and go to the restaurant to get your food. Or, choose the new no-contact delivery option and request your order be left at your doorstep.

REAL-TIME ORDER TRACKING
Track your food order on a map as it heads your way.
See the estimated delivery time to your address.
Get notified when your order arrives.

AVAILABLE INTERNATIONALLY
Join the thousands of others in your city who use the Uber Eats app to order their favorites restaurants and schedule delivery.

Uber Eats is currently available in cities and metro areas including Abu Dhabi, Adelaide, Amsterdam, Atlanta, Auckland, Austin, Baltimore, Bogota, Brisbane, Brussels, Cape Town, Chicago, Dallas, Denver, Dubai, Hong Kong, Johannesburg, Glasgow, Liverpool, London, Los Angeles, Madrid, Melbourne, Mexico City, Miami, Milan, Moscow, Mumbai, Nashville, New Delhi, New Orleans, New York, Ottawa, Paris, Philadelphia, Rio de Janeiro, San Diego, San Francisco, Sao Paulo, Seattle, Stockholm, Sydney, Taipei, Tokyo, Toronto, Vienna, Warsaw, and Washington DC.  Uber Eats helps you find food delivery around the world. Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User‚Äôs Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!

Order delivery in Australia, Belgium, Brazil, Canada, Colombia, France, Japan, India, Mexico, New Zealand, Poland, Russia, South Africa, Spain, Taiwan, United Arab Emirates, United Kingdom, United States, and more.

THE APP CHOICE OF MILLIONS

Over 1 billion orders have been delivered by delivery people using the Uber Eats app. Join the millions who choose to order food using the Uber Eats app to get their favorite food today.
The Uber Eats app was selected as a Google Play "Editor's Choice" and was part of the "Best of 2018 Awards" for User‚Äôs Choice.

Visit ubereats.com for more details!
summary: Delicious. Convenient.
recentChanges:
We update the Uber Eats app as often as possible to make it faster and more reliable for you.

Love the app? Rate us! Your feedback keeps the Uber Eats running.

Have a question? Tap Help in the Uber Eats app or visit help.uber.com.
comments: The app keeps crashing. It closes suddenly. I thought it was because of my buggy old phone, but now I'm using another phone model and it works well but the app keeps closing. I asked my friends and they told me it also occurs with them. I can't even order. Plus the attendance is the worse. I lost one account because I lost my old phone and the number was gone as well, then I couldn't recover it, I asked for help and the support never came. iFood never did that to me.

I pay for the monthly pass... And I am pissed off because it won't connect. And yes I've uninstalled and reinstalled. I've turned my phone one and off.... I needed up using Doordash with no problems only it cost me more money because I don't have a pass there. I'd like my 10 bucks back at this point. Uber needs help and no matter who I email I never hear anything back.

After half a year, the app didn't improve. Application is full of bugs. Even cannot register in the system. A Year ago it didn't accept my email address, half a year ago it did, but didn't show the keyboard for the first name/last name fields. Half a year later (oct 2020) still the same issue. Guys, how is it possible to create such a bad app? Shame

Worst app. Doesn't even run properly. App tries to connect to server but can't. After half an hour finally connects and asks for address and looks for food and bang no response. Just the same screen with address option. Looks like it is searching for food in Mars that's why there is no food around me. And the same process repeat again and again.

I can't get the app to open when on wifi. I have to take it off wifi on my android in order for it to work. Otherwise I get the same message "try again" and no matter how many times you click it , it won't open the app. I have a brand new S20 Ultra and it hasn't worked on my previous android wither.

title: Ultimate Arctic Simulator
description:
Survive the arctic in your newest adventure as a powerful Polar Bear, adorable Seal, or a stealthy Snow Leopard! Choose from TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS! Hunt down food in the frosty tundra, raise your family, and unlock exciting playable animals as you experience life in a tranquil yet dangerous Arctic!

Download the Ultimate Arctic Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while ruling over the Arctic tundra!

TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS
Choose from your favorite species of arctic animals in a single game! Become a Polar Bear, Seal, Lynx, Penguin, Moose Snow Leopard, Bighorn Sheep, Siberian Husky, Snowy Owl, and a Walrus! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX new boss battles! A massive mythical ape lurks in the redwoods! A dangerous canine predator with razor sharp teeth awaits his prey in his den!

BUILD YOUR FAMILY
Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR BABIES
Breed babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL
Choose your animal‚Äôs name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL
Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus‚Äôs to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Hiss and Roar Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your animal when active! 

RAGDOLL PHYSICS
Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry and drag them!

DYNAMIC WEATHER AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created TWENTY FOUR unique dens for your animals to live in! Hunt in the frosty mountains, build your home in the remains of dead trees, and brave freezing waters to find a comfy iceberg!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down animals like penguins, snow leopards, seals, moose, walrus, snake, fish, owl, elephant, raccoon, hawk, boar, skunk, squirrel, arctic hare, sheep, lynx, crab, deer, marlin, polar bear, dolphin, whales and many more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Arctic Simulator to transport yourself into the snowy plains of the tundra and survive life as your favorite arctic animal!

If you liked living in the Arctic then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Cat Simulator and live as a wild feline in the city, or try the Ultimate Wolf Simulator and howl at the moon with your pack of wolves!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames
twitter.com/glutenfreegames

comments: I think it's great but I personal think you should would make a game called ultimate river simulator it would be very cool you could add playable animals like otters Beavers Muskrat Mink Bass And many more plus bosses üòÅüòÄ

All of your games always glitches out and I payed for every single one of them, the fox 2 game i cant play the game for more than 20 seconds otherwise it's so laggy and glitchy there's just no playing the game at all,wolf 2 is the same way I'm on lvl 29 and i still can't defeat the wolf spirits at all not one of them...i can barely move the controls for each game kinda sucks, your character moves all over the place, you can try and turn the slightest and then your character will spin in a circle

This game is pretty good the only thing I would change about it camera it's pretty wild and even if I press a locked camera it doesn't work as well as the other games other than that it's a pretty good game maybe you can make the graphics and it is Seal movement a bit better but that's all it's a pretty good game otherwise also in the old ultimate horse Simulator game with more of a pony than a horse just saying love the new ones and love the old one

It was a good game my favorite YouTuber plays this game but the polar bear can't turn if you're on a phone it won't let you turn I tried over and over and over again and when I run I just like go to the grant and what if I just want to turn above the water and I can't.

I like it but it's super glitchy for example the camera is very sensitive and the lynx when you release the mate it should be able to have one more cub since usually snow leopards and lynx and other animals like that are usually solitary with taking care of Cubs and the polar bear under water, when I clicked the running icon it just glitches the animal and can you please update the game so it can be easier to catch fish and please add new animal(s)? title: Gluten Free Diets Recipes
description:
Welcome to Gluten Free Recipes Application Volume 2!

This is the ultimate recipe dictionary for Gluten-Free Holiday dishes. "Gluten-Free Recipes" is a Android mobile device application that contains many Gluten-Free Food Recipes for all Holiday occasions. At a touch of a finger, you can easily find holiday recipes by searching the Recipe List.

Data includes:

    -Dish Picture
    -Dish Ingredients
    -Dish Directions

Search Features:

    -Search by Recipe name
    -Search by Recipe Holiday
    -Search by Recipe Food Group

As a user friendly option, the "Gluten-Free Recipe" application provides image files. The image option is very useful in providing a visual that links to Recipe Dish. In addition, every dish has "Ingredients and Preparation Directions" for every Dish Listing.

The goal of "Gluten-Free Recipes" is to provide tasty dishes for low fat and healthy conscience individuals. This application is the perfect recipe cookbook for all Holiday occasions.

title: Gluten Free Recipes - Delicious Recipes
description:
Gluten Free Recipes is an application that presents a combination of common and modern recipes for Gluten Free food, ranging from Chickpeas and Curry to Smoked Salmon and Avocado Terrines, all prepared with healthy ingredients following easy-to-learn instructions and methods.
The Gluten Free Recipes application is characterized by:
‚Ä¢	Presentation of recipes in four large groups: Seafood recipes, Curry recipes, Chicken recipes and assorted recipes.
‚Ä¢	The list of exact ingredients according to the amount of people to serve
‚Ä¢	Detailed instructions on how to prepare it
‚Ä¢	Estimated preparation time
‚Ä¢	Final image of the dish to be prepared
‚Ä¢	Attractive and easy to use interface
‚Ä¢	Quick search for favorite recipe
Some of the recipes that the Gluten Free Recipes application presents are
‚Ä¢	Greek-style roast fish
‚Ä¢	Home-style lamb curry
‚Ä¢	Chicken & white bean stew
‚Ä¢	Herby rice with roasted veg, chickpeas & halloumi
‚Ä¢	Gluten-free sundried tomato bread
‚Ä¢	Gluten-free lemon drizzle cake 

You will find all these recipes and many more in the Gluten Free Recipes application and they will allow you to taste, with family and friends, the delicious Gluten Free food. If you want to add more recipes, rate the application and leave your comments, download it now!

title: Forks Plant-Based Meal Planner
description:
Get healthy and delicious plant-based and vegan meals planned for every day of the week with the Forks Meal Planner app that's FREE to download now! With the Forks Meal Planner, you'll receive whole-food, plant-based and vegan-friendly recipes that you can cook in 35 minutes or less making your weekly meal planning easy for you and your family. 

Get started by telling us your goals, number of servings you need, what vegan meals you need to cook, and we'll do the rest. This plant-based meal planner app is perfect for beginners and long-time plant-based pros alike.

Each plant-based recipe has been developed and taste-tested by our team of vegan chefs and nutritionists. On top of being whole food-based and vegan, they‚Äôre also low in fat and sodium, making this weekly meal planner ideal for improving you and yourr family‚Äôs health and wellness through clean eating. After all, plant-based diets are linked to a number of health benefits, like reducing your risk of heart disease, certain cancers, diabetes, and cognitive decline.

There's no easier (or more delicious) way to get started on your whole-food, plant-based diet and lifestyle than with the Forks Meal Planner!

üå± HOW IT WORKS - HEALTHY MEAL PLANS & PLANT-BASED RECIPES SENT EVERY WEEK
‚Ä¢ Tell us your goals and how many servings you need every week
‚Ä¢ Choose from vegan breakfast, lunch, dinner, and snack recipes that are low-fat, low-sodium, and 100% whole-food, plant-based.
‚Ä¢ Get weekly notifications for new plant-based and vegan recipes and meal plans
‚Ä¢ Get auto-generated grocery shopping lists

üç¥ CUSTOM VEGAN MEAL PLANNING FOR YOU
‚Ä¢ Gluten, soy-, and nut-free meal plan options are available.
‚Ä¢ Nutritous kid-friendly recipes are available to maintain your child's health
‚Ä¢ Swap out any recipe for one of 1000+ recipes in our library.

‚úÖ  EASY AND FAST GROCERY SHOPPING AND COOKING TIMES
‚Ä¢ Grocery lists are automatically generated in the app to help you get in and out of the story quickly.
‚Ä¢ Weekend Prep Planner outlines which ingredients you can prep your meal planner recipes ahead of time.
‚Ä¢ All of our recipes can be cooked in 35 minutes or less
‚Ä¢ Takes the stress out of deciding what to eat during the week with an already made vegan meal plan.

‚òùÔ∏è UPGRADE YOUR VEGAN MEAL PLANNER
‚Ä¢ Upgrade your FREE meal planner to a monthly, quartery, or annual subscription (rates apply)

ü§ù PRIVATE SUPPORT GROUP FOR YOUR PLANT-BASED DIET LIFESTYLE
‚Ä¢ Receive support, tips and encouragement in our dedicated members-only healthy, plant-based community.

Thanks for using the Forks Over Knives Meal Planner App! To make sure you don't miss a thing, make sure you keep your updates turned on. Bug fixes and improvements in this version include:

comments: What an incredible App!! Worth every cent spent on it. Time and money saver. Hundreds of delicious recipes. Easy to adjust to my own necessities. Can live without it anymore.
Great recipes. Helps a lot if you are learning how to eat well without meat or dairy

Recipes are great amd the instructions easy to follow. The desktop version can drag and drop if you want to easily arrange what meals you want on what day, but not on the app. Even though I have selected gluten free the recipes that still come up contain gluten, so i think a bug needsto be fixed. I love the community suppory and encouragement!

Update: I understand that you can click on those three dots and move things around. But it is a pain in the rear end. Using the website is 100% better then using the app. ********* The app really doesn't work very well. I've used the Android version and the Apple version, and neither of them work as good as just using the site in your web browser. For starters you can't drag and drop your meals between the different days of the week. And that is a big fat bummer. And, in my mind a deal breaker.

I'm always hesitant to pay for apps but I've got no regrets on this one. It's easy to use, customisable and the recipes are great with plenty of variety. I'd love to see the ability to filter by ingredient so I could easily find recipes that take advantage of what I've got growing in my garden or what's in season at the stores.

title: vanilla bean | discover tasty vegan restaurants
description:
‚≠êÔ∏è Best Restaurant Guide 2016 ‚≠êÔ∏è Androidmag

Discover the best vegan-friendly restaurants in your area with vanilla bean! Download now and stay fit and healthy wherever you are! Well-known from Huffington Post, Paul McCartney‚Äôs Meat Free Monday and PETA. Find unique health- and sustainability-related information about every venue. Is it vegan? Is it local, fair-trade and organic, or raw, lactose- and gluten-free? vanilla bean offers the widest selection of US üá∫üá∏, UK üá¨üáß, and German üá©üá™ locations for anyone who eats consciously but does not want to miss out on anything.

Whether you are in L.A., New York, San Francisco, Chicago, Miami or Washington D.C.‚Äîvanilla bean knows which places will make you happy: anything from gourmet venues to snack bars, from Chinese raw food temples in secret side alleys to this amazing Italian place where handmade gluten-free Bruschetta is soaked in olive oil.

If you are traveling in Austria üá¶üáπ, Switzerlandüá®üá≠ or France üá´üá∑, vanilla bean has you covered, too. The guide includes cities like Berlin, Hamburg, Vienna, Zurich, London, and Paris.

With self-explanatory indicators for each venue, you can immediately spot what each location has to offer. The chosen photos and detailed descriptions, including reviews from the community, will help you decide which place to visit. Information such as addresses, opening times, and telephone numbers are constantly reviewed.

FEATURES

‚òÖ NEW! Have you spotted a venue with plant-based options that is not yet in the app? You can suggest a new venue in less than 20 seconds. Thanks to automatic suggestions of places around you, sometimes you even don‚Äôt have to type a word.
‚òÖ Filter according to your criteria and to price categories. For example, let vanilla bean show you only completely plant-based venues with gluten-free options using organic ingredients.
‚òÖ Through the map, you can easily find all the green location highlights in your city. You can tell at first glance which places offer completely plant-based options, where one can find vegetarian options and where meat dishes are served.
‚òÖ Your opinion, your personal experience counts: add your personal review and photos of the venue or the menu. If you like, you can share your newly discovered places with others on Facebook.
‚òÖ Search for ZIP codes, places and specific locations, or discover venues with mouthwatering treats near you. 
‚òÖ You can find a wide range of information about all the entries. Photos, in-depth descriptions, restaurant indicators, directions, and calls directly from the app. In addition, you can find links to the restaurant‚Äôs website and Facebook page.
‚òÖ All the information is regularly reviewed. Should you still find any obscurities, then please feel free to send us feedback directly via a restaurant‚Äôs app entry. We will make the adjustment as soon as possible.

vanilla bean is an app for vegans, vegetarians, and everybody who wants to reduce meat. Whatever your motivation‚Äîhealth, climate change, compassion for animals‚Äîswitching to plant-based meals is a healthier, more sustainable way of living. And with vanilla bean, it‚Äôs also easy and delish.

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT

Would you like to support the release of vanilla bean in other countries or add more places? If so, send us a message at heroes@vanilla-bean.com. A service like vanilla bean would not be possible without the great work of our voluntary helpers. 

We are constantly developing vanilla bean further. That is why we look forward to hearing from you. Nobody is perfect. However, we are working hard so that we can offer you the best possible service. You can get in touch with us directly at feedback@vanilla-bean.com. We try our best to respond to every message as expeditiously as possible. Have a great experience with vanilla bean! Make some chickens, pigs, and cows happy and enjoy your vegan meal!

‚òÖ You can find a wide range of information about all the entries. Photos, in-depth descriptions, restaurant indicators, directions, and calls directly from the app. In addition, you can find links to the restaurant‚Äôs website and Facebook page.
‚òÖ All the information is regularly reviewed. Should you still find any obscurities, then please feel free to send us feedback directly via a restaurant‚Äôs app entry. We will make the adjustment as soon as possible.

vanilla bean is an app for vegans, vegetarians, and everybody who wants to reduce meat. Whatever your motivation‚Äîhealth, climate change, compassion for animals‚Äîswitching to plant-based meals is a healthier, more sustainable way of living. And with vanilla bean, it‚Äôs also easy and delish.

FEEDBACK AND SUPPORT

Would you like to support the release of vanilla bean in other countries or add more places? If so, send us a message at heroes@vanilla-bean.com. A service like vanilla bean would not be possible without the great work of our voluntary helpers.

We are constantly developing vanilla bean further. That is why we look forward to hearing from you. Nobody is perfect. However, we are working hard so that we can offer you the best possible service. You can get in touch with us directly at feedback@vanilla-bean.com. We try our best to respond to every message as expeditiously as possible. Have a great experience with vanilla bean! Make some chickens, pigs, and cows happy and enjoy your vegan meal!

comments: wonderful app for finding vegan places when I'm traveling, or even new places close to home that I didn't realize had vegan options. Some places maybe need to be updated but overall I found this app to be essential in any city that I'm not too familiar with. I recommend this app to others who travel.

First time using this, I soon knew it was not well thought out. When I tapped map, it showed the ENTIRE COUNTRY of Spain instead of a window reasonably nearby. After zooming in, it showed only the currently pinned location with no easy way to scroll through others (they should learn from the Airbnb or HappyCow apps how this should be done). The list view didn't show distances -- who wants to tap each entry to find how far it is? The UI for filtering was a bit better than HappyCow.

I'm currently in Switzerland and there is no filter for locations, e.g. if I'm looking for a restaurant in Zurich, places in Aarau show up which is useless. I expect to be shown options for where I am, not based on distance or whatever this is based on. Also it would be helpful if I could filter by cuisine. Unfortunately: good idea, poor execution. Better luck next time

Has it improved!!?? It's a good idea,but this app Sucks when it comes to recognizing U.S.A city's &states,plus restaurants when u type them in.When u go to move the map to a city&state &tap th(Explore here).It expands far away to another 3-4 state area range. Away frm th spot u choose &tat u knw for a fact tat the venue's was approved &posted in your area of search tat this app ignores & when i type the restaurant! This app still,STILL needs MORE work!. I'm Deleting it after a month try !
Easy to use, lots of options. As a gluten free vegan, it can be difficult to find restaurants that cater to both needs. I've discovered some great places through this app!

title: FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
description:
FODMAP Helper - Diet Companion
This app makes identification of high and low FODMAP foods easier to help you with your FODMAP friendly diet. This can be helpful in reducing symptoms for people with IBS, Irritable Bowel Syndrome, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance and various other food intolerances, food sensitivities, and stomach problems.

Features include:
- Comprehensive list of foods and whether or not they are low FODMAP foods, to make finding foods that won't exacerbate your IBS easier.
- Search by food name and category.
- General FODMAP Diet and Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and - 
- Lactose Intolerence and other food sensitivities info.
- Additional details on the specific breakdowns of each food and whether it is high, medium, or low in the main categories of Polyols, Oligos, Fructose, and Lactose.


Premium Features Include:
My Experience - Log your personal experience with foods to determine if a food works for you regardless of its FODMAP content. Rate whether you had a good or bad reaction to a food after eating it, then leave detailed notes so that you know for next time how said food will affect you.

Community Experience - See how the community has reacted to a food via anonymized My Experience ratings. This will let you know if the majority of users of the app had a good or bad reaction to a food.

My Experience and Community Experience data analysis - Advanced graphs and data analysis present the my experience and community experience data to you in a useful and intuitive format to show you breakdowns of good and bad reactions to the various food categories as well as what your worst foods are.

Challenge - The FODMAP Diet is an elimination diet for IBS, GI diseases, and food sensitivities. Once you've eliminated all high FODMAP foods from your diet, you can challenge foods to determine if they work for you. This lets you introduce these foods back into your regular meals one at a time and track your experience with each food after three days to determine if it will work in your FODMAP friendly diet. More details on challenges are contained within the app.

About FODMAPs and IBS
FODMAPs are short chain carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed in the small intestine, especially for people with Irritable Bowel Syndrome, IBS, Crohn's disease, Colitis, Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, other food intolerances and stomach sensitivities. They include short chain oligo-saccharide polymers of fructose and galactooligosaccharides, disaccharides (lactose), monosaccharides (fructose), and sugar alcohols (polyols).

The term is an acronym, derived from:

*Fermentable
*Oligo-
*Di-
*Mono-saccharides
*And
*Polyols 

Although these specific carbs are naturally present in the foods we eat, diet restriction has been found to improve symptom control in people with irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) and other functional gastrointestinal disorders (FGID), such as Lactose Intolerance, Gluten Intolerance, Crohn's disease, Colitis, and other stomach sensitivities. Prior to the formation of the FODMAP concept, diet was seldom used as first line therapy for management of IBS, Crohn's, Colitis, Lactose intolerance and other FGID.

Irritable bowel syndrome (IBS) is a group of symptoms‚Äîincluding abdominal pain and changes in bowel movement patterns without evidence of underlying damage. The main symptoms of IBS are abdominal pain, discomfort in association with frequent diarrhea or constipation and a change in bowel habits.


DISCLAIMER:
We do not perform any testing ourselves. All compiled data should be used as guidelines not as basis of fact. Consult your physician before beginning any new diet. This general information is not intended to diagnose any medical condition or to replace the advice of your healthcare professional.

title: HappyCow - Find vegan restaurants worldwide
description:
Top vegan travel app for 180+ countries, this vegan food locator is Android‚Äôs #1 vegan and vegetarian restaurant food tour app! Use HappyCow on trips or when you want food delivery or take away to find plant-based, vegan, or vegetarian restaurants nearby and see 700,000+ reviews, or search up organic restaurants anywhere in the world when traveling. Our healthy dining locator is easy-to-use, and can help with your healthy eating goals, and finding the best place to have food delivery from. 

SEARCH:
‚òÖ Find 130,000+ vegan, vegetarian, plant-based, and organic restaurants
‚òÖ Discover local health food stores, bio shops, farmers‚Äô markets, food trucks, juice bars, and vegan stores
‚òÖ Includes option for vegan-friendly B&Bs / Hotels worldwide
‚òÖ Helps you with your plan for a healthy diet and weight loss
‚òÖ Search by location on an interactive map, perfect when planning a trip or traveling
‚òÖ Read 1,000,000+ reviews/photos to see users‚Äô feedback, use it to find a top-rated cafe or restaurant
‚òÖ Get hours, directions, photos, and reviews of restaurants and grocery stores with vegan food
‚òÖ FILTER businesses that offer Delivery / Take Out and which are OPEN NOW only, so you don‚Äôt end up hungry or at a closed restaurant! 
‚òÖ SEARCH by Keyword (i.e. Pizza, Organic, Japanese, Bakery, Mexican, Gluten-Free, Raw). It‚Äôs especially useful in big cities with too many options!

ALSO:
‚òÖ SAVE listings to your device for offline viewing, when you don't have Internet connection. Add places to visit to your Trips and Favorites lists.
‚òÖ SYNC & BACKUP your Trips and Favorites lists with your member account.

COMMUNITY/ENGAGE:
‚òÖ Meet connect with vegans and vegetarians locally or abroad and make new friends
‚òÖ Share restaurants you plan to travel to with your friends
‚òÖ Upload photos of your delicious plant-based / organic meals 
‚òÖ Submit reviews and advice for fellow travelers
‚òÖ Language support for Chinese, Dutch, English, French, German, Hebrew, Italian, Japanese, Polish, Spanish, and Portuguese

You can use our app to plan travel for healthy eating. With HappyCow, it‚Äôs EASY to lead a healthy, plant-based lifestyle anywhere in the world! 

Find vegan, vegetarian, veg-friendly, gluten-free, healthy restaurants, and health food markets and other vegetarian businesses nearby: whether you‚Äôre going to work, school, or traveling! Our top vegan app provides lists and maps of healthy dining in 180+ countries. 

Additionally, you can discover veg businesses like a vegan bakery or vegan store, vegetarian B&B, vegan catering, food trucks and farmers market. Featuring 1 million+ photos & reviews by vegetarians and vegans you can trust.

Currently maps are not working in China without a VPN or by pre-saving in Favorites / Trips. 

*********

NEED SUPPORT OR HAVE FEEDBACK?
Please contact us before leaving feedback or rating -- we‚Äôd like to help you.
Most issues resolved by uninstalling, restarting your device, then reinstalling.

Questions & feedback- please email: android@happycow.net

---

Q&A:

Why are permissions needed?

Location:
The app uses your device location to find restaurants near you. We do not store your  location on our servers.

Photos/Media/Files:
The app allows you to upload photos from your phone/tablet. We never access your photos until you choose to view them from within the app.

Camera:
The app allows you to take photos of your favorite restaurants. The app stores these photos with your other pictures on your device so you may admire them whenever you please, or upload at a later date. We never access your camera or save photos until you perform those actions from within the app.

Other:
We communicate with the HappyCow database to bring you the best vegan and vegetarian restaurants in the world!

---

title: Vegetarian recipes - Vegan Cookbook
description:
Vegetarian recipes app offers you many easy and light recipes. These include tasty vegetarian burgers recipes, eggless cakes recipes, cake recipes, paella recipes, cookies recipes, pudding recipes, recipes for lasagna and recipes for pizza.

Tasty vegan recipes of the month
Recipes like ramen noodles soup, french onion soup, Asian vegetable broth, spinach salad, fettuccine alfredo, ginger pumpkin cupcakes, hot-&-sour okra pickles and rosemary garlic flatbread are popular in March & April.

Simple healthy vegetarian recipe instructions with pictures
Every recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many tasty recipes for free in our Vegetarian recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Vegetarian recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite easy vegetarian recipes
Add your favourite vegetarian food recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved vegetarian recipes offline. You can also create healthy vegetarian recipe collections on the basis of breakfast ideas, dinner ideas, cooking and prep time, vegetarian, cooking style etc.

Vegan recipe search
Find veg recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for easy vegetarian recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a veg recipe
Our tasty vegan recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients features lets you search and discover vegetarian food recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have vegetarian recipes for people following vegan, paella, vegetarian and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have egg-free recipes, lactose-free recipes, dairy-free recipes, peanut-free recipes and wheat-free. Nutritional information like carbs, fat, calories and cholesterol are available in the Vegetarian recipes app.

Create Veg meal plans
Meal planning is going to be healthy and quick with Vegetarian recipes. Start eating healthy vegetarian recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list. Enjoy healthy diet recipe for your weekly meal plan.

We offer lots of vegetarian recipes:
Cook easy & tasty vegetarian recipes at home using beef broth, white cabbage, brown sugar & star anise. Recipes for classic vegetarian food dishes like mimosa fruit salad, vanilla ice cream, vinaigrette, cucumber salad and bacon ranch potato salad are available in the app. Our favourite vegetarian recipes include maple dijon roasted rutabaga, Mexican corn salad, ravioli & vegetable soup, and banana-bran muffins.

Our healthy vegetarian recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for soup, salad, tacos etc. Now that you've our recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our tasty vegetarian recipes app today.

title: mySymptoms Food Diary & Symptom Tracker
description:
Record, track, and analyze your food, mood, and symptoms to gain insights into your digestive health. 

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

‚Ä¢ Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes 
‚Ä¢ Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes) 
‚Ä¢ Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
‚Ä¢ View and modify your diary entries 
‚Ä¢ Create and modify your own symptoms 
‚Ä¢ Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

‚Ä¢ Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
‚Ä¢ View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
‚Ä¢ Configurable analysis
‚Ä¢ Detailed results for each item including histogram and trend chart 


ORGANIZER 

‚Ä¢ Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify meals with your own ingredients 
‚Ä¢ Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item ‚Äì food, drink or medication 


HOW TO USE

‚Ä¢ Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

‚Ä¢ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚Ä¢ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚Ä¢ Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
‚Ä¢ Acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚Ä¢ Ulcerative colitis
‚Ä¢ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚Ä¢ Eczema
‚Ä¢ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions 

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances. 


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net

mySymptoms makes logging a food and symptom diary easy - remembering your favorite foods and providing customizable symptoms. The diary analysis reveals any patterns that emerge between your diet and symptoms. Print a PDF (Android 4.4 or above) / web report of your diary/journal.


DIARY / JOURNAL

‚Ä¢ Record food, drink, medication, stress, exercise, environmental factors, and other activities and notes
‚Ä¢ Record any symptoms you experience (including intensity, duration, and notes)
‚Ä¢ Record your energy, sleep quality, and bowel movements (using Bristol scale)
‚Ä¢ View and modify your diary entries
‚Ä¢ Create and modify your own symptoms
‚Ä¢ Export your food diary as a PDF (Android 4.4 or above), CSV, or Web report for printing or sharing


INSIGHTS

‚Ä¢ Discover any patterns between your diet and symptoms
‚Ä¢ View suspect foods, trends, and correlations between food and symptoms
‚Ä¢ Configurable analysis
‚Ä¢ Detailed results for each item including histogram and trend chart


ORGANIZER

‚Ä¢ Add or modify your own drinks, foods, medications, exercises, and other activities
‚Ä¢ Add or modify meals with your own ingredients
‚Ä¢ Add or modify detailed ingredients to any item ‚Äì food, drink or medication


HOW TO USE

‚Ä¢ Simply begin by tracking your meals along with any symptoms you experience
‚Ä¢ Over time, the more you track, the more the analysis algorithms have to work with to provide any insights


mySymptoms is used by sufferers of:

‚Ä¢ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚Ä¢ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚Ä¢ Food intolerance and sensitivities such as dairy, gluten, lactose
‚Ä¢ Acid reflux
‚Ä¢ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚Ä¢ Celiac disease
‚Ä¢ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚Ä¢ Ulcerative colitis
‚Ä¢ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚Ä¢ Eczema
‚Ä¢ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

mySymptoms is also useful for recording a FODMAP diet.


Please note that the analysis algorithms use statistical methods to identify suspect foods/items and do not understand your diet or specific health circumstances.


The information provided by this app is not medical advice. Always consult a doctor if you have any concerns about your health. Always consult a licensed health professional prior to modifying your diet.


mySymptoms also provides a list of common symptoms for food intolerance, IBS, IBD and Crohn's, but you can add extra symptoms as required.


Terms: http://mysymptoms.net/terms


NOTE: mySymptoms Food Diary currently supports portrait orientation only.


SUPPORT

If you experience any issues with mySymptoms, then please contact our support team - we will do our utmost to resolve the issue as soon as possible. Thanks!

support@skygazerlabs.com

MORE INFORMATION

Web: www.mysymptoms.net
Twitter: twitter.com/mysymptoms
Facebook: fb.me/mySymptoms
Enquiries: hello@mysymptoms.net
summary: Food & symptom diary used by sufferers of irritable bowel (IBS / IBD), migraines

recentChanges: + Fix for file export on Android 10
comments: I think this is a very well designed app and very user friendly. I love the fact that I can email her a full report of my days, from supplements to medications to exercise to reactions but some times I have questions and symptoms unrelated to any of the categories and a notes category would make it 5 stars plus! EDIT: Please stop asking me to leave a review when I've already done so! So annoying grrrrr ...
Great app for logging food, symptoms and sleep. Best I've found, easy and intuitive to use. Excellent support from the developer. Would recommend.
Very easy to use, well designed app
Works great for my celiac needs to log food entry and bowel movements but wish it would allow blood sugar results too. It's hard to find an app that does both.

Good app for entering your data (what you eat, how much and when), but the Analysis algorithm needs some work!! Not easy to comprehend, and I dont think I have problems with sweet potatoes, despite what it says.

title: Cookbook Recipes
description:
Cookbook app offers you many easy and tasty recipes. These include salads, drinks, appetizers, stews, soups, casseroles, crockpots, cakes and desserts.

Popular Cookbooks recipes of the month
Recipes like chicken & bacon roll-ups, crunchy granola pretzel sticks, fruity peanut butter pitas, cheesy quesadillas, raspberry ice cream in a bag, frozen banana cereal pops, chicken & bacon roll-ups and crunchy granola pretzel sticks are popular in October.

Simple cookbook app recipe instructions with pictures
Every Cook book recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many healthy recipes for free in our Cookbook app. Unlike other recipes app, Cookbook can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen. We offer customizable meal plans that are perfect for singles, couples, and busy professionals. Get healthier meal plans to reduce stress, weight loss & save money. Preparing healthy breakfast, lunch or dinner won‚Äôt take more than 15 minutes now. The meal planner saves yourself from stressful ‚Äúwhat should I eat‚Äù decisions.  No longer worry about what to cook for dinner, the recipe manager picks meal plans based on your preferences, ingredients, budget, and time. It helps to avoid food wastage during meal prep. Let it be comfort food, take out or soul food, we have it. 

Collect favourite Cookbooks recipes
Add your favourite Cookbook app recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Cook Book recipes offline. You can also create Cookbooks recipe collections based on lunch ideas, cooking style, non-vegetarian, cooking and prep time, vegetarian etc.

Cookbook App Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for Cook Book recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. The Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover Cookbooks recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator. Avoid food wastage during meal prep, our meal planner and shopping list help to save money and aids budget friendly cooking. The grocery list is categorized by aisles to aid meal planning. The meal planner & grocery shopping makes cooking hasslefree.  


Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have Cookbook app recipes for people following vegan, paleo, intermittent fasting, keto, vegetarian and gluten-free, DASH, plant based diets. If you're suffering from food allergies, we have recipes that are lactose-free, wheat-free, egg-free, seafood-free and peanut-free. Nutritional information like cholesterol, carbs, calories, fat are available in the Cookbook app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and tasty with Cookbook. Start eating Cook Book recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping. Prepare bytes of budget food in advance with recipe manager to save money. Let‚Äôs avoid unhealthy and expensive takeout meals. Don‚Äôt want to cook at night? Checkout dinner alternatives, 5 min recipes, Mediterranean recipes. Cook meals with fresh ingredients to avoid takeout meals. 

We offer lots of Cookbooks recipes:
Cook tasty Cookbook app recipes at home using salted peanuts, strawberry yoghurt, oyster crackers & yoghurt. Recipes for classic Cook Book dishes like peanut butter & banana sandwich, snack crackers, chocolate chip, kiddie crunch mix and peanut butter granola pinwheels paparika are available in the app. Our favourite Cookbooks recipes include no-bake peanut butter treats, peanut butter & banana sandwich, chocolate chip.

Our Cookbook app recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for salad, drink, appetizer etc. Now that you've our Cook Book recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking tasty recipes with the Cookbook app today.

Please help us by leaving a rating & feedback about our new version.

comments: Used to love the app. After the last update, all of my forks are gone. I have sent an email to the developer as requested. I have been a paid subscriber since 2017 but I may need to cancel, not going to pay monthly for something that is useless to me now.
I love this app it's very convenient. There was a time when I wanted to bake a cake and didn't have eggs so I searched for eggless cakes .so I love this app so much.
Super simple app to use. Has so many intuitive features like cooking mode, share to watch etc. Pleasant experience overall. Can't wait to try out some dishes.
Great! The best, easiest recipe to make in a short amount of time with ingredients you usually have on hand.
So happy i found this app! Im a horrible cook but with this app i hope to increase my experience in the kitchen, satisfy my stomach and the hunger of others!

title: Gluten-Free Cookbook Recipes
description:
Welcome to the Gluten Free Cookbook Recipes Application!

+120 Recipes!

This is the ultimate recipe dictionary for Gluten-Free Holiday dishes. "Gluten-Free Cookbook Recipes" is a Android mobile device application that contains many Gluten-Free Food Cookbook Recipes for all Holiday occasions. At a touch of a finger, you can easily find holiday recipes by searching the Recipe List.

Data includes:

    -Recipe Picture
    -Recipe Ingredients
    -Recipe Directions

Search Features:

    -Search by Recipe name
    -Search by Recipe Holiday
    -Search by Recipe Food Group

As a user friendly option, the "Gluten-Free Cookbook Recipe" application provides image files. The image option is very useful in providing a visual that links to Recipe Dish. In addition, every dish has "Ingredients and Preparation Directions" for every Dish Listing.

The goal of "Gluten-Free Cookbook Recipes" is to provide tasty dishes for low fat and healthy conscience individuals. This application is the perfect recipe cookbook for all Holiday occasions.

title: Whisk: Recipe Saver, Meal Planner & Grocery List
description:
Found a recipe on the internet that looks great? Yum! Add it to Whisk and start creating your personal cookbook. Pull recipes from any website or cooking site/app, substitute ingredients, adjust serving sizes or, if you want to, just change the way the recipes are written. No need to continue memorizing the recipe edits or writing them down on paper.

Get inspired! Check out our community of home cooks for new gourmet dishes, quick meals, recipes with 10 ingredients or less,  everyday healthy ideas, you name it.   Add all your go-to recipes to Whisk and create your own personal recipe book!

Want to plan your weekly meals ahead? Unlike other meal planning apps, Whisk Meal Planner is entirely free.

...And best of all: with the push of a button turn all recipes into a shareable shopping list to use to buy food in-store & online. No more ‚Äúoops! I forgot‚Äù moments when cooking! Use Whisk to make cooking more efficient and fun!

ü•áHere's What the Media is Saying About Us
‚Äú(. . .) all designed to make it easier to meal plan, make and share lists and, finally, shop‚Äù - TechCrunch, Sarah Perez

‚ÄúSmart food platform Whisk helps you meal prep like a true pro (. . .).‚Äù ‚Äì Women‚Äôs Health, Amanda Woerner

‚ÄúNot only does this technology allow for a much better experience, but should help reduce food waste‚Äù - Forbes, Tom Taulli

BENEFITS
üíæ Copy recipes from anywhere: Yes, really, any website. Try it out. No need to take screenshots or copy and paste recipes into a notebook anymore. Transfer recipes directly from Food Network, BBC Good Food, food blogs, Pinterest and from all over the internet. Use the web recipe clipper on your PC or easily save recipes from any mobile site. Never forget where you saved that recipe again!

‚úçÔ∏è Edit recipes that you‚Äôve imported: Add notes and comments about the things that you want to change and remember for next time. Maybe you want to sub in some healthy ingredients on that lasagna that you are cooking, or you want to add one more tablespoon of coconut oil to your new keto recipe‚Ä¶.go ahead, replace ingredients and enhance your recipe cookbook.

üìÖ Create your ideal meal plan for the week: an easy pork recipe for lunch on Monday, a healthy salad on Tuesday and a gourmet Italian dish for dinner on Friday.  Simplify your meal planning for the week, save time and avoid leftovers.

ü•£Remember what inspired you: Can't figure out where you saw that simple and tasty dish from Indian cuisine?  Quickly access your saved recipe collections: vegan dishes, gluten-free baking, paleo diets, low-carb meals - anything you like!

üõí Turn your recipes into shopping lists: Push a button and have your grocery list ready in case you make an unexpected stop at the store. Organize your list by aisle for speedy market visits and save time.

üè† Get the groceries delivered to you: Whisk partners with popular online grocers like Walmart, Amazon Fresh, Kroger, Ralphs, Instacart and many more. Enter your zip code, select your preferred store, checkout and get your groceries delivered at your door.

üìùCollaborate on and share your lists: Create a shared shopping list with everybody in your house to prevent buying duplicate groceries and to make sure that nothing is forgotten. Take the list to the store and save time as each family member takes a different aisle and - as items are picked - watch your grocery shopping list mark off in front of everyone‚Äôs eyes. 

‚úÖ And MORE! 
Share recipes: Just made the perfect smoked paprika chicken? Share it with your friends and family.
Make it yours: customize your dietary preferences: vegetarian, vegan, lacto vegetarian, pescatarian.
Smarter food decisions: All recipes which have been imported to Whisk include ingredient details, cooking instructions, and Whisk‚Äôs health score, with nutritional information. 

If you have any questions, please email us at support@whisk.com. We want to make sure your Whisk experience is the best it can be!

recentChanges: This update includes some bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: Wow I love this app, except for the search feature. For some reason it cuts off the text? Like I type in "turkey" and press enter and the app only searches for "turk". Super weird! Also I thought the search feature would search all recipes, not just the ones I saved! Maybe that's not a feature, which is fine. However the text getting cut off appears to be a bug.

Like it, but could be better. The overall function of the app is great, what really annoys me is the fact that you can only share the shopping list with your household, not the saved recipes or meal planner. We thought that this would help us avoid using Google keep, espc with all the automatic functions, but the lack of shareability is putting me off. If you're in a single household or your partner won't touch the kitchen, this is for you.

This is by far my favorite meal planning app. I love the chrome extension so much. It's so easy to clip recipes from anywhere. To make it 5 star I would love 3 things: 1. To be able to write in the planner for days I dont have a recipe ("out to eat" "leftovers") so I dont think I forgot. 2. A nice looking full/half screen widget that shows me my weekly meal plan at a glance. 3. A pretty full/half screen shopping list. I LOVE the walmart grocery integration but I dont buy everything from there.

Love it! It's user friendly and so helpful! I'm so glad apps like this one exist! Oh and its free! Absolutely love this! I love the fact that the ingredients have photos alongside, it really helps visual learners as 80% of people respond better to content where there isn't just plane text! I couldn't recommend this enough!

This app does exactly what I've always wanted. It's clear the designers have looked all the other apps out there and pulled what worked into this one. Things I love: - Saving recipes from anywhere on the web instead of only from big subscription-based food network type websites (so yay independent bloggers!). - It accurately breaks down the ingredients list into an easy shopping list. - The meal planner is simple, but it appears to only allow for one meal a day, which is ok for someone who is just starting out, but may not be great for someone doing meal prep one day a week, such as Sundays. - That being said, the meal planner allows you to create a weekly shopping list, and check off anything you already have. - User flow is good, though I would prefer to set it my recipes as my landing page. - Not sure what to do with the communities yet, but I'm not a super social person, so this is a non-issue for me. - Would be interested in buying this app to unlock more features in the future and to prevent ads being used on it.

title: Ultimate Farm Simulator
description:
Dash into your newest adventure as a majestic Pony, fluffy sheep, or a nimble Mouse! Choose from EIGHT PLAYABLE ANIMALS! Find food around the farm or in the wilderness, raise your family, and unlock exciting new playable animals as you experience life on the Farm!

Download the Ultimate Farm Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while ruling over the Farm!

EIGHT PLAYABLE ANIMALS
Choose from your favorite species of farm animals in a single game! Become a Pig, Cow, Goat, Sheep, Chicken, Mouse, Donkey, and Pony! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A crafty predator lurks among the wildflowers! A dangerous feathered foe will challenge your fighting skills!

BUILD YOUR FAMILY
Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR BABIES
Breed babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL
Choose your animal‚Äôs name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL
Gain experience by finding food, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus‚Äôs to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more!¬†

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your animal when active!¬†

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! And the BRAND NEW changing seasons!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created TWENTY unique dens for your animals to live in! Cozy up in the upstairs of the barn, crawl under hay bails, or enjoy ocean views by the water!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down animals like deer, rabbit, boar, wolf, crow, snake, fish, duck, raccoon, bat, sheep, alligator, cougar, squirrel, owl, frog, fox, bear, hawk, skunk and many more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Farm Simulator to transport yourself into the quiet country and live the life of your favorite barnyard animal!

If you liked living on the Farm then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Cat Simulator and live as a wild feline in the city, or try the Ultimate Wolf Simulator and howl at the moon with your pack of wolves!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames
twitter.com/glutenfreegames
