title: My Food Allergies Scanner
description:
A very handy app, to help all those who must follow a restricted diet due to food allergies or food intolerances.

People affected by one or more food allergies spend a lot of time on the shelves to find a product that they can consume safely!

By scanning the products, the application saves you a lot of time, helps you find allergens hidden behind additives or other, but also to decode ingredients in other languages!

Just scan the barcode of the product or enter it manually and it will tell you if you can or can‚Äôt consume it with the food allergies or intolerances you have.

The list of allergens:

‚úπ Gluten
‚úπ Milk
‚úπ Nuts
‚úπ Peanuts
‚úπ Eggs
‚úπ Soy
‚úπ Fish
‚úπ Crustaceans
‚úπ Celery
‚úπ Mustard
‚úπ Sesame seeds
‚úπ Lupine
‚úπ Molluscs
‚úπ  sulphur dioxide and sulphites
‚úπ Corn 
‚úπ buckwheat 

Other allergens will be coming according to the demand of the users, do not hesitate to contact us via e-mail :
Service.client.schak@gmail.com

Terms of use :
The algorithm of the app is based on the list of ingredients of each product, since the application uses an open source database (by everyone to everyone) that of OPEN FOOD FACTS, the data may sometimes be incomplete or wrong! the only official information remains the one on the physical packaging of the product.
The contents of this application are for information purposes only and do not represent medical diagnosis, treatment recommendations or medication. Although the information provided here has been compiled for the best knowledge of the author, errors occur, as this is a complex issue that depends on each individual. We assume no responsibility for the accuracy, completeness, balance and timeliness of the contents of the application, and disclaims any liability to the extent permitted by law. We assume no responsibility for acts that are or are not performed on the basis of the content of the app. Consequently, we are not liable for any direct or indirect damages, consequential damages or other obligations arising from the use of the contents of the application. 

The contents of the application do not in any way replace individual examination and advice by a medical specialist. In case of health problems, always consult a qualified specialist for an individual diagnosis and treatment.

title: Thai recipes
description:
Thai recipes app offers you many tasty and quick recipes. These include stew recipes, snacks recipes, deep fried recipes, appetizer recipes, recipes, rice recipes, recipes for steamed and recipes for casserole.

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate Thai recipes for¬† Chinese New year, American super bowl. Celebrate this season of romance with tasty valentines day recipe and much more. .

Popular traditional thai recipes of the month
Recipes like raspberry ice cream in a bag, asian vegetable broth, grilled chicken, griddled vegetables with melting aubergines, pelmeni, borscht, broccoli soup and no-bake peanut butter treats are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy thai recipe instructions with picture
Every thai food recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Thai recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Thai recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite traditional thai recipes
Add your favourite healthy Thai recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Thai food recipes offline. You can also create traditional thai recipe collections on the basis of dinner ideas, lunch ideas, vegetarian, cooking style, cuisine etc.

Healthy Thai Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for Thai food recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover traditional thai recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy Thai recipes for people following vegetarian, keto, paleo and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have gluten-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, egg-free recipes, seafood-free recipes and lactose-free. Nutritional information like fat, calories, cholesterol and carbs are available in the Thai recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and healthy with Thai recipes. Start eating Thai food recipes with proper meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list.

We offer lots of traditional thai recipes:
Cook tasty healthy Thai recipes at home using beef, low-salt soy sauce, cabbage & cloves of garlic. Recipes for classic Thai food dishes like tuscan skirt steak, pork belly slices, fish soup, baked spaghetti and bbq chorizo potato salad are available in the app. Our favourite traditional thai recipes include solyanka, creamy mushroom soup, korean chicken hotpot soup, and ukha.

Our healthy Thai recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for grilled, drink, cake etc. Now that you've our Thai food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Rice Recipes : Fried rice, pilaf
description:
Rice Recipes: Fried rice, pilaf is a free app that brings you the largest collection of varieties of rice dishes. This recipe is a food staple and primary cuisine all over the world. It is the most important grain with regard to human nutrition and caloric intake, providing more than one-fifth of the calories consumed worldwide by humans. You must have heard about brown rice, white rice even red rice. Brown rice is a highly nutritious food. It is a whole grain that is relatively low in calories (216 calories per cup), high in fiber, gluten-free and can be incorporated into a variety of dishes. Across the globe, rice is a major food staple. It‚Äôs been a mainstay in countries like Japan and India for thousands of years.

If you are a beginner or confused about what to cook then the rice recipe app provides cooking videos to help you out. It will introduce you to a wide collection of 15 minutes meals and many simple dishes that you can cook.

This app provides step by step cooking instructions with recipe videos. Most of the countries prefer rice recipes for dinner and lunch.
Fried rice is a popular entree at Chinese and other Asian restaurants. Chicken and Fish fry during our meals is one of the best combinations.

RICE RECIPES APP EXPERIENCE

Our app is simple to navigate and use and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your rice cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for your Main Dishes

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Rice Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find cuisines you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favourite Pudding

Use our bookmark button to save and organize your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful rice recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for Easy Cooking

Recipe Finder can help you find a good recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Rice Recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

title: Gluten Detector
description:
Gluten Detector is an application to facilitate the identification of the substance right from the
product label. Sometimes it is hard to know if that product can be safely used. Do you want to 
know if there is hidden source of gluten in the composition of food, cosmetic or medicine? 
Just click on the screen of your smartphone or tablet and you will discover quickly. Gluten 
Detector is ideal to help people with allergies, sensitivity, which have dietary restrictions or 
who simply adhere a gluten-free diet.

This application is for information only and detects whether or not the presence of the 
substance gluten in the product from the information provided by the manufacturer, listed on 
the label of ingredients/composition. So found, the Application shows the message Gluten 
Detected!, stating the origin: wheat, oat (possible contamination), barley, malt, rye.

Gluten Detector works like this:

Step 1. Check on the product label that indicates ingredients/composition.

Step 2. Enter the name of the substance you want to know about, for example :

            Wheat Flour

Step 3. Complete the search and done! Gluten Detected!

Now it's easy to choose what to use in your life!

And Gluten detector is just beginning. New features are coming soon.

We appreciate suggestions and please, if you find errors or have any questions, contact us!

title: Cheetah Simulator
description:
Enter into the wild savanna and live the life of a Cheetah! Explore a vast grassy plain filled with ferocious animals of all shapes and sizes. Raise a family, hunt down food, and battle for your life against fierce predators like hyenas, crocodiles, and lions!

Download the Cheetah Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ REALISTIC SIMULATOR - You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst and energy if you're going to survive in the hostile plains of the African savanna!

+ BLAZING SPEED - Race your way through the vast world at blurring speeds that will leave your enemies in the dust!

+ EPIC BATTLES - Use your razor sharp claws, swift speed, and deadly pounce to hunt down tasty snacks and fight dangerous exotic animals like elephants and lions!

+ START A CHEETAH PACK - Find a mate to bond with and raise your very own family of cheetahs! Watch your cubs grow in size and strength as they help you battle your enemies!

+ LEVEL UP YOUR CHEETAH - Gain experience by defeating and devouring enemies and level up your cheetahs to increase their health, attack damage, and even unlock new abilities!

+ CHEETAH SURVIVAL GUIDE - Look to your handy survival guide for information on enemy wildlife, a map of the savanna, cheetah customizations, and much more!

+ HUGE 3D ENVIRONMENT - Your cheetah is free to roam a massive open-world environment that is more the double the size of the previous simulators!

+ NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS - Brand new intuitive controls let you navigate your animal like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your cheetah's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action!

+ 20 UNIQUE AFRICAN SPECIES - Behold the largest collection of animals ever put into a single simulator! Hunt down elephants, hippopotamus, wild boars, gazelle, zebras, pythons, camels, bats, rhinoceros, and many more!

+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will transport you to a remote grassland ecosystem and surround you with nature's beauty! New Graphics Quality options allow you to customize the game to look amazing and perform great on any device!

+ OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS - Looking for more realistic action? If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the blood effects for some added combat ferocity!

+ GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Cheetah Simulator to experience the adrenaline pumping speed of the world‚Äôs fastest animal!

If you liked living as a Cheetah then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Eagle Simulator and soar through the skies, or check out the World of Dragons: Dragon Simulator and raid castles and battle mythical bosses, or rule over the animal kingdom with the Safari Simulator: Lion!

Follow us on Facebook for more awesome animal games and simulators!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames 

Follow us on Twitter too! We love hearing feedback and suggestions!
twitter.com/glutenfreegames

title: Ultimate Dog Simulator
description:
Race into a brand new adventure as a real dog! 10 playable breeds including Dalmatian, German Shepherd, Beagle, Labrador and more! Hunt down food and find your home in a massive realistic world! Survive on the streets of a busy city, battle the local dog catcher, and raise your family as you experience the thrilling life of a dog!

Download the Ultimate Dog Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while exploring city streets and vast forests!

TEN PLAYABLE BREEDS
Choose from 10 of your favorite breeds of dog in a single game! Become a Labrador, Dalmatian, German Shepherd, French Bulldog, Mastiff, Great Dane, Beagle, Bull Terrier, Rottweiler and Sheepdog! Each breed has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A neighborhood foe patrols the streets looking to capture bad dogs! The wild wolves of the forest lurk in the shadows ready to defend their territory!

BUILD YOUR PACK
Dominate other dogs or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any dog in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR PUPPIES
Raise babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you puppies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR DOGS
Choose your animal‚Äôs name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR DOGS
Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your dog to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus‚Äôs to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Bark and Growl Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your dog when active! 

RAGDOLL PHYSICS
Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry them!

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, stars and changing seasons!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT

comments: Great game! Probably the best dog simulator i have ever played. And, everyone who is asking how to become a tame dog, there is a home location that is a house. Edit: I saw someone saying that dogs don't unlock till past the lvl they say. I wanted to explain this isn't a glitch, they simply accidentally set the said lvls to not the real lvls they unlock at.

It's a awesome game. But when the dog catcher captures you need to take us to the shelter or pound and either escape or get adopted. I also dont like the way that the door stays open it should open and shut like the Ultimate Cat Simulater game. You should make a second one of these.

I loved these types of games when I was younger. It's good to know that you're also still making games. There's many simulators of animals from different people on the play store but most of them aren't too good. It's pretty nice to know that there's a huge variety of these as well. Thanks for these types of games

I loooooooove it. But the dog catcher could do more, in stead of staying in one place, he could drive around looking for dogs. He could also have a shelter for dogs that he catches. Other wise it's great. Also can there be a doberman pincher and greyhound?

This is an amazing game and absolutely love it, but I'm having a bit of trouble adding another dog intoy pack. I tried reading the direction, but it's still not working. Maybe I'm doing something wrong. If you could example step by step that would be a big help.

title: Gluten-free recipes for healthy eating
description:
Every day there are more cases of people who have an intolerance to wheat, that is, they are recognized as having celiac disease, which is how this disease is commonly known.

The people who suffer from it, celiacs, must eliminate from their diet all kinds of products that usually contain wheat: bread, pastries, beer .... and introduce in their diets recipes called gluten-free, which may be these same products but free of wheat.

People with celiac disease must follow their diet correctly with gluten-free recipes since not doing this correctly could lead to intestinal problems and longer-term serious health problems.

With the diets and menus for coeliacs collected in this application you can enjoy a wide range of recipes to fulfill correctly all the eating habits you must meet to maintain good health.

With the ingredients and homemade menus collected in it you can cook succulent dishes suitable for a gluten-free diet.

We collect homemade menus to cook with simple ingredients all of them suitable for coeliacs.

Our goal with this application is to follow some healthy eating habits with foods that you will find suitable for people with celiac disease.

Get a diet with homemade ingredients to cook for people who suffer from celiac disease.

Includes delicious menus to prepare.

The application is free and in it you will find pastry recipes, delicious gluten-free diets, baked recipes ... to cook quickly.

The best gluten-free recipes for you to find the right menu for your needs.

We put at your disposal the best dishes to share with this application.

You will find delicious dishes, the best breakfast, how to prepare fried gluten-free ... all thanks to the videos gathered here.

Get a healthy diet with the home ingredients suitable for coeliacs that we present in this application.

The application includes all kinds of recipes suitable for people with this disease.

The best and most delicious diets gathered for you in this application to make your illness easier thanks to the dishes you can cook.

comments: I love this game! Especially how there are wildfires sometimes. And, to the person who asked for a house cat game, go look for Ultimate Cat Simulator. They don't have to make your suggestion game because they already did before you commented that.

Its a game good game but its not worth the money. But I enjoy it, theres alot of things to do, bosses are fun and challenging, and its somewhat realistic. But on the other hand, glitches here and there, weird models that might become disjointed, and it takes so long to unlock the animals in this game. Overall, its pretty good. I should rate it higher, but so many glitchy things about the game that have not been fixed.

Ok love it but di u guys think u can add 1 2 or 3 more animals like playable ostriches and wielder beast cause those the 2 animals i really wnna play as u can make them available only to lvls 70 or 80 or between that cause i realy do wanna plays as those 2 animals i also appreciate u guys for this game u have no idea how much.

Hear me out: MULTIPLAYER!!! Also, can you make it to where we can actually SNEAK on the prey, instead of them running off when we get ten strides from them? Also, for non-predator animals, make them giant patches of grass so that we don't have to go from bush to bush. Make the wildfire a real, destructive threat. Make the animals harder to defeat, and make finding mate hard. Make finding food harder. Make these games a challenge like it really is out in the real world.

great but could you make it to where when you play as the hippo and try to swim faster you don't flip out and have the rhino not drown as soon it hits the water? not trying to sound to finicky this is my favorite game and could you maybe add the wild dog as a playable animal or maybe do a game where it's by itself? that would be great

comments: Love the game! But theres one huge annoying glitch. Whenever I switch to my last played cat, it spawns at the water of the beach and its hard to run all the way back with losing energy repeatedly. I've read the replies of people and they've said the same. But other than that, this is an amazing and fun simulator of a wild, or owned cat. I will rate it 5 stars as soon as the glitch is fixed.

Loveeeee the game but there is a huge annoying glitch... every time I open the game, my last played character is at home, but the other characters spawn at the beach. I switch to them and switch to the last played character, and he/she appears at the beach. If I switch to the other characters, they spawn all over the map. Plz fix it!

This game is awesome but my mate spawns all over the place! And once I went to change my cat and I spawned at the beach I was disappointed when I figured that out please fix this and i'll change my review.

There are so many problems with this game One: every time I respond my mate would spown somewhere random in the world Two: if I switch to my mate I spown some were and my mate despowns Three: my mate wonders off and doesn't fallow me It makes me so mad

It was in okay game, but the only thing was that if I had it had a family member if we're to vanish and would just run off somewhere!! Can you please fix the game a little bit cuz this kind of glitchy actually, also can you please make it where there the human walks around and also can you at least be a level 10 to have a kitten!

title: Jurassic Life: T Rex Simulator
description:
Travel back in time to a lost world of dinosaurs and live life as a ferocious Tyrannosaurus Rex! Explore a vast prehistoric jungle filled with danger at every turn. Raise a family, hunt down food, and battle for your life against legendary dinosaurs like the Pterodactyl, Triceratops, Velociraptor and many more!

Download the Jurassic Life: Tyrannosaurus Rex Dinosaur Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ T. REX SIMULATOR - You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst and energy if you're going to survive in a hostile prehistoric jungle!
+ EPIC BATTLES - Use your powerful jaws, ferocious roar, and swift speed to catch a tasty snack and fight dangerous foes!
+ START A FAMILY - Find a mate to bond with and raise your very own family of dinosaurs to help you hunt! Watch your babies grow in size and assist you in combat!
+ LEVEL UP YOUR T. REX - Gain experience by defeating other dinosaurs and level up your T. Rex family to increase their health, attack damage, and even unlock new attacks!
+ DINO SURVIVAL GUIDE - Look to your handy survival guide for information on enemy dinosaurs, a map of the island, and a bonus fossil scavenger hunt!
+ HUGE 3D ENVIRONMENT - Your T. Rex is free to roam a massive open-world tropical island filled with dangerous dinosaurs, towering trees, and hidden treasures!
+ NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS - Brand new intuitive controls let you navigate your dinosaur like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your T. Rex's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will transport you millions of years back in time to the land of dinosaurs!
+ GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Jurassic Life: Tyrannosaurus Rex Dinosaur Simulator to experience the thrilling life of the Tyrant King of Lizards, the Tyrannosaurus Rex!

If you liked living as a T. Rex then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Eagle Simulator and soar through the skies or check out the Wildlife Simulator: Wolf and start your very own Wolfpack!

Like us on Facebook!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames 

Follow us on Twitter!

title: Glycemic Index Load in food net carbs diet tracker
description:
Glycemic Index & Load Diet Assistant is an app that lets you easily browse, search for, and display the Glycemic Index for different foods. The application also helps in keeping a body weight and blood glucose levels measurement logs. It also allows to track blood pressure and warns about too high levels of tension. You can also browse Glycemic Load and carbohydrates contents in foods. There's also a calculator of the Glycemic Load in a given serving. Knowing these values and following a low-carb diet like Montignac, Paleo, Atkins, low-GI and similar, helps avoid weight gain or obesity and lower the risk of diabetes, coronary heart and age-related health diseases.

Do you want to eat smart?

+ know good food
+ eat smart
+ follow low-carb diets or keto diets
+ control your weight
+ prevent diseases like diabetes or heart diseases like hypertension
+ fight weight gain, overweight and obesity
+ have the Glycemic Load, Index and carbs data always at hand
+ backup or sync with other devices

The free features of the app are:

+ Glycemic Index foods tables
+ Favorite and recent food + search feature
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Glucose tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Blood pressure diary with statistics and beautiful charts
+ BMI calculator

We keep this app free by showing ads. If you want to remove ads or utilize the other exciting features like below, you can have them for a small fee. 

+ Glycemic Load list
+ Carbohydrates content list
+ Fiber content in foods and net carbs calculator
+ Meal content calculator
+ Food diary to keep track of your food, glycemic load and carbs consumption
+ Statistics with averages for daily, weekly, monthly and yearly periods
+ Beautiful charts of the GL and carbs consumption over time
+ Weight tracking with statistics and beautiful charts
+ Unlimited number of measurements
+ Future additions to the food tracker, charting and stats
+ Import/export all your data to/from cloud storage
+ No more ads!

So, do you know what you eat? Find out now! Install the app and use it to take control of your health.

GI means Glycemic Index. It is a number associated with a particular type of food to indicate the food's effect on a person's blood glucose (blood sugar) level. The number typically ranges between 50 and 100, where 100 represents pure glucose, an equivalent amount of pure glucose.

The Glycemic Load (GL) of food is a number that estimates how much the food will raise a person's blood glucose level after eating it. It can be used to apply the Glycemic Index to dieting by connecting the GI number with carbohydrates content in a given serving. It gives an estimation on how much a serving size of food is likely to increase blood-sugar levels.

Net carbs are total carbs minus fiber which is indigestible thus it is considered not to raise blood sugar levels.

BMI is used to assess health risks and body structure but does not take in consideration muscular mass so it can sometimes be inaccurate, for instance in the case of athletes or pregnant women.

Diabetes mellitus (DM), commonly known as diabetes, is a group of metabolic disorders characterized by high blood sugar levels over a prolonged period.

Hyperglycemia (also spelled hyperglycaemia or hyperglyc√¶mia), is a condition in which an excessive amount of glucose circulates in the blood plasma.

Observational studies demonstrate that people who maintain arterial pressures at the low end of these pressure ranges have much better long-term cardiovascular health.

recentChanges:
3.6.0 brings HbA1c value into the glucose tracker and also the following:
* Added averages for the last 7 and 14 measurements to the stats in the weight tracker
* Added fourth level of the glucose classification to the glucose tracker
* Allowed future dates in the food diary
* New tutorial videos for the app:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLYWkMeYJpfYCBIWzrE133Y1CE4Th32Zj1
* Internal updates and fixes

Full change log available here:
https://www.creamsoft.com/rd.php?p=mygi_changelog
comments: Very quick and easy app to use. Very handy if you are watching sugar intake (diet, health, both). The free version shows the Glycemic Index of the food item, & it's all colour coded like traffic lights so very quick to scroll or search for the food you want - & see if it's a good choice! For those who want to eat a low-carb lifestyle and also watching the impact of carbs for health reasons, the app now includes the option to make a one time payment to see the Glycemic Load of food. I love it!
This app is in alphabetical order and easy to read. When I have a question about a food that I want to eat I check its glycemic load. I don't use it everyday but when I use it I know it's accurate.
Great Apps, for future ideas, you may use the phone camera, and users can just take a shot on the food, and it will automatically tells GI and GL number. :)
Very helpful and ease of use in identifying glycemic differences among a wide range of foods. Still loving this app.
Easy to use with the new Blood pressure addition completes everything you need all in one app.

title: Ultimate Forest Simulator
description:
Dash into your newest adventure as a ferocious Bear, speedy Rabbit, or a deadly Cougar! Choose from TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS! Hunt down food in the rocky mountains, raise your family, and unlock exciting new playable animals as you experience life in a beautiful yet dangerous Forest!

Download the Ultimate Forest Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy while ruling over the Forest!

TEN PLAYABLE ANIMALS
Choose from your favorite species of forest animals in a single game! Become a Bear, Rabbit, Turtle, Cougar, Bat, Deer, Raccoon, Squirrel, Snake, and a Hawk! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A massive tusked beast awaits in the frozen peaks! A legendary reptile awaits you in the coastal caves!

BUILD YOUR FAMILY
Dominate other animals or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any animal in your pack and create a powerful family!

RAISE YOUR BABIES
Breed babies that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, finding food for them and carrying them in your mouth!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR ANIMAL
Choose your animal‚Äôs name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your pack members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR ANIMAL
Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, escaping predators, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your animal to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your stats, and increase the size of your pack!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus‚Äôs to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Run Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Hiss and Roar Buffs, which create temporary Stat Boosting auras around your animal when active! 

RAGDOLL PHYSICS
Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry them!

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! And the BRAND NEW changing seasons!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created TWENTY FOUR unique dens for your animals to live in! Catch salmon from a  sparkling river, climb the arctic peaks, and explore the dark caves on the coast!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down animals like deer, rabbit, boar, wolf, crow, snake, fish, duck, raccoon, bat, sheep, lynx, alligator, cougar, squirrel, owl, frog, fox, moose, bear, hawk, skunk and many more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Forest Simulator to transport yourself into a dense wild world with hidden dangers and live the life of your favorite wild animal!

If you liked living in the Forest then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Cat Simulator and live as a wild feline in the city, or try the Ultimate Wolf Simulator and howl at the moon with your pack of wolves!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!

title: Ultimate Wolf Simulator 2
description:
Take on the life of our most realistic wolf ever in the sequel to the most popular animal simulator of all time! Explore a wild world brimming with stunningly realistic plants and animals alike. Meet other wolves in the forest and live together, raise your family, hunt for food, and become the strongest wolfpack in the world!

HYPER REALISTIC SIMULATION
The forest has never been more alive! Explore and hunt to maintain your wolves thirst and hunger in the most detailed world we‚Äôve ever created!

NEW ALERT SYSTEM
Sneak your way through the forest to avoiding alerting nearby animals and giving them a head start trying to escape you! Animal AI is smarter and faster than ever!

NEW BATTLE SYSTEM
Omnidirectional dodge system brings a new level of skill to your fights! Quickly react to your opponents attack direction to dodge and avoid damage!

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
Build deeper bonds with your wolves through the new relationship and personality system. Your pack recognizes heroic and caring acts that will alter the relationships between wolves. Gain bonuses from synergetic wolves hunting together!

EXPANDED WOLFPACK
Have up to TEN wolves in your pack! Seek out friendly wolves and pass their challenges to recruit them to your pack! Play as your new wolves to help them level up and improve relations with other family members!

BABY AND TEEN WOLVES
A brand new age makes raising your pups even more real! Breed wolf pups that will grow into teens and eventually full grown members of your clan!

NEW CUSTOMIZATIONS
Introducing expanded animal customization options for fine-tuning your wolf‚Äôs look! Alter physical features like height and ear size to accentuate a wolfs personality!

CONQUER THE SPIRITS OF THE FOREST
Challenge the four elemental spirits of the forest to battles on an EPIC scale! Jump over waves of lava, dodge massive boulders, and resist icy winds in increasingly difficult tests of your reflexes and timing!

UPGRADE STATS AND SKILLS
Gain experience and level up your wolves to unlock stat bonuses and unique skills! Skills will grant specialized wolf abilities like healing, tracking, and battle strength!

NEW DEN CRAFTING
Collect materials to decorate and upgrade your dens and make life for your wolves even better! Building animal traps can provide your pack with a guaranteed tasty snack in the mornings!

MASSIVE OPEN WORLD FOREST
At player request we have done away with procedural flora, and have instead hand placed every blade of grass and tree in the world, bringing a more detailed purposeful world for you to explore!

The colors of the forest change before your eyes with our brand new seasonal cycles. Snow gathers upon the ground, puddles form in the rain, and different climates will be altered accordingly to provide maximum realism.

Discover the all new wildlife of the forest! Improved AI and animations combined with species specific action trees will immerse you in our most detailed world to date. Track down animals like fox, deer, crocodile, bear, boar, snake, fish, crow, moose, ram, raccoons, rats and of course wolves!

descriptionHTML:
Take on the life of our most realistic wolf ever in the sequel to the most popular animal simulator of all time! Explore a wild world brimming with stunningly realistic plants and animals alike. Meet other wolves in the forest and live together, raise your family, hunt for food, and become the strongest wolfpack in the world!

HYPER REALISTIC SIMULATION
The forest has never been more alive! Explore and hunt to maintain your wolves thirst and hunger in the most detailed world we‚Äôve ever created!

NEW ALERT SYSTEM
Sneak your way through the forest to avoiding alerting nearby animals and giving them a head start trying to escape you! Animal AI is smarter and faster than ever!

NEW BATTLE SYSTEM
Omnidirectional dodge system brings a new level of skill to your fights! Quickly react to your opponents attack direction to dodge and avoid damage!

NEW RELATIONSHIP SYSTEM
Build deeper bonds with your wolves through the new relationship and personality system. Your pack recognizes heroic and caring acts that will alter the relationships between wolves. Gain bonuses from synergetic wolves hunting together!

EXPANDED WOLFPACK
Have up to TEN wolves in your pack! Seek out friendly wolves and pass their challenges to recruit them to your pack! Play as your new wolves to help them level up and improve relations with other family members!

BABY AND TEEN WOLVES
A brand new age makes raising your pups even more real! Breed wolf pups that will grow into teens and eventually full grown members of your clan!

NEW CUSTOMIZATIONS

comments: i just got the game a few days ago and im addicted to it! however there's some really annoying bugs that make the game difficult to play. when my trust stats are way up, they go back down to 10% or less, or it doesn't go up at all even when me and my mate win a battle. another thing is that sometimes after winning a battle, my wolf is still stuck in "combat mode" and it's stuck like that unless i reload the game. other than that i love the game! compared to other wolf sims this one's the best

Not as amazing, but does remind me a bit of WolfQuest, my all time favorite animal sim! But there are problems like LAG. Graphics on lowest still lag. The camera turns away from food making eating hard, especially on locked. The music is boring, so I just play WolfQuest's. Please fix the lag and camera. Edit: Well, WolfQuest is still the best Wolf Simulator you'll EVER find (especially Anniversary Edition :D)!! This one, on the other hand, doesn't even let you have pups. Disappointing...

The graffics are really good and it's a super fun game, but there is a bug in the game. I can't breed my wolf's for some reason whenever I click on the wolf's to breed them they don't show up on the breeding page, which is really disappointing because I'd like to have pups in my pack. If you can fix this issue I'm sure a lot of people would appreciate it. Thanks.

Game is wonderful with beautiful graphics, There are some things I'd like for you guys to tweak. 1. (The Boss battles)While fighting a boss, when you dodge the boss hits you anyway 2. (Supplies) It sometimes gets annoying when you run out of supplies like sticks or rocks, could you atleast add a new feature called : "Scratch" and you could scratch the fallen logs to obtain sticks. 3. (Stunning) To be able to Stun your opponent would make the game a lot easier for new people

Great game, but way too glitchy. For example, I'm trying to get out of lava and it keeps turning me around so I'm going into the lava. It freezes and that makes doing stuff hard. The glitching and freezing are my main problems. Other than that, the game is really cool. The animals are quite realistic and the scenery is amazing.

title: Ultimate Shark Simulator
description:
Dive into the deep blue sea and rule over the ocean as a real Shark! For the first time ever, choose from SEVEN PLAYABLE SHARKS! Hunt down food in the coral reefs, raise a family of sharks, and swim through the seaweed forests stalking prey like squid, turtle, dolphin and whales!

Download the Ultimate Shark Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Brand New Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, oxygen, and energy while hunting in treacherous ocean waters!

SEVEN PLAYABLE SHARKS
Choose from your favorite species in a single game, play as a Great White Shark, Hammerhead Shark, Tiger Shark, Blue Shark, Thresher Shark, Sawshark, and Whale Shark! Each species has their own families, experience, and levels!

DANGEROUS BOSS BATTLES
Test your skills against SIX thrilling boss battles! A massive tentacled beast awaits in the depths of the caves, dare you awaken the Kraken?! A monstrous prehistoric Megalodon is rumored to still swim the nearby ocean waters!

BUILD YOUR PACK
Dominate other sharks or bring them a treat to recruit them to your family! Customize and play as any Shark in your pack and create a powerful family of predators!

RAISE YOUR FAMILY
Breed baby sharks that will grow into powerful members of your family! Care for you babies while they are are young, hunting food for them and carrying them on your back!

CUSTOMIZE YOUR SHARKS
Choose your shark's name, appearance, skills, and attributes to complement your family members and become a more powerful group!

LEVEL UP YOUR SHARKS
Gain experience by catching and eating your prey, caring for your family, and completing missions! Level up your sharks to increase their health and attack damage, earn points to upgrade your shark's stats, and increase the size of your school!

EARN STAT POINTS
Stat Points can be used to provide bonus‚Äôs to traits like Health, Critical Attack Chance, Swim Speed, and much more! 

UPGRADEABLE BUFFS
Buff Points can be used to upgrade your Buffs, which create temporary stats boost automatically when your shark‚Äôs vitals are low or they get a taste of blood! 

RAGDOLL PHYSICS
Your prey now realistically dangles from your jaws as you carry them!

DYNAMIC WEATHER, SEASONS AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, sun, and stars! And the BRAND NEW depth variable atmosphere creates a dark and dangerous ambience in the depths of the ocean!

MASSIVE REALISTIC 3D ENVIRONMENT
Explore a world so big we created FOUR unique coves for your sharks to live in! Brave the deep abyss, survive the harsh arctic, or hunt along the beaches of the tropical islands!

DOZENS OF ENEMIES
Hunt down a huge variety of animals like the Dolphin, Whale, Fish, Turtle, Flamingo, Stingray, Squid, Octopus, Rabbit, Penguin, Seal, Ibex, Boar, Moose, Skunk, Seagull, Sharks and more!

OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS
If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the BRAND NEW blood effects for added combat ferocity!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Ultimate Shark Simulator to become the apex predator of the ocean, a deadly Shark!

If you liked living as a Shark then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Ultimate Wolf Simulator and live a wild life in the forest, or turn the Ultimate Dinosaur Simulator and discover a long lost Prehistoric World of Dinosaurs!

Give us a shout and let us know what you want to play next!

title: Healthy food recipes
description:
Healthy food recipes app offers you many healthy and light recipes. These include low-carb recipes, crock pot recipes, dessert recipes, slow cooker recipes, soup recipes, stew recipes, recipes for keto diet and recipes for cake.

Festive recipes
Celebrate this festive season with healthy recipes for¬† Chinese New year, American super bowl, romantic recipes for valentine's day and much more.

Popular healthy crockpot recipes of the month
Recipes like ravioli & vegetable soup, hash brown casserole, crunchy coleslaw with buttermilk dressing, bean and capsicum salad, summer shrimp and pineapple stir-fry, caesar salad, roman-style chicken and pork tenderloin with seasoned rub are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy recipe instructions with picture
Every weight loss diet recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many tasty recipes for free in our Healthy food recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Healthy food recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite slow cooker recipes
Add your favourite diet plan recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved keto diet plan recipes offline. You can also create healthy casserole recipe collections on the basis of dinner ideas, weekend party ideas, vegetarian, weight loss diet plan, cooking and prep time etc.

Fitness Diet Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for healthy crockpot recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover healthy recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have weight loss diet recipes for people following vegetarian, paleo, high- protein and low- carb diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have peanut-free recipes, gluten-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, lactose-free recipes and dairy-free. Nutritional information like calories, cholesterol, carbs and fat are available in the Healthy food recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and quick with Healthy food recipes. Start eating slow cooker recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.

We offer lots of diet plan recipes:
Cook tasty keto diet plan recipes at home using molasses, basil, green sweet pepper & ground ginger. Recipes for classic healthy casserole dishes like chocolate chip cookies, griddled vegetables with melting aubergines, banana-bran muffins, garlic bread and spiced carrot & lentil soup are available in the app. Our favourite fitness diet recipes include greek salad, vegan mac and cheese, chicken and broccoli stir-fry, and summer salad.

Our healthy crockpot recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for healthy brunch, casserole, healthy dinner etc. Now that you've our healthy recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Wildlife Simulator: Wolf
description:
Enter into the wilderness and live life as a Wolf! Explore a vast, lush forest filled with dangerous animals of all shapes and sizes. Raise a family, hunt down food, and battle for your life against fierce predators like bears, wild boars, and stags!

Download the Wildlife Simulator: Wolf today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
+ REALISTIC SIMULATOR - You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst and energy if you're going to survive in a hostile forest!
+ EPIC BATTLES - Use your sharp teeth, iconic howl, and swift speed to catch a tasty snack or fight dangerous foes!
+ START A WOLFPACK - Find a mate to bond with and raise your very own family of wolves! Watch your pups grow in size and strength as they help you battle your enemies!
+ LEVEL UP YOUR WOLF - Gain experience by defeating other animals and level up your wolves to increase their health, attack damage, and even unlock new abilities and levels!
+ WOLF SURVIVAL GUIDE - Look to your handy survival guide for information on enemy wildlife, a map of the forest, wolf customizations, and much more!
+ HUGE 3D ENVIRONMENT - Your wolf is free to roam a massive open-world forest filled with dangerous carnivores, towering trees, and sparkling pools of water!
+ NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS - Brand new intuitive controls let you navigate your wolf like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your wolf's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action!
+ HD GRAPHICS - Stunning High Definition graphics will transport you to a remote forest and surround you with nature's beauty! New graphics quality options let you customize the game to look amazing and perform great on any device!
+ OPTIONAL BLOOD EFFECTS - Looking for more realistic action? If you are of age or have your parents permission, turn on the blood effects for some added combat ferocity!
+ GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE - With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Wildlife Simulator: Wolf to experience the thrilling life of one of nature's top predators!

If you liked living as a Wolf then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Eagle Simulator and soar through the skies or check out the World of Dragons: Dragon Simulator and raid castles and battle mythical bosses!

title: Intol ‚Äî Scans food intolerances
description:
New: Intol Version 3
Developed from scratch with additional features: Get Intol 3

You put one product after another back on the shelf because you can't tolerate it?
You now know that the intolerable ingredient is hidden at the back of the table of contents, but do you still sometimes catch one?

That won't happen to you in the future, with Intol!

Intol scans lists of ingredients and immediately recognizes what you do not tolerate.

Whether at home or directly in the supermarket: 
Simply hold the camera of your smartphone on the content of the packaging. The ingredients are marked in color:

Red ~ not tolerable
Orange ~ poorly tolerable
Yellow ~ moderately tolerable

A green "OK" means that you can tolerate it. Scanned, checked!

The following intolerances are supported:

- Lactose intolerance
- Histamine intolerance
- Fructose intolerance
- Gluten intolerance (Coeliac disease)
- Sorbitol intolerance
- Salicylic acid intolerance
- Glutamate intolerance
- Special nutrition during pregnancy

Intol also helps you during pregnancy!
When you're pregnant, special rules apply. Intol helps you to recognize those foods in the jungle that you should avoid during this time.

With the new Ingredients search function you can search for specific ingredients.


Required permissions
- Camera access to scan the ingredients list
- Vibration to give feedback on detected incompatible ingredients
- Accessing the external memory to save settings

Intol is ad-free and works without mobile data, Wi-Fi or user tracking.


Keywords: histamine, lactose, lactose-free app, fructose, gluten-free app, celiac disease app, sorbitol, salicylic, incompatibility, intolerance, food intolerance, allergy, pregnant food, glutamate

Orange ~ poorly tolerable
Yellow ~ moderately tolerable

A green "OK" means that you can tolerate it. Scanned, checked!

The following intolerances are supported:

- Lactose intolerance
- Histamine intolerance
- Fructose intolerance
- Gluten intolerance (Coeliac disease)
- Sorbitol intolerance
- Salicylic acid intolerance
- Glutamate intolerance
- Special nutrition during pregnancy

Intol also helps you during pregnancy!
When you're pregnant, special rules apply. Intol helps you to recognize those foods in the jungle that you should avoid during this time.

With the new Ingredients search function you can search for specific ingredients.


Required permissions
- Camera access to scan the ingredients list
- Vibration to give feedback on detected incompatible ingredients
- Accessing the external memory to save settings

Intol is ad-free and works without mobile data, Wi-Fi or user tracking.


Keywords: histamine, lactose, lactose-free app, fructose, gluten-free app, celiac disease app, sorbitol, salicylic, incompatibility, intolerance, food intolerance, allergy, pregnant food, glutamate
summary: Helper in case of food intolerances and during pregnancy

title: Freshly - Food Delivery
description:
Food delivery that's nutritious and convenient in a weekly subscription delivery service.  Freshly meals use only the freshest food and ingredients (never frozen), made by our team of chefs and nutritionists.  Each meal is ready to eat in only 3 minutes‚Äîthey‚Äôre fully cooked so all you have to do is heat ‚Äòem up.

NUTRITIOUS FOOD DELIVERY
Freshly cooks nutritious and delicious food, delivered to your door on a weekly plan.  From 4 meals up to 12 meals a week, Freshly is your app for tasty and nutritious food delivery.

DELIVERY FLEXIBILITY
Not at home for your food delivery?  Easily update your delivery day in the app to select any day of the week!  Change your meal plan food delivery to wherever you are, home, work, or school, you just need an address to start receiving incredible food delivery!

SAVING TIME
Take the stress out of meal prep, recipes, restaurants, reservations, take out, and cooking.  Freshly delivers food that satisfies.  No artificial sugars, healthy ingredients, gluten free, keto friendly, low carb, with plenty of options to delight everyone.

DESIGNED TO FIT YOUR LIFESTYLE
Our meals are crafted by our team of nutritionists and chefs to be nutritious and delicious.  With Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars.  Our food can meet your needs for various diets including gluten free, keto friendly, low carb, high protein, and other lifestyles.

CUSTOMER SERVICE
Our customer service team is available 24/7 around the clock to help you pick out meals, learn details about your food delivery, assist with any delivery issue, or any other questions you have.  Chat directly from the app or place a phone call, we're always here to help.


Now you can manage everything related to your Freshly subscription right in the app and start receiving deliveries today!

‚Ä¢ Update your upcoming delivery, or skip a week in seconds.
‚Ä¢ Track your food delivery in one tap, so you know when to expect your delicious and tasty meals at your door.
‚Ä¢ Quickly change your delivery address in a dash!
‚Ä¢ Browse delicious meals, customize your order, and see what‚Äôs new.
‚Ä¢ Dig into everything you need to know about a meal‚Äîingredients, nutrition, and what makes your food tasty.
‚Ä¢ Set your dietary preferences.
‚Ä¢ Quickly contact our customer care team via live chat, email, or phone.
 
About Freshly:
 
We started Freshly because we believe eating fresh, nutritious food every day should be easy for everyone. So we do all the hard work for you‚Äîsourcing high-quality ingredients, making sure each meal you eat is nutrient dense and packed with the good stuff, and expertly cooking your food to order so it tastes fresh and delicious.
 
No shopping, chopping, cleanup, recipes, meal prep, or worrying about what‚Äôs for dinner. And with Freshly meals, you get to say no to artificial ingredients, preservatives, gluten, and refined sugars.

comments: Even if you're allergic to meals, they'll still be recommended up top. There should be a way to hide meals w/ nuts, for example, cuz over 1/2 meals now have nuts for no reason (especially the new meals). Also, the app's unintuitive, & it's a nightmare to add/browse/change meals. The food's usually fine if you do oven instead of microwave, but the app's terrible. EDIT: Ya, you can enter an allergy, which I did. That doesn't DO anything. At all. It should. That's what's wrong. We can't hide meals.

The meals arrive on the day you specify. The food is very good. No prep, just 2-3 minutes in the microwave. The app makes reviewing available meals & changing type or quantity of meals very easy. On the phone, customer support folks are great, too. I had to downsize the number of meals, because it was just too much food for me, but everything else is great.

This app is so easy to use and asks you if you're sure you want to do something like exit suddenly which would lose the work you've done. I like apps that check before letting me make a mistake. Since the pandemic hit, I have been reluctant to go grocery shopping. Freshly gets me healthy fresh food without the contact and exposure. The portion sizes are perfect for me. And the meals are so delicious and satisfying.

Great service.. though I wish it was a little cheaper or had some discounts or coupons. I know some similar services provide a military/veteran discount rate. Overall, meals are pretty good except the steak and the collard greens. Also, the meals with chopped/pre-cut meat tend to be much better than the dishes with whole pieces of meat, like chicken breast or steak. Not sure why, might just be me. üôÇ

I am very pleased with the options provided and I love that I don't have to cook as much! Let's face it, less cooking means less dishes too! I do wish there was a veteran's discount though. My husband and I have enjoyed trying new foods we wouldn't have normally tried before. We look forward to new meals in the future. For now, my favorite meal is the sausage baked penne!

title: Celicidad. Comer sin gluten
description:
Celicidad App es una app gratuita que te permite localizar m√°s de 1.900 restaurantes con opciones sin gluten en Espa√±a. La aplicaci√≥n recoge la localizaci√≥n de cada uno de ellos, sus datos b√°sicos (direcci√≥n, tel√©fono, web‚Ä¶), as√≠ como otro tipo de especificaciones interesantes para el p√∫blico celiaco, como es el tipo de comida, el ranking de precios, si tienen pan, si tienen cerveza, carta sin gluten, postres o si han recibido formaci√≥n por parte de alguna de las asociaciones de celiacos que trabajan en Espa√±a.
 
De esta manera, y gracias  a Celicidad App, los celiacos pueden salir a comer de casa con tranquilidad, conociendo nuevos lugares y disfrutando sin riesgo de contaminaci√≥n. Adem√°s la ficha de cada restaurante incluye im√°genes sobre los platos m√°s representativos del establecimiento y permite a los usuarios registrados (registro gratuito), valorar y comentar sobre su experiencia en el restaurante. 

Una de las funcionalidades m√°s √∫tiles de la App es que realiza b√∫squedas en funci√≥n de la ubicaci√≥n del usuario, as√≠ podr√° saber qu√© opciones sin gluten tiene m√°s cerca de donde se encuentra. Tambi√©n tiene la opci√≥n navegaci√≥n vinculada al GPS del m√≥vil, con lo que s√≥lo tiene que seleccionar el restaurante sin gluten al que quiere ir, y el sistema de navegaci√≥n le guiar√° hasta llegar a su destino. 

El equipo de Celicidad, formador por un gran n√∫mero de celiacos, actualiza la App semanalmente, con lo que la cifra de restaurantes sin gluten aumenta a medida que va pasando el tiempo. Pero Celicidad es mucho m√°s que una app, es un entorno especializado en celiaqu√≠a, dieta sin gluten y restauraci√≥n sin gluten. Todas sus informaciones y sus proyectos se pueden encontrar en www.celicidad.net. 

Dieta Sin Gluten

La celiaqu√≠a es una enfermedad cr√≥nica, autoinmune y multisist√©mica provocada por la intolerancia al gluten. Se da en individuos con predisposici√≥n gen√©tica cuyo sistema inmune reacciona al recibir gluten. El gluten es una prote√≠na presente en cereales como el trigo, la cebada, el centeno y sus derivados. La avena se considera tambi√©n un cereal con gluten a pesar de que de forma natural no lo lleva, pero suele llegar al mercado contaminado. El √∫nico tratamiento para la celiaqu√≠a es una dieta sin gluten estricta y de por vida, y esto implica renunciar a todos aquellos alimentos que llevan gluten o han sido contaminados con gluten durante su proceso de elaboraci√≥n. Salir a comer fuera de casa, es por tanto, una actividad que entra√±a cierto riesgo debido al desconocimiento por parte del sector de la restauraci√≥n de la dieta sin gluten. Adem√°s de cocinar sin gluten y cocinar la celiaqu√≠a, los restauradores deben ser capaces de garantizar la ausencia total de contaminaci√≥n cruzada a la hora de preparar los platos sin gluten.

title: Healthy Recipes & Calculator
description:
You‚Äôre one click away from over 500,000 recipes from the world‚Äôs largest healthy recipes website, SparkRecipes.com. All of our recipes have been tried and tested by home cooks just like you, and our app is designed to make it easy for you to whip up favorites wherever you go! Make eating delicious, nutritious meals a snap - all without breaking the bank.

With our free app, you can:

Search our recipe database your way - Looking for a healthy breakfast dish? Need a low fat pasta dish the kids will eat? With Healthy Recipes it‚Äôs easy to find a new recipe that fits the bill. Search by meal, cuisine, occasion, course, or prep time.

Find recipes that fit your dietary needs - Whether your diet is gluten free, low carb or vegetarian, we have the recipes for you. Filter for your dietary need and find tasty recipes, fast.

See calories, carbs, and 10 other key nutrients for each recipe - SparkRecipes.com is a sister site to SparkPeople.com, the #1 healthy-living website in the US. Knowing what you eat is the first step towards watching what you eat, so all our recipes feature detailed nutritional information. We make it easy to calculate exactly what‚Äôs in what you're eating. Looking for low fat, low carb meals? We‚Äôve got you covered. Just looking for easy recipes that are tasty and quick to make? We have those too. 

Save your favorites - Found a recipe that you love? Save it to your ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù list so you can come back to it. Want to see these recipes from anywhere on the web? Create a free SparkRecipes account and sync your favorite recipes across all your devices.

Integrate with our fitness tracking app - all recipes you save to your ‚ÄúFavorites‚Äù list will automatically be synced to our fitness tracking app if you use it as well. Get a better idea of what you eat and how healthy it is! And track the recipes you find in this app in our free diet tracking app with a tap!

Share Recipes with Your Friends - Our app offers seamless sharing of your favorite recipes to Pinterest, Facebook, Twitter or email - give it a try!

Our members love our app and we think you will too. Let's cook up something delicious!

recentChanges: With this release there is much rejoicing, as our Healthy Recipes app now fits all Material Design specifications. This means the app is nicer to look at and easier to use. You‚Äôll love it. ‚ò∫
comments: Better than doing a web search for recipes. I am FH and cannot eat refined sugar, refined flour, saturated fats and egg yolks. Trying to do a web search with these variables is mostly useless, especially for desserts. I have an intolerance to bananas and most sugar-free desserts include bananas for some unknown reason. Your filtering is not flawless, but more useful than the web. Great for now, but consider multi- condition filters down the road.

For +6 months, the titles for the banner images on the home screen of the app are cut in half horizontally by the banner images under them. You can figure out that the words under a picture say (e.g.) "50 Seafood Pastas You'll Love" maybe 40% of the time? Also, can't tap on users in the Reviews section + go to their profile + see their submissions? The 'back' button on a related recipe should take you to the original recipe you opened NOT skip back to the home screen! Argh! Otherwise nifty app

Useless, only good for processed foods. I tried creating a simple recipe using fresh ingredients and whenever I did a search, the only items that came up were processed foods or none at all. For instance, when I finally found chicken tenderloins it gave me a fixed amount and I wanted to have the option to enter a certain weight amount. it wouldn't let me. What kind of app is this? this app is not for home Cooks. I'm uninstalling.
Love this app. I have an account with SparkPeople and love their recipes. Can't wait to use this.
Very limited functions. Couldn't edit or delete recipes. Wasted space on my phone. The website is much better.

title: sinGLU10 (ACySG)
description:
sinGLU10 (ACySG) is a very useful tool for those people who, for health reasons, must follow a gluten-free diet.

Here you will find the classification of food products according to their gluten content and you'll know quickly if the product you are checking contains gluten or not.

The app includes more than 21,000 products verified by the Coeliac Disease and Gluten Sensitive Association, after the certificates provided by the manufacturers have been reviewed, in the same way we proceed with the gluten free food directory.

Thanks to the cooperation of manufacturers, the information is automatically updated whenever a change occurs, so you'll always be up to date.

Also it has a barcode scanner which allows you to locate quickly and accurately the products. The scanned products will be saved in your 'favorites section' and the app will inform you of any changes.

In "News and Promotions" section you will find exclusive discounts for the users of the App.

On the other hand, it also allows the search and location of 3,900 establishments throughout Spain such as restaurants, hotels and shops where you can find gluten free menus, gluten free cakes, gluten free products, etc. We are also starting to include establishments outside of Spain, which will be useful when traveling abroad.

As a novelty, the APP includes a cooking section where you'll find a hundred gluten-free recipes distributed in different categories that will facilitate your everyday life.

title: zomato - restaurant finder and food delivery app
description:
Your safety is our topmost priority. Opt for Contactless Delivery and Contactless Dining to ensure minimum human interaction when ordering in or dining at restaurants. 
‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶‚Ä¶
zomato is a restaurant review, discovery, and food delivery app, with in-depth information of more than 1.5 million restaurants across 24 countries! 

Serving more than 70 million users monthly, zomato helps them find high-quality food at restaurants through its search and discovery services, and online food delivery in India, UAE, Lebanon and Turkey.

Install the zomato app and plan your next meal by browsing through restaurant menus, photos, ratings and reviews.

*Search for and discover restaurants: Search for restaurants, cuisines, or dishes on zomato! From Pizza, Pasta, Noodles, Biryani, Butter Chicken, Pancakes to Salads, Cakes, Burritos, Burgers, Dimsums, Sushi (..and a lot more) - we‚Äôve got all your cravings covered. 

Use our search filters to discover restaurants near you for breakfast, lunch or dinner (and everything else in between), and refer to our theme-based curated lists called ‚ÄòCollections‚Äô to find the best burgers, perfect date spots, or the top trending restaurants in town! 

*View menus and other details: Find restaurant menus, reviews, pictures, contact details, map directions, and all the other essential information you need for your next binge session. 

*Get food delivered (24x7): With online delivery across 500+ cities globally, you can order food and beverages, and get them delivered at your doorstep within minutes. 

*Get groceries delivered: Use zomato market to get your daily essentials, such as fruits, vegetables, dairy, eggs, meats and more, delivered at your doorstep in no more than 60 minutes. 

*Track your orders with ease: Easily track your order journey with live tracking on our app. Get accurate estimates of your delivery time and details about your delivery valet right after placing your order. 

*Rate and review restaurants: Add ratings and reviews for the restaurants you've been to or have ordered in from, and share photos of your foodie moments. Tell us what you liked, disliked, and what can be improved upon. 

*Avail zomato pro: Become a zomato pro member and enjoy discounts of up to 40% on your dining experiences. Also, view your savings with every pro transaction on the app to keep track.

*Book a table to avoid queues: Avoid standing in waiting queues at restaurants by booking a table in advance with zomato. Simply choose a partner restaurant, add the number of guests and select a slot to dine in for a seamless experience.

*Find and follow your friends: With zomato feed, you can find and follow your friends or top foodies to see where they're eating at and what they like best.

zomato is available across India, UAE, Portugal, Australia, New Zealand, the USA, Lebanon, the Philippines, Indonesia, Turkey, the UK, Canada, Ireland, South Africa, the Czech Republic, Slovakia, Poland, Chile, Italy, Brazil, Sri Lanka, Qatar, Malaysia and Singapore.

*some features are live in limited locations only.

recentChanges:
Our latest app update comes with an exciting new feature! Introducing voice directions* ‚Äî a simple way for you to make all your delivery experiences even more seamless.

Now help your zomato valet reach your location faster by simply recording voice directions on the cart while placing your order. You can even record these instructions once and save it for all your future orders.

*Live in limited locations only.

Update your app and give it a spin!
comments: Would have given 5 stars, bu for 1) Valet movement is not updated on real time basis in the app and this causes inconveniences. This is not an issue with any random valet for his connectivity issues. The problem persists for all orders. Valet doesn't move at all on the map at times. The issue persists even after latest update. 2) Even after the order is delivered, at the bottom of the main screen, it is displayed as Food is being prepared.

Great app. Lots of filters for ease of use. New update for one star on 30/10/2020. Pathetic approach. I ordered the food. Restaurant was ready with food, but no rider was allocated for an hour. Finally when I contacted customer care, they said sorry and added a credit amount for their mistake. I paid for service, not to get the credit. Finally, the restaurant itself arranged their own driver and sent the food and was never sent by Zomato. Regret to be a Zomato Pro member.

The new UI revamp is refreshing. The notifications and chats are handled well. The payment page fragment design can be improved. One can easily miss the promo section, if its not intentional. I would expect orders to be shown by default than favourites in the orders tab. The order tracking banner is well designed as well. Kudos to the designer.

Unfortunately with the recent changes in benefits of using this app, i stopped using it and membership fees were paid for nothing. Will never use it again simply not worth it. This is what happens when you make people pay for certain benefits of using the app and choose to wipe it all out but reyai the paid by members money.

When I started out new, it was an excellent app for food delivery. But now there are issues happening most of the time I want to order. The menu is not visible to me and it is showing that I can order. Half the time I want to order there is some kind of issue going on like not delivering to my location or switched off ordering but actually it is showing that I can order now. What the hell is wrong with Zomato?

title: Akkis Cupcakery & Tea - Vegan, Keto & Gluten-Free
description:
Hi, I am Akeila Tejwani, a Sophomore student at Brandeis High School. I am very passionate about Cupcakes, Teas and Working with Kids!

I came up with this idea of using organic ingredients for all my recipes and donating 50% of the profits to kids charities in San Antonio. 

I take pride in my creations and we have highly rated reviews on Google: https://bit.ly/AkkiGoogle for our Regular, Vegan, Keto and Gluten-Free Options for Cakes & Cupcakes in San Antonio

EVERYTHING IS MADE FRESH TO ORDER! We do not make dozens of cupcakes every day so whatever you order is made fresh ONLY FOR YOU!!

I wanted to come up with healthy and vegan options for kids to enjoy the baking savouries. Lots of kids are not able to enjoy all the baked food due to an unhealthy amount of calories found in baked products at grocery stores. Also, the ingredients used by them are not healthy for the overall health and fitness.

This way it will help the community in San Antonio and also fulfil my desire to be a health-conscious baker.

Join me in this fun-filled journey for you and your kids that will help them enjoy the cupcakes and become a Healthier Happier YOU!!

This team is the wonderful Tejwani Family, we are like a symphony in the kitchen and together we can accomplish anything and everything we put our mind to. We live by our core values every day, HUGPC (Health & Happiness, Upright, Gratitude, Pay Forward, and Continuous Learning) and we implement them in the joyous family environment at home. It is composed of Ajay, Pooja, Nikita, and Rajni Tejwani and each one plays an important role in contributing to the Cupcakery!

‚ÄúI am very happy to be able to spend time & bond with my family also, learning how to remote into my classes. I had the option to save the money for my college education, my business or give back to our community and I chose to help the community. I believe in Karma and good things will come back to me.‚Äù, says the Brandeis High School Sophomore in San Antonio. 

Organic Ingredients ‚Äì We use mostly Organic Ingredients in our baking 

Specialty Bakery ‚Äì We have Vegan, Keto, and Gluten-Free Options ‚Äì We always try to innovate and create new recipes so you will never be bored. What is next ‚Äì PEGAN diet desserts!

Support Kids Charities in San Antonio ‚Äì Profit Sharing with Kid‚Äôs Charities in San Antonio 

Fully e-Commerce Enabled Website 

Custom Cake Delivery in San Antonio ‚Äì Custom Cakes delivery within 24-48 hours

Local Business ‚Äì We are a local small business and not part of a big giant franchise chain, so helping us helps the local community.

Focus on Quality ‚Äì We are a home bakery so we instead of a higher fixed cost of rent, utilities, etc. , we invest in the quality of our products to give the fresh-est and most value for our money!

Guaranteed Fresh ‚Äì We do not keep inventory and never sell stale products. That‚Äôs our commitment to our customers!

Customer Feedback ‚Äì We value and ask for customer feedback so that we can keep improving ourselves

DONATE TO CHARITIES: https://akkiscupcakery.com/asp-products/donate-to-kids-charities/

BUY GIFT CARDS: https://akkiscupcakery.com/buy-gift-cards/

SUPPORT OUR CUPCAKERY: https://akkiscupcakery.com/asp-products/donate-to-akkis-cupcakery-tea/

Live our motto of HEALTHY HAPPY YOU!

title: Endive - IBS FODMAP Food Diary & Symptoms Tracker
description:
Simply track what you eat, your symptoms and moods and Endive will help you identify correlations in a visual graph form.

Food is a common trigger of digestive symptoms. Avoiding certain foods or keeping a low FODMAP diet can dramatically improve issues like gas, bloating, stomach pain, diarrhoea, constipation and others.

However, everyone is different and there is no one-size-fits-all IBS diet: Keeping a diary of what you eat and how you feel is vital to learning what triggers your symptoms.

Take charge of your digestion and gut health.

üìâPERSONALISED TRACKER 
Add custom foods and symptoms that are personal to you and track them together with the others. Endive knows recipes and breaks them down into ingredients to make IBS tracking faster and more efficient.

If you have a condition you know about, but want to optimise your diet to help improve your symptoms, Endive helps you keep track of what you have eaten and how you feel, both physically and psychologically. This allows you to learn how your body reacts to different foods ü•ë, or which triggers (e.g. anxiety, depression) are causing you symptoms.

üìäWIDE RANGING TRACKER

Endive helps you manage conditions such as:

‚úÖ IBS (Irritable Bowel Syndrome)
‚úÖ IBD (Inflammatory Bowel Disease)
‚úÖ Food intolerance and sensitivities (such as Dairy, Wheat/Gluten, Lactose)
‚úÖ Acid reflux
‚úÖ Crohn‚Äôs disease
‚úÖ Coeliac disease
‚úÖ SIBO (Small Intestinal Bacterial Overgrowth)
‚úÖ Ulcerative colitis
‚úÖ Migraines & cluster headaches
‚úÖ Skin issues (such as Eczema, Acne)
‚úÖ Period / menstrual cycle related issues
‚úÖ Bloating, heartburn, and many other digestive conditions

üî¨FODMAP TRACKER
Want to track your FODMAP diet? üçí
FODMAP‚Äôs are types of carbohydrates that are poorly absorbed by the body. Studies show strong links between them and digestive IBS symptoms. A low FODMAP diet can have remarkable benefits if you struggle with these issues.

If you want to take your tracking to the next level, get weekly reports with Endive Plus that highlight high and low FODMAP foods in your diet so you can learn which of them might have caused your symptoms.

‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî‚Äî

We'd love to hear your thoughts üí≠

üí°Send your questions, feedback and bug reports to feedback@endive.app
