comments: Helpful for keeping track of food and symptoms but definitely not an app for a newbie. New to having to keep an eye on FODMAPS so wish it was easier to see which was what. There is the ability to pay for highlighting of this but I didn't find the highlights were on each food item. As well, the food options assume you're making things from scratch. Or some searches food items just didn't result in anything and I had to manually add each ingredient. Definitely not gonna be doing that takes forever

I've used several apps to track my IBS-C. I know the developer is still working on this app, but so far I like it. They have a great selection of food items and recipes already in the database. You can easily adjust the recipes, too. After every entry it asks you to rate your triggers (bloating, constipation, etc) which I LOVE! I'm so bad about tracking those. There is no export option yet, which I hope comes soon. Using the free version and there are no ads, either.

Found this app really disappointing. The high/low fodmap scoring is behind a paywall. Additionally I lost confidence in the food directory, hardly any of the meals I get from the supermarket are in the directory.
User experience is just really cluttered. I looked for my regular low fodmap items in the meal directory and could not find any of them. Going to keep looking for a helpful fodmap food diary
I use it for my IBS and how bloated I am etc good reminder.

title: Chinese Recipes
description:
Do you love Chinese food recipes? Look no further! Experience Chinese culture and tasty Chinese cuisine in Chinese food maker app. Get a wide range of easy Chinese recipes from Chinese noodles recipes to Chinese rice recipes. 

Using the Chinese rice maker, you can cook a variety of delicious side dishes. The editorial team has compiled easy recipes from ancient Chinese cookbooks. These Chinese cuisine recipes will help you indulge in both tradition and taste of mainland China. 

Collect favourite easy Chinese food recipes
Add your favourite tasty Asian recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Asian cuisine recipes offline. You can also create healthy recipe collections based on cuisine, dinner ideas, non-vegetarian, cooking and prep time, weekend party ideas.

Traditional Chinese recipes are one of the healthiest recipes in the cuisine world. Chinese food includes rice recipes, chicken soups, noodles and salads. Chinese recipes are easy to make and simple. 

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with the ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients features lets you search and discover chicken recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy Chinese food recipes for people following paleo, low carb keto, gluten-free and high protein diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have seafood-free, egg-free, peanut-free, lactose-free and dairy-free recipes. Nutritional information like carbs, cholesterol, calories and fat are available in the Chicken recipes app.

Create Meal plans with tasty Asian cuisine
Meal planning is going to be easy and healthy with Chinese recipes. Start eating easy Chinese food recipes with simple meal planner ideas and grocery shopping list. Chinese meal planner ideas have a tasty recipe like fried rice, pork dumplings, chicken Hakka noodles and plenty of Chinese food recipes and cuisines.

Vegetables are the preferred more than beef and pork dishes daily. With our free app, you can cook chicken recipes in the Chinese way. We've lots of tasty dinner ideas designed to make you happy. All recipes in the app are free to try. You can also try healthy Chinese snacks for breakfast and lunch. You can cook tasty Chinese food a lot better than your next-door Chinese restaurants. 

Easy Chinese recipes like Chinese noodles recipes, Chinese vegetarian recipes and Chinese beef recipes. Get the Chinese cookbook packed with tasty Chinese dishes to homemade recipes now! Let's start cooking Chinese noodles, tofu and wontons today!

title: Gluten Watcher
description:
Find info on Gluten, Calories, Carbs, Sugar, Fat and Protein.

If you are diet and health conscious or are finding it hard to find gluten free food from grocery stores any where in the world, then this app is for you. This app will always be your companion and will stop your everyday worry of finding food that's right for you.

Gluten Watcher is an app that scans food product barcodes and shows live product information. This app is connected to an online food database which has information on thousands of food products all around the world. You can also save products you have scanned in your favourites to review later.
The app shows other nutritional information as well such as Calories, Carbs, Sugar, Fat and Protein.
This app requires Wi-Fi or mobile data to scan 
You may get an error if the online database does not have enough information on a few products.

Gluten Watcher is not a substitute for professional medical advice, and under no circumstances shall company be liable for any damages.
For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://sites.google.com/view/glutenwatcher-privacy-policy/home
.

title: Pasta Recipes
description:
Pasta recipes free app will introduce you to the biggest collection of pasta, spaghetti, and macaroni dishes from all around the world. It is a type of Italian food typically made from an unleavened dough of durum wheat flour (semolina) mixed with water or eggs and formed into sheets or various shapes, then cooked by boiling or baking. Rice flour, or legumes such as beans or lentils, are sometimes used in place of wheat flour to yield a different taste and texture, or as a gluten-free alternative. Pasta is a staple food of Italian cuisine.

Pasta is divided into two broad categories, dried and fresh. Both of them come in a number of shapes and varieties. It is classically served in mainly three types of prepared dishes. Cooked pasta is plated and served with a complimentary side sauce or condiment. The second classification is in which the pasta is part of a soup-type dish. A third category is incorporated into a dish that is subsequently baked in the oven. Pasta dishes are generally simple, but individual dishes vary in preparation. Some dishes are served as a small first course or for light lunches, such as pasta salads. Other dishes may be portioned larger and used for dinner. Pasta sauces similarly may vary in taste, color, and texture. In terms of nutrition, cooked plain pasta is 31% carbohydrates (mostly starch), 6% protein, and low in fat, with moderate amounts of manganese, but these generally have low micro nutrient content. Pasta may be enriched or fortified, or made from whole grains.

Ingredients to make pasta dough include semolina flour, egg, salt, and water. There are a variety of ways to shape the sheets of pasta depending on the type required. The most popular types include penne, spaghetti, and macaroni. Gluten, the protein found in grains such as wheat, rye, and barley, contributes to protein aggregation and firm texture of a normally cooked pasta. Gluten-free pasta is produced with wheat flour substitutes, such as vegetable powders, rice, corn, quinoa, amaranth, oats and buckwheat flours.

THE APP EXPERIENCE

This is simple to navigate and also has multiple tutorials available on how to use the app.
As the recipe is a set of instructions for cooking, our app also provides nutritional information, servings, total time for preparation and recommendations so that nothing can go wrong when you‚Äôre cooking.

Theme Support

Protect your eyes from being hurt by a bright screen at night by enabling dark mode.
Make your macaroni cooking experience more comfortable at night.

Smart Shopping List for Your Pasta Cooking

An organized shopping list allows the user to create ingredients list so you won‚Äôt miss any for the recipe. Users can also add items directly from recipes.
It also has offline access.

Search 1M+ Spaghetti Recipes

Apart from shopping list our app also provides a global search feature
where you can find recipes you looking for or discover new recipes

Collect Your Favorite Dishes

Use our bookmark button to save and organize recipes in your favorite recipe list. They also have offline access.

Personal Profile

Do you have a wonderful pasta recipe that you‚Äôd like to share? We would love for you to upload it. To submit your tasty recipe all you need to create an account. In addition to that, you can also upload your tasty food photos, and leave feedback, comments, and tips over our chef community.

Native Language

Another key feature of our app is it supports multiple languages.
Currently, we offer around 13 main languages.

Recipes Finder for Spaghetti

Recipe Finder can help you find a good recipe based on what you have in your fridge. You can provide a list of ingredients you have and bounce ideas off recipe finder so you never end up wasting any food!

Download the free Pasta recipes app today. Happy Cooking!

title: Gluten watcher
description:
Find info on Gluten, Calories, Carbs, Sugar, Fat and Protein.

If you are diet and health conscious or are finding it hard to find gluten free food from grocery stores any where in the world, then this app is for you. This app will always be your companion and will stop your everyday worry of finding food that's right for you.

Gluten Watcher is an app that scans food product barcodes and shows live product information. This app is connected to an online food database which has information on thousands of food products all around the world. You can also save products you have scanned in your favourites to review later.
The app shows other nutritional information as well such as Calories, Carbs, Sugar, Fat and Protein.
This app requires Wi-Fi or mobile data to scan 
You may get an error if the online database does not have enough information on a few products.

Gluten Watcher is not a substitute for professional medical advice, and under no circumstances shall company be liable for any damages.
For our full terms and conditions and our privacy policy, please visit: https://sites.google.com/view/glutenwatcher-privacy-policy/home
.

title: Life-Changing Food
description:
Life-Changing Food, the best-selling cookbook from Quirky Cooking is now available as an app for your iPhone or iPad, making it even easier to access our amazing recipes. Life-Changing Food is everything you want out of a whole food cookbook. The recipes are approachable and tailored towards the individuals or families who have realised that the only real diet is a whole food diet. The recipes are entirely gluten free, and despite their simplicity are incredibly delicious. If you‚Äôre just starting out with whole foods and want guidance, or if you are a veteran who wants fresh ideas with beautiful recipes that will accompany you for life, this is the book for you. In Life-Changing Food, Jo and Fouad share their stories of healing through whole food to inspire you to make the changes you need. We‚Äôve also included an entire section of the book that discusses wider topics relating to good health, such as lifestyle changes, the importance of nature and water, and our approach to gut healing. We set out to create a world class cookbook that will be cherished in your family for generations. This book will change your life!


128 gluten-free whole food recipes, with both Thermomix¬Æ and conventional methods

Most recipes suitable for GAPS and Paleo diets, with dairy-free, egg-free, nut-free, vegan and vegetarian variations where possible

A focus on gut healing foods

The most delicious gluten-free bread/ pastry recipe ever! (Everyone we know thinks so too!)

Stunning photography and design

Stories and tips that will inspire you and help you to make healthy changes in your diet

Easy to follow recipe layout

Create a list of favourite recipes for easy access

Shopping list feature allows you to add recipe ingredients into a handy list for the shops!

Recipes developed by Jo Whitton from Quirky Cooking and whole food chef Fouad Kassab

title: Gluten Free Holiday Recipes
description:
Welcome to the Gluten Free Recipes Application!

This is the ultimate recipe dictionary for Gluten-Free Holiday dishes. "Gluten-Free Recipes" is a Android mobile device application that contains many Gluten-Free Food Recipes for all Holiday occasions. At a touch of a finger, you can easily find holiday recipes by searching the Recipe List.

Data includes:

  -Dish Picture
  -Dish Ingredients
  -Dish Directions

Search Features:

  -Search by Recipe Name
  -Search by Recipe Holiday
  -Search by Recipe Food Group

As a user friendly option, the "Gluten-Free Recipe" application provides image files. The image option is very useful in providing a visual that links to Recipe Dish. In addition, every dish has "Ingredients and Preparation Directions" for every Dish Listing.

The goal of "Gluten-Free Recipes" is to provide tasty dishes for low fat and healthy conscience individuals. This application is the perfect recipe cookbook for all Holiday occasions.

title: Nima: The Portable Food Sensor
description:
The Nima app helps you find gluten-free and peanut-free food. Hear about great restaurants or packaged foods directly from the Nima community.

Even better?
‚Ä¢ Each review is backed by an antibody-based chemistry test run by a Nima sensor. Real science backing real reviews, by real people just like you.

Find restaurants
‚Ä¢ Discover thousands of Nima-tested and reviewed restaurants across the United States.
‚Ä¢ Filter by food genre and/or location, so you can find exactly what you‚Äôre looking for.

Find packaged foods
‚Ä¢ Wondering if that bag of chips is really gluten-free? Or if the chocolate cake you‚Äôve been eyeing contains peanuts? Search the Nima database for Nima-tested and reviewed packaged foods found in grocery stores.

For Nima Sensor owners
‚Ä¢ Sync your Nima Sensor test results to the app. It‚Äôs quick, easy, and helps you keep a record of which foods you‚Äôve already tested. 
‚Ä¢ Share with the community. Every restaurant dish or packaged food you test and review is added to the Nima-tested restaurant map or packaged foods database.
‚Ä¢ Quickly update your sensor with the latest firmware - the software that helps your Nima run smarter and faster. 

Thanks to the Nima community, who have tested and reviewed every restaurant and food item you see on the app. Together we can help others make more informed choices, and live their healthiest lives. Cheers to good and healthy food!

*We are so excited to re-launch the app. Please send all questions and feedback to support@nimasensor.com and we'll get back to you right away.

recentChanges: - Minor bug fixes
comments: This app is so buggy. It sometimes has trouble pairing with my sensor even after following the instructions and troubleshooting section and I can't leave restaurant reports (error of "something went wrong"--I've tried so many times and it's really frustrating to take the time to write a review on my phone and have it wiped). That was the main selling point for me--a database of collected public tests and it doesn't work.

First time I paired the app it prompted me to update firmware. I updated chose to update the firmware and and the app failed as it was updating. The nima device is now unresponsive. I was originally having issues wirh test capsules providing no results. Inlove it when it works, but have had nothing but problems. Hopefully support gets back to me and assists with both issues.

Lack of support in pairing this application to my phone. Support is lackluster in helping me pair my Nima to my phone, help has been greater than 7 days with only one response. The app writer needs to expand the Bluetooth pairing to other phones on Android
The device is great, but the app is seriously lacking. I would really like to be able to see other folk's Nima test results as advertised, but that functionality has never worked properly for me.
The app doesn't let me enter the information for the tests performed. I have contacted tech support, they know it is a problem, but it has been a problem for many months.

title: Stray Dog Simulator
description:
Pick your favorite breed and live the life of a Stray Dog! Survive in a massive city filled with dangerous dogs and feisty cats! Build your dog pack, dig up buried bones, and battle for your life against German Shepherds, Huskies, and Labradors!

Download the Stray Dog Simulator today while it's 50% OFF for a very limited time!

Game Features
REALISTIC SIMULATOR
You'll need to maintain your health, hunger, thirst, and energy if you're going to survive the harsh life of a wild dog on the street!

EPIC BATTLES
Use your powerful bite to defend your territory and fight your enemies! Cause too much trouble and the city will call the dog catcher to steal a dog from your pack!

BUILD YOUR PACK
Dominate other dogs and recruit them to your pack! With up to 5 additional dogs, 9 breeds, and 3 alternate colors, every pack will be unique!

PLAY ANY BREED
For the first time you can choose the breed of your starting dog. Even better you can switch and play as any dog in your pack and level them up individually!

LEVEL UP YOUR DOGS
Gain experience by defeating dangerous enemies, eating food from the trash, and completing missions. Level up your dogs to increase their health and attack damage, and increase the size of your pack!

MISSIONS AND ACHIEVEMENTS
Introducing two new mission types, "Mark your Territory" and "Can You Dig It?‚Äù, to the unlimited missions and over two dozen achievements to give you a boost of experience! With the level cap increased to 200, you‚Äôll need all the help you can get!

DYNAMIC WEATHER AND DAY/NIGHT CYCLE
Introducing a brand new procedural weather system with unique storms, clouds, and celestial movement. Realistic storms will bring a downpour of rain, flashes of lightning and booms of thunder!

HUGE 3D CITY ENVIRONMENT
Your dog is free to roam a massive open-world environment that is more than triple the size of the previous simulators! Busy city streets, wide-open parks, white-fenced neighborhoods, and beachfront fairgrounds!

NEW TOUCH-BASED CONTROLS
Brand new intuitive controls let you navigate your animal like never before! Pinch to zoom and play from your dog's perspective or get a bird's eye view of the action!

9 UNIQUE DOG BREEDS
Pick your favorite breed! Customize your dog pack with any dogs you‚Äôd like from the vast selection: Bulldog, Dalmatian, Doberman, German Shepherd, Jack Russell Terrier, Labrador, Greyhound, Dachshund and Husky!

STRAY SURVIVAL GUIDE
Look to your handy survival guide for information on breeds, a map of the world, achievement progress, and much more!

HD GRAPHICS
Stunning High Definition graphics bring a bustling city to life! New Graphics Quality options allow you to customize the game to look amazing and perform great on any device!

GLUTEN-FREE PROMISE
With all of our games you will always get the full game with no ads or additional purchases!

Download the Stray Dog Simulator to experience the exciting life of a stray dog surviving on the streets!

If you liked living as a Stray Dog then you'll love our other animal simulators! Download our Eagle Simulator and soar through the skies, check out the Snow Leopard Simulator and pounce on your prey from high mountaintops, or slither around a tropical rainforest with the Snake Simulator!

Follow us on Facebook for more awesome animal games and simulators!
facebook.com/glutenfreegames
twitter.com/glutenfreegames

comments: Wow!! This is literally the best stimulator game available on Google play. Only suggestions maybe the pack could include more dogs (8-10 maybe?) and you could breed them and have puppies. Also maybe you could name them and select gender? Overall, if you're looking for a good quality game, this one is definitely worth the price!!!

Alright, the game may look fun, but everything about it is bad. The graphics are terrible! The dogs don't even look like dogs, they look like distorded aliens of some sort that run on four legs. The buildings just look like pictures pasted onto the model. The dog runs way too fast, so it looks like you're Sonic the hedgehog. I wouldn't recommend this game. It's a waste of time and money. Wildcraft is WAY much better than this, and it's free, with better graphics than this garbage.

I love this game, but I would like it if u made it so some of the humans on the game are just merciful enough to adopt u, and bring u to their house. Make it so u can have a dog bed (I also want to be able to choose the color of it), a food dish, (the humans put certain types of food in it), make it so dog toys, bones, and treats appear. Make it so u can have a collar, and leash so ur owner can walk u. (I want to choose the color of it, and also make a spiked black collar.

I Hate it Because I like it But why the Other Dogs Be Friends when They Touch Each Other and The Dogs Bite Really Fast and I bite slowly and they Bite Really Fast Not cool But I still like its Awesome! And Cool But Please all of your Games is Fast Biting Everything in Those all Games are Fast. Bitingüò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠üò≠ and I still like all of your Games Awesome!!!!!Thank you I still give it a 5 Stars and Even Cats Kill me Faster Than I Thought
I really like this game! It's really fun. I just have one complaint: how come the dogs all led like boy dogs? What if I want to be a girl dog?

title: TAB Street - Allergy Free - Gluten Free
description:
For most people, making a choice to eat out is sometimes just deciding what they are in the mood for, but when you have food allergies that choice becomes a lot harder. Not knowing which restaurant works with your allergy or multiple allergies or even be willing to accommodate. Created with the food allergy user in mind, the site only lists websites that have food allergy, gluten free information available on their websites.

TAB Street is all about empowering everyone, young and old with food allergies, gluten free diet and Celiac Disease. It covers wheat allergy, peanut allergy, dairy allergy soy allergy and much more. No matter the size of the town, from rural areas to the city, every listing that meets the criteria qualifies. This will allow anyone to pull up tabstreet.com at home or on the road and see what is available within 100 miles (location service activate through the website).

The website is growing and there isn't a place or listing in every town but we are always looking for listings that meet the needs and have information on their respective website for food allergies, gluten free and Celiac individuals, their families and friends. The top allergies are covered for each country, USA, Australia, Canada and the United Kingdom.

The website allows for geolocation once it is enabled so what this means for the user, finding a listing that is up to 100 miles/km from where ever you are at, at home or on the road.

No one, young or young at heart, should be excluded from events.

*DISCLAIMER TAB Street LLC is a reference and a guide to helping find listings that have gone the extra mile to include allergy free and/or gluten free information on their website. The Content is not intended to be a substitute for professional medical advice, diagnosis, or treatment. Always carry emergency medication and discuss your allergies with the restaurant staff. Always ask the questions that you need to ask to have a safe and enjoyable time.

title: Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes
description:
Our Meal Planner for Weight Loss & Healthy Recipes App provide a simple way for busy singles, couples, and families to plan their meals and eat healthier. Our healthy Meal Planner for Weight Loss & healthy recipes are highly customizable so you can easily personalize a plan that works with your unique tastes and lifestyle.

Reasons you will love this app

‚úî 3 delicious healthy recipes for free for quick cooking, every day
‚úî Varied free healthy recipes 
‚úî Awesome Meal Planner for Weight Loss
‚úî Step-by-step photo tutorials to make sure each dish is foolproof
‚úî Save your favorite recipes in your personal list to cook them later
‚úî Quickly find the right dish with a recipe filter
‚úî Share your favorite recipes with friends
‚úî Find the nearest grocery store on the integrated map
‚úî Create a shopping list of several recipes, including prices
‚úî Portion calculator and nutritional information
‚úî Free cooking app

We offer to you a lot of weight loss recipes: main dishes weight loss recipes, snack weight loss recipes, salad weight loss recipes, soup weight loss recipes, sweet weight loss recipes, juice and freches weight loss recipes, low carb meat, low carb fish, low carb chicken, low fat casseroles, low carb breakfast, weight loss baking, weight loss pizza and other weight loss recipes.

All weight loss recipes are presented with simple and detailed instructions and photo.

Sign up to Recipes of the Day and join over 1,000,000 people who have used our Meal Planner for Weight Loss to eat healthier, reduce stress, lose weight, save money, and live happier, more productive lives.

Check out our top 5 benefits and features:

1. Cook healthy meals in about 30 minutes or less (even if you don't know how to cook)
We've reimagined and streamlined the cooking experience. Prepare meals quickly with our step-by-step and hassle-free cooking instructions.

You'll never again have to jump around looking for an ingredient, instruction, or piece of cookware that you may have overlooked.

2. No more stressful "What should I eat?" decisions to make
Each week you'll have a personalized meal plan with simple & healthy recipes that are catered to your exact needs and preferences.

Eliminate decision fatigue after a long day's work - simply pick a recipe from your meal plan and cook it in less time than it takes to pick up an unhealthy (and expensive) takeout meal.

3. Healthy meal plans that are uniquely your own
With the most personalization options of any minimal-waste meal planner out there, you can cook exactly how you want to eat.

From classic, flexitarian, pescetarian, low carb, paleo, keto, vegetarian & vegan diet types to gluten-free, shellfish free, fish free, dairy free, peanut free, tree nut free, soy free, egg free, sesame free, and mustard free allergy restrictions to 119 individual dislikable ingredients, your meal plans will be truly personalized to your specific needs.

4. Optimized & super fast grocery lists
When you build a new meal plan, a grocery list of all the ingredients you'll need for the week is automatically created. Simply grab your mobile, head to the grocery store, and get all your week's shopping done in about 20 minutes with our step-by-step grocery list optimized with standard grocery store layouts in mind.

5. Save money with minimal food waste
It's annoying when you purchase ingredients from the grocery store, cook a meal or two, and have a bunch of ingredients going bad by the end of the week, isn't it?

recentChanges:
The latest version of our free healthy recipes of the day & meal plan app includes the following improvements:

- New Meal Planner Options
- New Free Healthy Vegetarian Recipes
- New Free Healthy Vegan Recipes
- New Free Healthy Low Carb Recipes
- We have optimized the loading time of the recipes
- Many minor bugs were fixed
- Fixed some errors in the nutrition plan
- New recipes can now be loaded directly
- Improved favorites list
comments: WORTHLESS! This is not a free app. It is not a meal "planner" its a sales pitch. Dont bother with it. You CANNOT make a shopping list for a week and the recipes require 10 or more ingredients each and are ridiculus to prepare. As a dad its not made for a family its for single women with a bunch of money and spare time to shop daily. WORTHLESS!
I like that you don't have to subscribe - big plus. The meals and recipes are readily varied.

I see a title for shopping list on the home page as well as a grocery cart but when I click on it it goes to the Meal Plan page. And there are 41 things on my list which I would like to see. If the grocery list doesn't work I want my money back!
Downloaded app to find out you have to pay 12 dollars to use it. Its only 12.00 but why list it as a free app ?
Great app for healthy cooking üòç

title: German food recipes: Easy and traditional recipes
description:
German recipes app offers you many easy and healthy recipes. These include kartoffelpuffer recipes, drink recipes, stew recipes, soup recipes, kohlrouladen recipes, dessert recipes, recipes for schnitzel and recipes for sausage.

Festive recipes
Get an ultimate german recipes for this Chinese New year, American super bowl. Celebrate this season of romance with tasty valentines day recipes and much more..

Popular healthy german recipes of the month
Recipes like light apple strudel, traditional german rotkohl, celery soup : low calorie, gl√ºhwein (german mulled wine), potthucke, german chocolate cake, tarte flamb√©e aka flammkuchen and k√∂nigsberger klopse (german meatballs in creamy caper sauce) are popular in January & February.

Simple german food recipe instructions with picture
Every traditional german recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many quick recipes for free in our German recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, German recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite healthy German recipes
Add your favourite German food recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved traditional German recipes offline. You can also create healthy German recipe collections on the basis of german cuisine, non-vegetarian, weekend party ideas, lunch ideas, cooking style etc.

German Food Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for traditional German recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover healthy German recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have German food recipes for people following paleo, vegan, vegetarian and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have peanut-free recipes, lactose-free recipes, seafood-free recipes, egg-free recipes and dairy-free. Nutritional information like fat, carbs, cholesterol and calories are available in the German recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be tasty and light with German recipes. Start eating traditional German recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.

We offer lots of healthy German recipes:
Cook tasty German food recipes at home using butter, peeled, bratwurst & cheese. Recipes for classic traditional German dishes like pineapple & pork skewers, kartoffelsuppe, broccoli & stilton soup, german potato salad and poached chicken and vegetable soup are available in the app. Our favourite healthy German recipes include fish soup, german risotto, german stuffed cabbage rolls (kohlrouladen), and creamy mushroom soup.

Our German food recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for salad, flammkuchen, appetizer etc. Now that you've our traditional German recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: Freezon: Gluten, lactose & other "free" places
description:
Freezon collects the World's restaurants and shops where people with allergies and intolerances or who follows special diets can find foods, drinks and goods for themselves.
Currently we list places with intolerances of gluten, dairy, egg or sugar and special diets for vegan, vegetarian or paleo.
Places found in the application are based on developers' collections and users send-ins and the list is continuously growing.
Users can also rate and review places in the Freezon app so they help each other to find worth-to-visit places. 
They can also suggest modifications for the places listed in the app.

Featured diets are:
- gluten free
- dairy free
- egg free
- sugar free
- vegan or vegetarian
- paleo

title: Low carb recipes free: Low carb diet app
description:
Are you looking for low carb recipes for getting fit and healthy?  Our low carb diet apps are here to help you out. The low carb diet is seeking a lot of attention lately. Keto recipes and low carb recipes can help you to lose weight and makes you fit and healthy.  

A low carb diet is a diet plan which cuts the carb/ carbohydrate intake considerably. With a low carb diet, you can lose weight fast. A healthy low carb diet includes fats, vegetables, natural proteins including meat, poultry, eggs and non-starchy vegetables. Keto recipes and low carb recipes have very low carbohydrate or sugar in it. By drastically reducing the carbs and replacing it with fat can help you in weight loss. 

Check out the low carb recipes free in the carb manager. We have curated a healthy collection of low carb foods perfect for you. Make tasty and healthy breakfast keto recipes, healthy recipes for special occasions and so on.

The low carb diet trackers app focuses on tasty categories such as: 
> keto bread > keto desserts > keto pancakes > low carb snacks >low carb bread > breakfast keto recipes > low carb lunch > low carb dinner > low carb diet salads

The low carb recipes free app is powered up with features like

1. Get personalized low carb foods and meal plans every day.
2. Healthy keto recipes and low carb recipes free.
3. A smart carb manager to help you know the calories, macros and nutritional info of each recipe. 
4. Make a shopping list for low carb foods and grocery shopping.
5. Make meal plans and surprise friends with low carb snacks and keto desserts. 
6. Count calories and macros with low carb diet trackers.
7. Get popular low carb recipes free, keto recipes on the keto diet app.
8. Taste healthy low carb bread, low carb recipes free and, keto pancakes from around the world. 


Our low carb diet apps focus on:
+ Excludes sugary high carb/carbohydrate foods, most grains, legumes, fruits, bread, starchy vegetables, nuts and seeds.
+ Low fat, high protein recipes, low carb diet trackers.
+ Low carb diet apps focus on reducing your appetite, aid weight loss, lower blood pressure and reduced blood sugar and insulin levels. 
+ Diabetic-friendly low carb snacks, low carb foods & keto recipes


Learn what to eat and what not to eat during a low carb diet. Download low carb recipes free, One of the best low carb diet apps to lose weight, get slim and healthy.

Every russian food recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Russian recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Russian recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite best russian recipes
Add your favourite easy russian food recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved easy russian recipes offline. You can also create healthy russian recipe collections on the basis of non-vegetarian, vegetarian, lunch ideas, dinner ideas, cuisine etc.

Russian Food Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for best russian recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover easy russian food recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have easy russian recipes for people following paleo, keto, gluten-free and vegetarian diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have dairy-free recipes, lactose-free recipes, seafood-free recipes, egg-free recipes and wheat-free. Nutritional information like cholesterol, carbs, calories and fat are available in the Russian recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and tasty with Russian recipes. Start eating healthy russian recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.

We offer lots of russian food recipes:
Cook tasty best russian recipes at home using dill, eggs, ground pepper & celery rib. Recipes for classic easy russian food dishes like classic russian kotleti, oladushky, shuba, salted herring and kulebyaka are available in the app. Our favourite easy russian recipes include shashlyk, meat blini with cheese and dill, borscht, and golubtsy.

Our healthy russian recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for soup, teriyaki, bun etc. Now that you've our russian food recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: NoFoodPain: Food intolerance allergy & sensitivity
description: Most people with food intolerance are sensitive to more than one chemical. This app helps people to figure out which food to remove from their diets and what to replace them with and exploring the most common foods available to reduce uncomfortable symptoms, noFoodPain App can easily keep track of your diet by adding food to your Allowed or Avoided food list. This app also helps people suffering from IBD or IBS to track their Diet. Please note this App is only a guide, We added Salicylates, Histamine, Amines, Gluten, Fructose, Sulfite, FODMAP, Sulfur, Purine, Lactose and Fructan Intolerance/Sensitivity, and Allergy. We are always trying to update our app as soon as possible with new data.

recentChanges: Fixed some bugs
comments: This is a very basic list without any sort functions and 3 stars might be generous. Needs more information, food varieties, the ability to sort by intolerance, and ability to eat level. I deleted it because it doesn't seem helpful enough. After adding all my foods it would be too confusing without a sort function.

This app is horrible. All of the information on the foods regarding Salicylates and histamines is incorrect! Anyone following a low amine or salicylates diet DO NOT USE IT. It also has way too many adds. I couldn't use it for less than a minute without another add coming on.
very usefull and easy to use

comments: I just learned I'm pre diabetic. I have never dieted or found most diets too complicated. This app is easy to use, easy to understand. Most important quick and delicious recipesüëç

First thing I noticed is this Diabetic Recipe App is not a Vegetarian App. Developers who call a Vegan App a Diabetic App are deceptive. This app has many recipes that you can actually enjoy while watching carbs, sugars and diet! It is the individual who is responsible for making sure they do the proper proportions and leave out what every they know they had enough of that day. I really do appreciate seeing recipes we can actually use!!!
Very informative and helpful for diabetics. Thank you for this most important app.

Recipes look good and particularly easy. No search option, the carbs and sugar are broken down per serving and how many servings but nothing about serving size. I an app to more efficient. Im already weighing everything and trying to read/follow recipe. If you could also use American terms and/or have American measurements would be helpful. (Not everyone know that an aubergine is an eggplant for example)
Really useful and informative app to help sorting your meals out.

recentChanges:
What's better than fantastic recipes, meal plans and fasting countdowns? Sharing them with others, of course! Help motivate your friends with our new sharing feature. One tap and you can share your favorite app content directly to your Facebook and Instagram Stories!

Still want more? How about an even easier way to create your own recipes. We‚Äôve simplified the process, eliminating the need for recipe instructions and making it faster and easier to add your own creations!
comments: Works great. Takes a bit of time to learn to navigate the app. Surprised at the number of vegan recipes available. Some food were incorrectly inputted so I sent a report and also updated what I have. I wish you could update the info yourself. Also, I wish there was more flexibility with the intermitten fasting time. Overall, happy and hopeful it will help me achieve my weight loss goal.

I've been using this app for quite a few years and it is pretty decent. However, I was quite disappointed that the search option for one's own foods was removed; now one has to scroll endlessly until they find the food they are looking for. Furthermore, I would suggest adding a meal prep feature where one inputs the nutrition details for what one eats, but then the actual calories and stuff is only added to the daily counter once it has been eaten(a check off system).

I really love how many options of food there are, I can always find the exact thing I've eaten on here and how much I had. The only thing I don't really like is the feature connecting the app with a step counter app like Google fit, it doesn't really seem to work properly and update my steps so I've started just adding them in manually. Aside from that it does all I need.

When you search food it doesn't have as many options as I would like, such as restaurants. It might have one calorie count for something and the one below it is completely different. It's hard to know what's right or wrong. You can add them in but I don't want to do that every time so I feel like I am guessing. I wish it would have things set as peice or amount. It reminds you frequently to log info and encourages you which I like, and has a lot of meal options. The meal calorie count is nice.

I'm using it to track my dietary supplements, it's pretty straight forward, and you can add your own foods (like your mom's recipe and stuff). I wish I could be more precise with the measurements (Adding Vitamin D in milligrams is pretty useless, for example) and that it accepted more nutrients (my supplement has a ton of vitamins and minerals, and it would be nice to track those. I wish I knew an app that could approximately the micronutrients content of my mom's recipe too...)

title: Wolt: Food delivery
description:
Wolt makes it incredibly easy to discover and order great food in your city. Whatever you‚Äôre in the mood for, we‚Äôll bring it to your door. Just pick a restaurant, choose a meal, swipe to order and let us do the rest!

No time for cooking? We‚Äôve all been there. That‚Äôs why we became the food delivery on the greatest local food and restaurant experiences. Whether it‚Äôs a gourmet burger, stone oven pizza, some spicy tacos, fresh sushi or some other delicious eats you‚Äôre currently craving, we‚Äôve got you covered with our 8900+ restaurant choices.

You‚Äôll be kept in the loop on the status of the order in real-time, with a minute-by-minute countdown. If staring at a clock isn‚Äôt your thing, don‚Äôt worry ‚Äì we'll also send you notifications so you know when your order from the restaurant is about to arrive.

We don‚Äôt like to brag, but we take customer support seriously, with a team of wonderful people in every one of the 22+ countries we operate in. They are just a chat away and respond in seconds.

Getting your food should be as simple as possible. That‚Äôs why you can pay conveniently and securely with your credit card, Mobile Pay or Google Pay. Whatever works for you.

Wolt food delivery is currently available in 100+ cities located in Finland, Sweden, Norway, Denmark, Estonia, Latvia, Lithuania, Czech Republic, Hungary, Poland, Croatia, Serbia, Georgia, Israel, Greece, Cyprus, Malta, Slovakia, Slovenia, Azerbaijan, Kazakhstan, Japan and Germany and more are added all the time.

summary: Order food and drinks from the best restaurants and we'll bring it to you.
comments: completely restaurant focused app. The developers have developed this one in order to maximize their revenue from restaurants. you cannot search by using filters, you cannot narrow down your searches, it's always the same restaurants appears whether you select pizza or burgers, which means restaurants can choose whatever they want. if there were Alternatives I would definitely use alternatives.

Can't connect to card: 400 Bad request. Copied everything right. Email confirmed. Card was previously used for similar apps. (DinaCard) Dissapointment. Also strange design decision when you want to order two of the same thing. No filters!!! Probably problem with accounts and different phones. Looks nice for ~~2 minutes. I want my account deleted because the app doesn't let you delete your account.

Excellent restaurant choice plus order together function. I've discovered several really amazing places on wolt according to the rating system that I'd never visit just while being in the city. As well there's a nice order together function when all your friends can take what do they want on their own devices, when all are ready the order is submitted to the restaurant and delivered together. And the app just looks nice, bright and simple.

Updating my original review to 5 stars. I had an issue at first with the app not accepting any payment cards. Submitted a ticket to customer service and they responded very quickly with steps to fix this. App works great now. Good UI, fast delivery, and solid customer service.

The Wolt app is great, it is my favorite one for ordering food. It has a large portfolio of restaurants available and the app has all the functionalities you need. Also, it looks nice. I have to mention the customer support because it is awesome, above all expectations. They solve everything very quickly and with care.

title: Recipes Videos for Celiacs
description:
In this application we bring you Recipes for celiacs through tutorial videos with which you can learn different recipes of gluten-free dishes, bread without wheat .....
Step by step you will learn recipes for celiac people.

In this free application you will find information for a celiac diet with easy to find ingredients with which you will make some menus suitable for the whole family, bread, pasta, fried, cookies, in a very simple way, because there are many dishes without using the wheat.

You can eat a large amount of gluten-free foods, you will also receive the advice of expert chefs in this matter of food for celiacs.

Receive orientation for a daily food without wheat, with natural products suitable for coeliacs that you can cook in your own home without worries.

The celiac should be fed following certain rules and knowing that food does not bring to the table.

That's why we bring you this free but very useful application, with a varied recipe book so that you can choose the best food recipe for that day.

Learn another formula for baking bread, healthy homemade recipes not only for coeliacs, because the ingredients for coeliacs can be taken by other people and this type of gluten-free food is much healthier.

Also with this application you can share your videos through social networks and messaging apps so you can help other people with this problem in the diet such as gluten.

If this application has been useful for you, your positive vote encourages us to continue creating more free apps.

Enjoy with our app of Cooking Recipes for Celiacs and create your own gluten-free foods.

title: Allset: Food Pickup & Takeout at Local Restaurants
description:
Order ahead for takeout or dine-in at restaurants and coffee shops in your area. Choose from your favorite local foods - salads, burgers, sushi, pizza, and more - and get it easy and fast. Enjoy exclusive restaurant deals, menu specials, and daily rewards.

EXPLORE LOCAL
From trending cuisines to healthy eats, see the best food spots around you and access them more quickly. Moreover, you can easily swipe between the map view and restaurant cards to check the business hours, pictures, menu, and more.

NO-CONTACT PICKUP
Order ahead and safely pick up your order in a dedicated area in-store without contacting others. Look for a special tag 'No-Contact Pickup' in-app to find participating restaurants near you.

CURBSIDE PICKUP
Now you can get your food without going inside the restaurant. The restaurant team member will bring your order out to you. Check out participating restaurants with a tag 'Curbside Pickup‚Äô and follow additional instructions if any.

ENHANCED FILTERING
Filters and dietary tags (vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, kosher, etc.) make it easy to find the food that‚Äôs right for you.

ORDER TRACKING
Now you can track your order from the second you send it to the moment it's ready. Plus, to keep the whole process more transparent, we'll send you status updates so you know when the restaurant starts preparing the order, with an accurate order ready time. You‚Äôll know exactly when to arrive for a quick pickup or dine-in, so you never wait for your order.

FAST REORDERING
Repeat your previous order to get your faves in just one tap. Previously ordered foods & drinks are now featured in a special section of the restaurant‚Äôs menu. Plus, you‚Äôll be able to repeat your recent orders right from the main screen.

HEALTHY AT YOUR FINGERTIPS
Our Healthy options and hand-curated menus make it easy to eat well every day without spending much time. Based on nutrition expert recommendations, we feature wellness-minded and high-quality meals like vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free and other healthy offerings.

ALLSET MENU SPECIALS
Enjoy affordable and delicious everyday eats from your favorite places on Allset. Find restaurants with a tag ‚ÄòSpecial Offer‚Äô to see all the tasty options for less near you.

IMPROVED MENUS
Allset allows you to find what you crave easy and fast with clear and on-point item descriptions and thoughtfully selected, highly customizable meal options and add-ons.

Allset always has the foods you‚Äôre looking for: salads, sandwiches, burgers, sushi, pizza, coffee, burritos, bowls, vegan, vegetarian, gluten-free, and more.

FREE FOR YOU & LOW FEES FOR PARTNERS
We offer our restaurant partners one of the lowest fees on the market, along with the commission free option. You can view the restaurant‚Äôs fee per each order at the checkout. Be sure that what you pay through Allset is going directly to restaurants.

The press writes:

"Allset nailed it." - Bloomberg

"Allset brings a bit of Uber in the restaurant [...] routine." - The Boston Globe

"Allset makes the meal a faster process, and also a more predictable one." - TechCrunch

"No more waiting for a table, food, and check." - Business Insider

Available in New York, Los Angeles, San Francisco Bay Area, Chicago, Houston, Boston, Seattle, Austin, San Jose, Las Vegas, Miami, Dallas, Philadelphia, San Antonio, Washington, D.C., and coming to more cities soon.

Instagram: http://instagram.com/allsetnow/

Blog: https://medium.com/the-allset-blog

Twitter: https://twitter.com/allsetUS 

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/allsetnow/

Need help or have suggestions? Let us know: support@allsetnow.com

title: Recetas ricas sin gluten y buscador
description:
Entre recetas, videos y m√°s recetas hemos estado indagando en el mundo de las APP, evoluci√≥n necesaria en el mundo de la tecnolog√≠a y un paso importante que quer√≠amos dar para mejorar el acceso de todo el celiaco, intolerante, al√©rgico o simplemente todo aquel que quiera desterrar de manera total o parcial el gluten de su dieta. 
Es una APP de creaci√≥n personal, sencilla, din√°mica, con la que tendremos en un solo clic y, de manera r√°pida, todas las recetas, que a d√≠a de hoy son m√°s de sesenta, que semana a semana aumentamos sin descanso y que todas tienen un com√∫n denominador, est√°n exentas de ese enemigo com√∫n, el gluten.
Sin publicidad, sin trucos, no te cuesta dinero, totalmente gratis; podr√≠amos adjetivarlo hasta la saciedad, pero lo √∫nico en lo que queremos que te centres es en vas a encontrar recetas de manera sencilla y √°gil sin tener siquiera suscribirte, sin tener que pagar, ¬°GRATIS! ¬°A qu√© esperas!
Encontraras, al abrir la aplicaci√≥n, cuatro apartados en forma de bot√≥n:
-	RECETAS; en este apartado se desplegar√°, al pulsarlo, todas las categor√≠as de recetas de nuestra web (Arroz, Pan, Pizza, Pasteler√≠a, Marisco, Pescado, Tapas‚Ä¶) al pulsar en una de ellas abrir√° nuestra web en la categor√≠a seleccionada y actualizada para que, de manera r√°pida, tengas esa receta que necesitas en ese momento en unos sencillos clics.
-	TRUCOS/INFO; en este apartado tienes todas las secciones que no tienen que ver con recetas de cocina (Trucos, Pol√≠tica de privacidad, Quienes somos y Webs amigas) un poco de lo que somos, para que nos conozcas un poco mejor, algo de pol√≠tica de privacidad, alg√∫n truco interesante y tienes algo de webs de gente amiga. Te sorprender√° que las web no son de cocina, pero as√≠ somos nosotros un poco impredecibles.
-	Tambi√©n encontraras una pesta√±a donde se concentran nuestras redes sociales. En Facebook, Twitter e Instagram podr√°s ponerte en contacto con nosotros, seguir nuestras publicaciones y pedirnos o comentarnos lo que se te ocurra. Tambi√©n puedes mandarnos tus recetas, prometemos publicarlas con el nombre o seud√≥nimo que quieras que aparezca en el pie y encabezado de la receta. En Youtube te podr√°s suscribir, o no, y ver todos los v√≠deos que subimos de nuestras recetas. Una forma mucho m√°s grafica de poder seguir nuestras publicaciones y comentarnos que te parecen.
-	Por √∫ltimo y para dar una guinda a esta App, tenemos el buscador. Este nos abrir√° el Google Maps para buscar en espa√±ol (sin gluten) o en ingl√©s (gluten free) los establecimientos m√°s cercanos a nuestra ubicaci√≥n que dispongan de alimentos sin gluten.
Esperamos que la instales, que nos comentes que te parece, en que crees que la pod√≠amos mejorar y que disfrutes de esta pasi√≥n por la alimentaci√≥n sin gluten que caracteriza a todos nuestros platos.

title: Gluten Free Desserts Recipes
description:
Welcome to the Gluten Free Dessert Recipes Application Volume 4!

This is the ultimate dessert recipe dictionary for Gluten-Free Holiday dishes. "Gluten-Free Dessert Recipes" is a Android mobile device application that contains many Gluten-Free Food Dessert Recipes for all Holiday occasions. At a touch of a finger, you can easily find holiday recipes by searching the Recipe List.

Data includes:

    -Recipe Picture
    -Recipe Ingredients
    -Recipe Directions

Search Features:

    -Search by Recipe Dessert Name
    -Search by Recipe Dessert Holiday
    -Search by Recipe Dessert Type

As a user friendly option, the "Gluten-Free Dessert Recipe" application provides image files. The image option is very useful in providing a visual that links to Recipe Dish. In addition, every dish has "Ingredients and Preparation Directions" for every Dish Listing.

The goal of "Gluten-Free Dessert Recipes" is to provide tasty dishes for low fat and healthy conscience individuals. This application is the perfect recipe cookbook for all Holiday occasions.

title: mobiCeliac [mini]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
This app is a handy and "lite" version of our mobiCeliac [XL] full featured app.

mobiCeliac [mini] is an app for your Android device allowing you to get information about gluten-free food resources in SPAIN:
- Gluten-free Food Directory (food and drink products)
- Coeliac-friendly Venues Guide (shops, restaurants and hotels)

The Gluten-free Food Directory contains 4,000+ products distributed or sold in SPAIN.
The Coeliac-frendly Venues Guide contains around 2,000 venues where gluten-free products and services are offered in SPAIN.

It helps people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases, to achieve a better quality of life.

title: Gluten-Free Living
description: Gluten-Free Living is the first and only magazine completely devoted to the gluten-free lifestyle. Gluten-Free Living provides comprehensive, in-depth coverage of health, food and lifestyle topics essential to anyone following the gluten-free diet. Expert journalists with years of experience living with and writing about the gluten-free diet, and backed by an advisory board of medical and dietary experts, give you accurate, useful information about reading labels, ingredients, shopping, new products, raising a gluten-free child, scientific research, dining out and traveling. Every issue also contains numerous recipes from gluten-free cookbook authors, as well as top chefs from around the country. Gluten-Free Living is recognized as the most reliable source of gluten-free news available. It's been called "the safety net" for the gluten-free community and lauded for using "a journalistic style that earns respect and trust" from those who have celiac disease, gluten intolerance or any other reason for being gluten free.

title: Celiac recipes to take care of your health
description:
We live in a society that is increasingly intolerant of certain foods.

This happens with celiacs, they are intolerant to wheat. It is an intolerance that can lead to something more serious that is why I bring this application, to raise awareness.

They are healthy recipes, homemade, gluten-free, suitable for celiacs. They are not just recipes of dishes to cook, you will also learn pastries for the whole family, without clear gluten.

Learn another formula for baking bread, healthy homemade recipes not only for coeliacs, because the ingredients for coeliacs can be taken by other people. Unfortunately, not the other way around.

Learn to make empanadas, pizzas, churros. Be one of those chefs who can make any dish.

Make homemade diets for coeliacs, with homemade ingredients without wheat, corn flour for baking, or rice for frying. They are ingredients of all kinds that we show you in this application, healthy and natural foods, free of wheat, to cook with friends or family. Homemade gluten-free breads, suitable for celiacs and non-celiacs.

In this application we show you the best pastry videos for celiacs, all diets, suitable for cooking anyone without being an expert cook. Homemade and easy videos, with healthy foods.

Prepare a good breakfast free. These recipes are available to you for all the diets of a celiac, without forgetting the pastry. Fried kitchen for the family, a perfect breakfast.

With this application you will receive detailed advice on diets with ingredients for celiacs and also for the whole family.

title: foodpanda - Local Food & Grocery Delivery
description:
foodpanda ‚Äì food and more, delivered
 
Craving something delicious from your favourite restaurant? Forgot to pick up the shopping on your way home? We deliver food and groceries in a flash ‚Äì whatever you‚Äôre after. It‚Äôs our mission to bring everything you want, need or crave right to your door, whether it‚Äôs a meal from your favourite local restaurant or same day grocery delivery and cleaning supplies.
 
download the app to check if we're in your city
 
Our app is crammed with the greatest food experiences in the world. Hungry for wood-fired pizza, a classic burger or super fresh sushi? We know the best food for every cuisine that your city has to offer. foodpanda is the best food delivery service in your city ‚Äì so take the first bite and download now!

Plus there‚Äôs more to foodpanda than restaurants. Missing milk? Batteries? Detergent? Order from thousands of products with shops on foodpanda. It's online grocery delivery without the wait. Choose your favourite shops for everything from groceries to drinks to health to pharmaceuticals and even electronics.
 
how it works
 
First, enter your address (home/office/treehouse). Then, choose your favourite restaurant or shop and place an order. They prepare your items and, once they‚Äôre ready, our courier brings them to you. If you need something to watch, you can track your rider in real-time. Just sit back and enjoy.
 
what makes us special
 
Whether you‚Äôre looking for the biggest brands or your favourite local restaurant or shop, foodpanda works with the best spots near you. Pizza or sushi? Groceries or gifts? Whatever you‚Äôre after, our rider will be at your doorstep with a smile, while you save time to do something else you love. 
 
talk to us
 
If you‚Äôve ordered with us before, we want to know what you think. Give us your food thoughts/confessionals at support@foodpanda.com

Enjoy!
comments: Please improve the payment process. 100 out of 100 times after my credit card payment it shows blank screen, when I click back it tells me payment failed but it actually done. The order is still in my cart, this is very misleading. After my 1st and 2nd orders I learnt about this, so it's fine for me, but to new users this is very annoying. Anyway, this app provide good service and I appreciate it.

I have ordered many times via this app. It will work...IF YOU CAN GET IT TO WORK. Like today, I tried 7 or 8 times trying to PAY but I just couldn't pay. I am paying by credit card. I got to the screen and got the OTP and then I entered the OTP and then.... NOTHING. Waited for so long until the system tells me "TIME OUT". Seven or eight times trying. Giving up for today. Maybe try again tomorrow or maybe not at all. One more thing. If I somehow do receive the 8 orders, I will uninstall the app

The app is good, but it needs more adjustments, like the "add to cart" button and the "place order" button. I think it would be better if both buttons is in different position, because what if that customer of yours has accidentally double clicking the "add to cart" button, simply it will directly to "place order" button. and it doesn't have cancellation of order, you must add "cancel" button. And it would be nice if you add this app "checking order" before the order place it. Please notice.

This app definitely need to improve. I am regular user. The rider and food list all has no bad experience. HOWEVER! I most frustrated is to find LIVE support help. When I need urgent help I cannot find anything. FAQ no answer. When click "not answered" it goes bacK HELP CENTER. It goes merry go round. I spent close to 1 hour and yet I cannot find. So I gave up. I have clicked on all available function. WHERE IS YOUR LIVE CHAT OR TEL CONTACTS!!!!

Its great to order on cash on delivery but the ordering system needs more inproving and the gps as well. I constantly refresh just to see where my delivery guy is at. It's not a real time tracking monitor. And for ordering wanna get to see the pictures of the menu not just the words. Like i wanna see what i'm buying. But over all food panda is a good app.

title: RP Diet Coach
description:
Get in the best shape of your life by planning what you eat with a diet coach in your pocket. Designed by top PhDs and Registered Dietitians to transform your body, the RP Diet Coach will help you look and perform your best. 
 
What You Get:

 ‚Ä¢ Personalized macro breakdowns based on your body and fitness goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal timing recommendations that will help you maximize results, decrease hunger, and maintain muscle. 
 ‚Ä¢ Diet filters including Dairy-Free, Vegetarian, Vegan, Paleo, Gluten-Free, Grain-Free, and Low FODMAP.
 ‚Ä¢ Smart scheduling accommodates all schedules - including night shift and intermittent fasting.
 ‚Ä¢ Meal prep made easy with our automatic shopping list made from your food choices.
 ‚Ä¢ Weekly diet review - recommends changes to your diet based on your progress and goals.
 ‚Ä¢ Food database of over 750,000 foods and constantly growing.
 ‚Ä¢ Barcode scanner and restaurant search - mostly US, but more international foods coming soon!
 
How It Works:

 ‚Ä¢ Enter your info and choose your fitness goal: lose fat, gain muscle, or maintain your weight.
 ‚Ä¢ You choose your foods - the app tells you how much and when to eat.
 ‚Ä¢ Every week, review your progress and the app will recommend an updated plan for the next week.
 ‚Ä¢ Get results!
 
 
With thousands of 5-star reviews (world-wide) and a free 14-day trial, now's the time to get on the right path to finally reach your health and fitness goals!
 
Who We Are:

RP is a group of leading sport scientists, dietitians, and coaches with a proven track record of amazing results with hundreds of thousands of members across the world, including countless pounds lost. After years of diet and nutrition coaching, we've used the data and results from this to create the cutting-edge algorithm that powers the RP Diet Coach App.
  
If you purchase a RP Diet Coach subscription, please note billing and charges are done through your Google Play account and auto-renewed based on your subscription term. At the end of the term, unless auto-renewable subscriptions are disabled, your subscription will automatically renew in your Google Play account. You will be charged for the regular price of your subscription within 24 hours prior to the end of the current term. Your subscription can be managed or cancelled in your Google Play Account Settings.

Privacy Policy:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/privacy-policy

Terms of Service:
https://renaissanceperiodization.com/rp-diet-app/terms-of-use

comments: It's a great program that provides results even if you don't have 100% adherence! (Though much better results if you do, of course). The update that just came out in Oct. 2020 has caused some growing pains as new features are integrated and kinks are ironed out, but the dev team seems to be working hard to fix issues asap. I see no reason for the hissy fits some people are throwing about slight delays in waiting for the app stores to approve the updates. Very glad I got this app!

I loved the old version but the new version I just downloaded on the 10/22/20 is very confusing. For example it says I go to bed at 2100 and wake up to eat at 2330? I am having a really hard time with this.
App has again been updated and is working as it should.

So I'm paying $15 / month for a diet app that won't let me start a fat loss diet. Their support desks solution was wait for the update after next! Thanks for being patient! Translation: you're a sucker
Please add mini cut cycle. Also the day is starting from midnight and the last meal is carrying over to the next day. That's kind of weird.

title: Fasting App - Fasting Tracker & Intermittent Fast
description:
Fasting Tracker will guide you to a new lifestyle with healthy habits. You‚Äôll lose weight effectively and feel more active! No diet and no yo-yo effect.

IS IT EFFECTIVE?
It‚Äôs proven that intermittent fasting leads to fast weight loss. During fasting, as your glycogen depletes, your body switches to ketosis, which is referred to as the body's "fat-burning" mode. This is an effective way to burn fat.

IS IT SAFE?
Yes. It‚Äôs the most natural and safe way to lose weight. Studies show that eating all the time makes your body unable to take a break from digesting, which can result in health problems, such as diabetes. When you fast, you just take a break from eating, it takes some of the load off your liver.

CAN I USE FASTING TRACKER?
With various fasting plans, fasting tracker is suitable for beginner and experienced, men and women. It guides you through your plan. No need to change your diet, you can easily stick to it. If you are under 18 years old, pregnant or breastfeeding, have health issues or are underweight, please ask your doctor for advice before fasting.

WHY INTERMITTENT FASTING?
‚àö Burn your body fat reserves
‚àö Start the process of regeneration and detox during fasting
‚àö Slow down the aging process
‚àö Benefit for controlling blood sugar
‚àö Reduce inflammation
‚àö Prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases and diabetes
‚àö Boost your growth hormone and increase metabolism
‚àö Make you feel healthier and more active
‚àö Improve your body and brain function
‚àö The most natural way to lose weight and keep fit
‚àö Lose weight without diet and exercise

FEATURES OF FASTING TRACKER
‚àö Various intermittent fasting plans
‚àö For both beginner and experienced
‚àö One tap to start/end
‚àö Customize fasting plan
‚àö Adjust fasting/eating period
‚àö Set notifications for fasting
‚àö Smart fasting tracker
‚àö Fasting timer
‚àö Track your weight
‚àö Check fasting status
‚àö Science-based tips and articles about fasting
‚àö No need to count calories intake
‚àö Losing weight has become so easy
‚àö Sync data with Google Fit

SCIENTIFICALLY PROVEN INTERMITTENT FASTING

Effectively Lose Weight
Your body switches into fat burning mode. You‚Äôll burn body fat reserves and prevent food you eat from being stored as fat.

Natural and Healthy
When fasting, your body will actively burn fat, get into detox mode and start the process of regeneration.

Detox
Your body reduces inflammation. Cells break down viruses, bacteria and damaged components.

Prevent Diseases
Studies show that fasting can prevent numerous diseases, such as heart diseases, diabetes and cancer.

Cell Repair and Regenerate
Cells remove unnecessary or dysfunctional components. Damaged cells will be replaced with stronger ones.

Against Aging
Your body initiates autophagy, a process of detoxification, repair and regeneration. This has benefits against aging.

Control Blood Sugar
Fasting helps you become more sensitive to insulin. It‚Äôs beneficial for controlling blood sugar.

Increase Metabolism
During fasting, your growth hormone goes up, and your metabolism will be increased.

recentChanges: ‚Ä¢ Bug fixed
comments: Been using it for a little over a month or so. I have such difficulty sticking with fasting, but this app has really helped keep me accountable, plus it's simple and there's not a ton of ads or "extra features" in your face. The overlay timer is a great constant reminder, and I like the water reminders. Only improvement I'd want is an option for the timer to be counting down and not up.

Just started using this app yesterday, but I really like it so far! Best feature I've found is that you can totally customize the amount of water you're drinking. There are so many different sizes nowadays that the ability to adjust the number of ounces makes a big difference. I also love that it tells you what's happening at each stage of fasting throughout the day!

This was the second fasting app I installed, and the one I've stuck with. It's convenient, easy to track, and has most of the features I'm looking for. Previously I gave 5 stars because it seemed to be missing actual start and stop times in the history. But the feature is there, I just missed it. User interface could be improved to make that more obvious. It's a great app and works offline too. This is likely the fasting tracker I will stick with.

I really like the app, it's exactly what I was looking for. It says pay 2.99 for ad removal, but honestly I haven't experienced any ads, besides a very rare one up top. My only complaint would be the subscription, I would pay for it if it was a one time purchase, but I'm not interested in getting a subscription to an app, sorry! 5 stars anyway because the free material does it's job.

I like this app and I appreciate it. Just I have paid $2.99 for ads-removed from the app but the app still shows the ads and ask me to pay again for removing Ads!! I have already sent an email to the developer but I didn't get the response! I'm waiting for your reply as soon as possible. I appreciate your help and support. (UPDATE) I solved this issue by reinstalling the app. Thank you.

title: Cook It Allergy Free & Dealing with Food Allergies
description:
The key to allergy-free cooking is to substitute and separate. With these steps, everyone can enjoy meals and stay safe from an allergic reaction.

Planning meals around food allergens, whether for you or your child, doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated and stressful. All it takes is certain kitchen organization tactics and some simple food swaps.

Any food could provoke an allergic reaction, says Matthew Greenhawt, MD, an allergist at the University of Michigan Allergy Clinic and an assistant professor at the division of allergy and immunology with the University of Michigan Health Center in Ann Arbor. But he says eight foods account for 90 percent of food allergies: milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

It‚Äôs rare, but some people, especially children and young adults, can have a severe, life-threatening allergic reaction (anaphylaxis) if they come in contact with these foods. So you want to keep them not only out of dishes you prepare, but also away from ‚Äúsafe‚Äù foods to avoid cross-contamination.

Packing a lunch Free-From the top food allergens is easy with Enjoy Life Foods. All Enjoy Life products are free from wheat, gluten, dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, egg, soy, fish and shellfish, so pack school lunches with confidence.

Give your child their lunchtime favorites knowing each snack and treat from Enjoy Life Foods is allergy-friendly, gluten-free, non-GMO and contains no artificial ingredients. Each product is made at a special, allergy-free facility, so you can nosh without worry. Those living with celiac disease, a gluten intolerance or even a sensitivity can snack away too. All Enjoy Life Foods are gluten and wheat free. And that‚Äôs not all! Products never contain genetically modified organism (GMO) ingredients. With Enjoy Life you can expect delicious natural ingredients, with no artificial anything. So go ahead and eat freely!

The Food Allergens app aims to assist people living with food allergies, which are:
How to Live With a Soy Allergy
How to Get Tested for Food Allergies

How to Treat Allergies
How to Live With Food Allergies
How to Recognize Peanut Allergies
How to Live With Allergies to Corn
How to Cope with a Milk Allergy
How to Live With an Allergy to Seafood

Food allergies are a defensive response by your immune system to a specific food protein that you may eat. Food allergies are relatively uncommon, affecting 6 ‚Äì 8% of children and up to 3% of adults, and they can have symptoms that range from mild to life-threatening.But by eliminating trigger foods and caring for your overall well-being, you can successfully deal with your food allergies.
Food allergies can be minor or they can be a major health risk ‚Äî even deadly. They can cause hives, constipation, diarrhea, bloating, anaphylaxis (closing of throat), or rash. When testing for food allergies, it is important you do not try to diagnose it on your own.

It has a list of all the common allergens, where they are found, foods to avoid, alternatives and baking ingredient replacements.

descriptionHTML:
The key to allergy-free cooking is to substitute and separate. With these steps, everyone can enjoy meals and stay safe from an allergic reaction.

Planning meals around food allergens, whether for you or your child, doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated and stressful. All it takes is certain kitchen organization tactics and some simple food swaps.

Any food could provoke an allergic reaction, says Matthew Greenhawt, MD, an allergist at the University of Michigan Allergy Clinic and an assistant professor at the division of allergy and immunology with the University of Michigan Health Center in Ann Arbor. But he says eight foods account for 90 percent of food allergies: milk, eggs, fish, shellfish, tree nuts, peanuts, wheat, and soy.

It‚Äôs rare, but some people, especially children and young adults, can have a severe, life-threatening allergic reaction (anaphylaxis) if they come in contact with these foods. So you want to keep them not only out of dishes you prepare, but also away from ‚Äúsafe‚Äù foods to avoid cross-contamination.

Packing a lunch Free-From the top food allergens is easy with Enjoy Life Foods. All Enjoy Life products are free from wheat, gluten, dairy, peanuts, tree nuts, egg, soy, fish and shellfish, so pack school lunches with confidence.

Give your child their lunchtime favorites knowing each snack and treat from Enjoy Life Foods is allergy-friendly, gluten-free, non-GMO and contains no artificial ingredients. Each product is made at a special, allergy-free facility, so you can nosh without worry. Those living with celiac disease, a gluten intolerance or even a sensitivity can snack away too. All Enjoy Life Foods are gluten and wheat free. And that‚Äôs not all! Products never contain genetically modified organism (GMO) ingredients. title: Food Fix Up
description:
Food Fix Up is a gluten, dairy and refined-sugar free food app to help you enjoy appetising and nutritious meals throughout the day. It‚Äôs focused on a mostly plant-based diet with high quality animal protein and absolutely no nasties.

Want to eliminate processed foods and enjoy the benefits of healthy eating? This app makes it simple with so many amazingly tasty recipes. You won‚Äôt believe just how enjoyable healthy eating can be. There are so many benefits to eating this way: improved digestion and immune function; clearer skin, brighter eyes; weight loss; balanced hormones and a lovely sense of wellbeing. There‚Äôs no agenda, no ‚Äòyou must do this‚Äô or ‚Äòyou can‚Äôt do that‚Äô: just great tasting recipes to help you achieve a balanced diet.

Elevate your eating habits today ‚Äì your body and your taste buds will thank you.

Features
‚Ä¢186 delicious recipes including lots of raw, vegan, vegetarian and paleo.
‚Ä¢Useful condiment recipes ‚Äì healthy alternatives to processed products.
‚Ä¢Recipes tailored to help you make the best use of your newly made condiments. 
‚Ä¢Shopping list function.
‚Ä¢Save your favourite recipes.
‚Ä¢Search function, great tool when you have ingredients but are unsure what to cook. 
‚Ä¢All recipes 100% free of gluten, refined sugar and dairy.
‚Ä¢All recipes include cooking / prep time, serving size and easy to follow instructions. 
‚Ä¢Tips on food for overall wellness.
‚Ä¢Share recipes via social media.
‚Ä¢Conversion tool - switch between metric & imperial.
‚Ä¢New recipes added each month.

If you require technical support or would like to contact us directly, please send us an email on info@foodfixup.com
