title: Fivesec Health: Vegan recipes for plant based diet
description:
Over 300 easy & healthy vegan recipes, meal plans, recipe videos, shopping list and more. Only whole food plant based recipes Alexandra (@fivesechealth) herself eats on a daily basis.

Do you want to eat more plants in your everyday life? Every week we add new recipes to keep you inspired. All recipes are 100% vegan and beginner friendly with common ingredients. We believe vegan cooking should be easy and delicious that‚Äôs why we started the Fivesec Health app - the vegan app for everyday cooking. You can see it as a growing cookbook.

Get access to all the content with our 7-day free trial!

About the recipes:
All recipes in this app are as whole food plant based as possible with minimal processed foods, but still super tasty. You will find lots of dinner ideas, breakfast ideas, lunches, snacks, treats and side dishes. If you have allergies you can easily filter for gluten-free, nut-free, oil-free and soy-free to find recipes that fit your preferences.

Fivesec Health features:
‚Ä¢ Meal Plans - Do you want extra guidance? We have developed meal plans based on different goals. You don‚Äôt have to think, just follow the instructions. Sounds awesome right? If you are new to vegan cooking, this is the perfect way to start
‚Ä¢ Shopping List - Our focus is to make it as easy as possible to eat more plants. Therefore we have developed a super handy shopping list that makes it possible to add ingredients from an entire recipe. All the ingredients from the recipes are structured in a way so that you easily can sort them by sections in the grocery store. You can also add your own items.
‚Ä¢ Plant-Based Nutrients - We want you to feel confident in your food choices therefore we have provided a learn section where you can read about all the essential nutrients and in which foods you can find them. All information is evidenced based and provided by a nutritionist.
‚Ä¢ Macros & calories - All recipes are carefully composed and you can see the micronutrients in a recipe and the calories based per serving.
‚Ä¢ Favorites - Save your favorite recipes so that you can cook them over and over again.
‚Ä¢ Cup to DL - You can convert the unit Cup to DL 

Fivesec Health Premium:
With premium membership you get access to all recipes, meal plans and features in the app. We also add new recipes to the app every week to keep you inspired with new content. You can see it as a growing cookbook.

SUBSCRIPTIONS & TERMS
Fivesec Health is free to download. Premium memberships are available on a monthly or yearly basis. New members are eligible for a 7-day free trial. Yearly subscriptions are billed the total annual fee from purchase date. Monthly subscription users are billed per month.
Payment will be charged to your credit card through your Google Play account at confirmation of purchase. Subscription renews automatically unless cancelled at least 24 hours prior to the end of the subscription period. Read our full Terms of Service and our Privacy Policy at https://fivesechealth.com/terms and https://fivesechealth.com/privacy

title: Strongr Fastr Workout, Meal and Diet Planner
description:
Strongr Fastr tells you what to eat and what workouts to do in order to meet your fitness goals- including lose fat and build muscle / tone as well as weight loss, bulking, or maintaining your weight.

It gives you a healthy meal plan and matches you with a workout routine. The meal plan meets your macros, ensures you get the right amount of protein and calories and is fully customizable- swap any meal out for another one- Strongr Fastr makes sure the replacement is healthy and meets your macros too. You get simple recipes and a simple grocery list to make shopping and meal prep easy. 

The exercise routines fit your schedule, goals, and equipment and can be weighted or bodyweight and can include cardio. Pre-loaded routines include Greyskull LP, 531 BBB, 531 Triumvirate, 531 Building the Monolith, GZCLP and GZCL Method, Texas Method, Madcow 5x5, PHAT routine, PHUL routine, Lyle McDonald's Generic Bulking Routine, PPL routines, all of which are proven bodybuilding or powerlifting routines. 

Why Strongr Fastr?

Our meal plans are clean, realistic and flexible and the nutrition targets are based on the core tenets of flexible dieting and bodybuilding nutrition- making sure they have the right amount of calories in protein. Our healthy recipes are tasty but simple and don‚Äôt require a bunch of strange, expensive health-food, making it easy for you to stick on plan. Clean eating has never been easier. The routines have all been used by millions to help build muscle and burn fat. Strongr Fastr is your mobile personal trainer that takes out all the work and research of creating your own exercise program and meal plan that‚Äôs tailored to your goals. It helps you get fit, build muscle, increase strength, and lose weight - faster.

Meal Planner-

‚Ä¢ Healthy meal plans built around your macronutrient targets- it determines the targets for you or you can input your own
‚Ä¢ Database of hundreds of easy, quick, healthy, clean recipes 
‚Ä¢  Add your own recipes 
‚Ä¢ Fully customizable- swap out any meal to another that meets your macros (IIFYM- if it fits your macros)
‚Ä¢ Personalized by your grocery budget
‚Ä¢ Includes organized shopping list
‚Ä¢ Supports group meal planning
‚Ä¢ Automatically adjusts your nutrition targets over time
‚Ä¢ Supports standard, vegetarian, vegan, keto, low carb, paleo diets and dietary restrictions including dairy, lactose, eggs, peanuts, tree nuts, soy, gluten, fish, and shellfish

Exercise Routines:

‚Ä¢ Get matched with a workout program that meets your schedule, goals, and equipment needs
‚Ä¢ Choose from any of the preloaded routines including: Greyskull LP, 531 BBB, 531 Triumvirate, 531 Building the Monolith, GZCLP and GZCL Method, Texas Method, Madcow 5x5, PHAT routine, PHUL routine, Lyle McDonald's Generic Bulking Routine, and PPL routines
‚Ä¢ Ability to incorporate cardio
‚Ä¢ Video instructions show proper form
‚Ä¢ Progressive training plans combine fat burning & muscle building
‚Ä¢ Automated progression- ensures that you keep progressing

See Your Progress Overtime:

‚Ä¢ Progress charts of weight loss/gain
‚Ä¢ Progress charts for individual exercises and volume

Advanced Features:

‚Ä¢ Edit workout routines, including the ability to add periodization with multiple training cycles, automatic progression of exercises, or autoregulated progression of exercises
‚Ä¢ Input your own nutrition targets (calories, protein, carbohydrates, fiber)

Workout routines and macro recommendations are free. Upgrade to premium for the meal planning functionality- includes a free trial.

Support: philip@strongrfastr.com
Business Inquiries: mary@strongrfastr.com
Website: https://www.strongrfastr.com/

Any problems or feature suggestions? Let us know! We‚Äôre good listeners.

FB: StrongrFastr
IG: StrongrFastr
Twitter: @StrongrFastrApp

comments: Great app! Was super impressed when I reached out and had several emails back and forth. This app was perfect for me because it took all the mental work out of getting healthy. Deciding on a workout routine was intimidating. Eating healthy even more so. Even if I wasn't pairing with a workout, deciding what to eat has always been difficult for me and often resulted in a lot of food waste. Not anymore! I am learning how to cook so much and my diet is tastier than ever actually!

Awesome. This app has everything I need. I can track my weight, meal plan, schedule workouts...and it has stats galore. There is lots of flexibility in the setup, so I can schedule a cheat day each week into my plan. There are plenty of recipes to use, and if you go off-plan you can add things manually. There are loads of features. It's exactly what I was looking for.

App is pretty good, has a lot of features and if you're willing to pay it offers a lot more. I highly recommend his, but 2 stars for the following reasons: the weight doesn't increase weekly by default (at least on the PHAT routine), and it doesn't have T bar or Hex bar as options when substituting for others. Add t bar and hex bar and I'll increase my rating Edit: dev responded and made clarity to all my issues. Highly recommend it

Great structure! I love how much I can customize! There are a variety of options for popular workout routines. Within that I can select my rest days, and choose from a huge database of movements based on my equipment available. By following the routine it is helpful in selection of weight and keeping me on task with appropriate rest time between sets. I want to explore the nutrition/meal component more. It is so cool to have everything in one place. Thank you!

This has been exactly what I've been looking for. The ability to pick from a variety of workout plans, set different goals, meal planner, and the grocery list all in one has been easy to use and makes everything easier and faster for me. A couple things: the food search gets glitchy and there's a delay, and maybe the addition of vegan or no-dairy diet restrictions. Also, am I able to update the days I can work out and the length of time, mid week/routine? Love this app!

description:

With PEEL SCAN, you can scan the ingredients list on any FOOD LABEL, RESTAURANT MENU, or RECIPE and get an instant answer: "Avoid" or "Safe" based on your food intolerances (e.g. Gluten, Dairy, Yeast, Fructose, etc.), your dietary considerations (e.g. No Added Sugars, No Artificial Sweeteners, No Harsh Food Colorings, etc.), or a popular diet you follow (e.g. Vegan, Vegetarian, Paleo, Palm Oil Free, etc.).

summary: Ingredient scanner for food labels and menus based on your diet or intolerance
comments: Great experience with the app so far! It's extremely comprehensive and really opens up options for those of us who don't always have the time to cook meals from scratch. Being able to use the app to quickly look up all ingredients without missing anything is awesome. I for one don't have every single ingredient ever made out of animal products memorized as they can be unrecognizable words, so this app is immensely helpful!
This app is a game changer, it completely changed my approach to buying food and searching for ingredients to know if they fit my gluten intolerance. Thank you Peel
Amazing app! Super helpful! Thank you Peelüíúüíúüíú
Been waiting over a year for this app to come to Android from iOS. Thanks for finally making it happen!

I'm celiac and I hate eating/shopping for GF foods. Its so stressful/horrible!!! This app just turned the tides on this feeling I've had my ENTIRE LIFE. Thank you to my Reddit person ramihallal!!!!! You kept me in the loop about this app and when it was ready for andriod!!!!!!ü§éü§éü§éü§éü§éü§é THANK YOU!!!!

title: Snap Kitchen: meal delivery
description:
Eat well, cook never. With Snap Kitchen, get healthy, ready-to-eat meals delivered to your door. Made fresh daily and never frozen, we‚Äôre committed to delicious chef-prepared, dietitian-curated meal plans that Ô¨Çex to help you reach your ever-changing goals while satisfying your cravings.

NUTRITIOUS FOOD, HIGH STANDARDS.
You crave a balance of colorful veggies, high quality proteins & healthy fats. Our chefs & registered dietitians work tirelessly to curate delicious meals with thoughtfully-sourced ingredients so you can have it all.

YOUR LIFESTYLE, YOUR WAY.
Whether you‚Äôre whole30, vegetarian, paleo, low-carb, or anything in between, we have a meal plan that suits your lifestyle.

CONVENIENCE & FLEXIBILITY, MADE FRESH DAILY.
Desk lunch, school snacks, anywhere meals. All of our items are made fresh by a team of expert chefs, so you can stop chopping, cooking, and cleaning. 

COUNTING CALORIES OR MACROS.
Let us solve your nutrition and cravings with more than 50+ options, including meals, snacks and juices that are entirely gluten-free, antibiotic-free, artificial-preservative free, and more.

 - No more meal prepping. Set your nutrition on auto with our meal plan.
 - Get nutrition facts and key ingredients for every item.
 - Dietary lifestyles accommodated for keto-friendly, high protein, low carb, Whole30, paleo, vegan, vegetarian, pescatarian, or build-your-own; and it's all gluten free!
 - Track your SnapFunds rewards, and refer your friends.
 - Tag your favorite meals.
 - Rate your meals to help us innovate and improve our menu selection.
 - Receive alerts for new items, SnapFunds rewards, and order status.

Need help or want to contact us for more info? Please visit https://help.snapkitchen.com

recentChanges:
We have made some design updates.
Bug fixes.
comments: Quick and convenient way to get your meals for the week. Eating healthy and efficient has never been better.
Amazing app that makes managing meal plans a Snap. Each dish described in remarkable detail.
Delish Food! Easy app experience. My only recommendation would be to add more Paleo lunch/dinner meals.
Love the food, the app is okay. The app crashes on me while choosing meals at times.
Food is good, app has been greatly improved.

recentChanges:
- New restaurant! Try to cook cocktails in Tropic Bar

comments: The game is fun but 120 rubies to add more time on the level that you're on and maybe only one away from going on to the next level. If you only have 20 rubies now you have to buy more my grandchildren don't have enough allowance to spend on buying more rubies come on guys think about that because now they need an adult to spend a lot of money on a game.

The statement " We create levels different in complexity to make the game more interesting and exciting. All levels are tested manually and possible to pass. Boosters and other extra materials of the game you can get in daily gift or buy in store." is BS! Who is testing these games? The time levels especially the ice cream levels takes so many tries to beat. The time shouldn't start until the people order shows. The coins should be used for boosters or gems. Addictive but NOT WORTH IT!

This started off very well. But then it was frustrating as the booster were impossible to get and the upgrades were way to expensive. I just wanted to play a game where you do not have to pay to get stuff. This is just not right.

Levels are hard to pass without boosts or added time too soon...they want you to spend money ... just like most of these free cooking games. I enjoy the game and the graphics but I don't enjoy it enough to spend money on it.... time to find a new game again.

This game is insane. I make the food and it wont let me click it to serve it to the customer. Im on level 250 or something. And this just started. Its very frustrating. Very disappointed because i enjoyed this game. Ige checked for updates and have even deleted and re downloaded the game. Still wont work properly.

title: Yelp: Find Food, Delivery & Services Nearby
description:
Yelp has over 199 million business and restaurant reviews worldwide. Whether you‚Äôre looking for a new pizzeria, a great coffee shop nearby, a new salon, or the best handyman in town, Yelp is the city and travel guide to finding the perfect places to eat, shop, drink, relax, visit and play.

Read online reviews, browse photos and menus, order takeout from favorite spots, make reservations, see hours, locations, and other important information for any business you‚Äôre looking for. 

Yelp puts great local businesses right at your fingertips. Discover new foods, hot spots, places for shopping and local businesses near me! While traveling or at home. Plus, order delivery or pickup. 

Yelp features: 
üçï Local Eats: Find Restaurants and Food Delivery Near Me  üçï
‚Ä¢ Find where to eat. Yelp shows all the newest, hottest and top rated places to eat and bars to drink nearby 
‚Ä¢ Dine at local restaurants for breakfast, lunch and dinner, or get something to go
‚Ä¢ Order timely food delivery
‚Ä¢ Make quick reservations, book a table, order pickup or food delivery, view restaurant menus‚Äîall from your phone
‚Ä¢ Read restaurant reviews from other Yelp users and scroll through photos to help you decide where to go
‚Ä¢ Get amazing food deals for dining and delivery places nearby, plan dinner reservations for trips in advance

‚úçÔ∏è Review, Discover, and Add Photos üì∏
‚Ä¢ Discover local events, businesses and services like body shops and hair salons
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers for businesses near me
‚Ä¢ Read and write reviews, check-in to local businesses, upload photos and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Browse photo galleries and add photos to share experiences
‚Ä¢ Redeem great check-in offers in the area or sign up for cash back

üöó Find Shops Around Me, Get Quotes, and Hire Professionals üõ†
‚Ä¢ Find the coolest stores and top rated body shops complete with customer reviews and contact info 
‚Ä¢ Hire local professionals for home renovation, car repair, car transport, landscaping, moving, and other hiring services
‚Ä¢ Get quotes from professionals, message contractors nearby, and book appointments with a click
‚Ä¢ Read millions of user reviews and recommendations by the Yelp community
‚Ä¢ Filter searches by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, location, and hours of operation 

üíÖ Beauty - Pamper Yourself üíá
‚Ä¢ Find highly-rated salons, spas, massage therapists, acupuncturists, and offers around me 
‚Ä¢ Book appointments through Yelp at the most relaxing staycation destinations or find deals when traveling

üîç Search Filters üîç
‚Ä¢ Filter search results by neighborhood, distance, rating, price, open now, and other specifics like good for groups, full bar, cuisine type etc.
‚Ä¢ Look up addresses and phone numbers, call a business, order food delivery and make quick reservations directly from the Yelp app
‚Ä¢ Find the top rated food, hotels or hiring services nearby or in cities like New York, Chicago, San Francisco, Los Angeles, Houston, Phoenix, Philadelphia

üç© Features üé®
‚Ä¢ Read millions of expert user reviews and browse through beautiful photos of each business
‚Ä¢ Write and read online reviews, check-in to local businesses, order pickup or delivery, upload photos, book appointments, find a new activity, and add tips for other Yelp users
‚Ä¢ Use Yelp as a travel guide and as a food guide for eating, drink, things to do, to see, to shop and relax

Need Help? Contact Yelp at https://www.yelp-support.com/?l=en_US 
Note: Continued use of GPS running can dramatically decrease battery life.

Find top local restaurants, bars, hotels, events and other things to do around me, read customer reviews, order pickup or delivery, and search for services near me, all from the Yelp app.

summary: Discover which restaurants are now open for reservations, takeout, or delivery!
recentChanges:
Sometimes your gutters get clogged, your chimney needs sweeping, and your trees get so overgrown the branches start scraping your bedroom window like the opening scene of a Halloween movie. Fortunately, this update can help with all that and more.

Search Yelp to find the right pro for all that work you need done around the house. We'll help match you with local contractors and make it easy to book a consultation with just a few clicks.

And other minor bug fixes and improvements too, of course.
comments: After the app updates on 10/29/20 a new review I posted indicated "save review as draft" when i chose "post review". Then it wouldn't allow me to update or post the draft. I exited and re-entered the app to find the review already posted. The notifications I received were incorrect. I've also attempted three times to update my profile pic for Halloween, and that's having issues. (Android user, yes I rebooted several times after yesterday's updates)

Yelp just cost me $75 in overages on my data plan because it's CONSTANTLY running in the background! It sucked 5.5 GB in one day! Apparently my phone settings were reset during an update, but this should NEVER have happened! Why do you need that much data from me?!
This app used 5 gb of my data from the background. I haven't even opened the app over a month but it's running in the background for some reason and takes up a lot of your data.

Uninstalled. I don't feel I have a use for your service anymore because of the recent unnecessary expansion of your business to implement a system of extrajudicial shaming/punishment, based solely on likely false or dubious accusations & without any semblance of due process, thru the awarding of special badges to businesses you feel are run or owned by those that you alone declare as undesirables. Try to not be too obvious with this badge however by making it a yellow star, pink triangle, etc.

Yelp has gotten worse then GOOGLE search when it comes to searching for the nearest business you search for. Your looking for a shell gas station then they put a station 3 times farther then you wanted as the 1 search! You drive past 3 stations to get to their 1 search results! I hope everyone who screwed up the yelp app to make more money instead of being actually a useful app dies of a horrible disease!

title: Tasty Vegan Recipes
description:

title: Chefling: Pantry & Meal Planner. Recipe Keeper
description:
Chefling is your own personal smart Kitchen Assistant with everything you need to improve your life in the kitchen! From recipes by ingredients to meal planning and pantry management, experience Chefling for free now.

üéâ Chefling App Features üéâ

‚≠êÔ∏è  Recipes by ingredients. Tell us what ingredients you have & we‚Äôll give you recipes that are ‚ÄúReady to Cook.‚Äù  Use up all of the food you buy and make fewer trips to the store. 

‚≠êÔ∏è  Diet adjustment. Got a special diet? We have 30+ diet options so you can find cuisines & meal plans based on your preferences! Whether it‚Äôs a healthy lifestyle or allergen-free diet you‚Äôre after, we‚Äôve got you covered with keto, vegan, vegetarian, paleo, low-carb, gluten-free or kosher meal ideas.

‚≠êÔ∏è  200K Recipes. Browse over 185,000 FREE recipes with ease!

‚≠êÔ∏è  Meal planner. Start your stress-free meal planning! We work around your schedule with daily, weekly or monthly meal plans.

‚≠êÔ∏è  Recipe keeper. Save your favorite recipes so you can find the perfect dish at any moment.

‚≠êÔ∏è  Grocery list. Customize your grocery list to make shopping runs easy & stress-free.

‚≠êÔ∏è  Pantry management. Always know what is in your pantry to save money, reduce waste & cook with ease. Create your very own pantry inventory to help you meal plan.

Healthy lifestyle ü•ëü•¶

With Chefling‚Äôs features you can easily meal plan & meal prep. Save healthy recipes, set up your meal plan and start good habits with our reminders. Stay extra organized with pantry checks to avoid unnecessary grocery store trips! 

Smart Shopping üçΩ‚è∞

With us you‚Äôll shop less, waste less & save money. Choose from 1,400+ recipes and automatically turn any missing ingredients into a grocery list. Shop only for the ones you need: no overflowing pantry with untouched items. Easily share your shopping list with the family. 
 
And best yet -- connect Chefling with smart appliances like Alexa or Bosch HomeConnect. Control your smart appliances & even send direct voice commands from within a recipe, so you can go hands-free. 

Organize your pantry: Make it insta-worthy üòé‚ö°Ô∏è

Chefling makes finding new recipes and using up ingredients super easy. It recommends recipes that use what‚Äôs left in your pantry before any goes to waste. Add pantry items using the barcode scanner, so you always know what quantities you have & what you used before. Set grocery expiration dates & track how old items are - say goodbye to sniffing funky food. 
 
Did you know? üí°
 
Chefling now offers Lifestyle, Health, and Allergen-Free diets to choose from. Are you on a keto, vegetarian, vegan, paleo, kosher, pescetarian, or low-carb diet? Looking for alcohol-free, dairy-free, gluten-free or sugar-free recipes? Allergic to peanuts, shellfish, soy, tree nuts, or sesame? We‚Äôve got you covered. 
 
If you love cooking apps like Yummly Recipes, NYT Cooking, Food52 or AllRecipes, you will love the empowering capabilities of Chefling.

recentChanges:
Chefling: Smart Kitchen Assistant | Totally Free
This update includes:

- All-new integration with PantryChic ingredient dispensing and measuring device.
- Enhanced performance and minor bug fixes

Please email us at support@chefling.com with any questions or feedback.
comments: I use this app a lot! Especially with the pandemic going on I want to make sure I'm utilizing everything I have in the kitchen to the fullest extent. Having everything laid out in the pantry section makes it super easy to get cooking inspiration. The shopping list function is also really helpful. The recipe search function is great and makes things very clear. I feel so much more organized in the kitchen now that I'm using this app!

I like it so far. However, there are a few issues. There is no way to know if you have 0 of an item unless you click on it. It would be nice to have a way to mass add anything that has a 0 quantity to the shopping list. Also it does not appear that you can delete or rename categories you created. Can you please add these features?

The meal planning is on point. You can easily add recipes you find online, although they aren't very customizable. Grocery list is great but pantry creates all sorts of duplicates. Great features and easy to use but does need improvement.
So far it's been great, it feels more user friendly than some of the other similar apps I've used. I love the pantry idea, I just have to take the time to actually input it all

I'm still getting used to everything; but overall, I really like the app! I can plan meals that I find within the app or import recipes from online OR enter my own. It keeps a log of what's in your pantry and helps you keep track of what may be expiring and what you will need from the store, (just make sure you check off whether you've made the recipe or not). I haven't used all the features yet, but overall my meal planning has gone to another level.

title: KITCHENPAL: Pantry Manager, Grocery List & Recipes
description:
*Recommended by PRI Radio (US), Food Navigator, Honeycombers, Radio France, Le Mans, 100% Mag and many more.

KitchenPal (iCuisto) is the only pantry manager, grocery list, and recipe ideas app, all rolled into one. You can use one just feature or all; and the app learns and provides suggestions the more you use it, just like a personal assistant.

Save time & money - never forget another product while shopping, and minimise food wastage through automated pantry check and with tasty & healthy recipes based on your ingredients.
And unlike other grocery or recipe apps, you can simply scan your favourite brands or products to add them to your kitchen or shopping list; or to find the best recipes. 

PANTRY MANAGER
- Easily organize your kitchen into pantry, fridge food, freezer items, etc (we even have a wine & bar section)
- Set quantities and food expiry dates: ideal for pantry check and tracking food inventory (for many items, especially fridge food, produce, etc, we detect expiry automatically)
- Receive alerts when your products and ingredients are about to go bad
- Add your favourite brands by simply scanning the item (our database contains millions of products from most major grocers)
- Share and sync the app with family members and easily manage your pantry inventory together
- Easily add your favourite items from the pantry to your shopping list

RECIPES BY INGREDIENT
- Links to the pantry manager and automatically suggests recipes which match your existing food inventory (not available in other recipe apps)
- Easily search recipes by ingredient from millions of tasty recipes and ideas
- Find fridge recipes keeping your health and specific diet in mind (gluten free, lactose free, pork free, vegetarian, vegan, etc)
- Keep fit with light and healthy recipes (with nutritional information for easy tracking in fitness apps)
- Add missing ingredients or your favourite recipes to your grocery list at the touch of a button.
- Upload your own recipes and share your favourite recipes with others

GROCERY LIST
- Create your shopping list for groceries in seconds, including quantities so that you never forget or run out of an item
- Receive automated recommendations based on your pantry inventory [recently finished, running low, frequently bought] and favourite recipes.
- You can even add your favourite brands, especially useful if asking others to do the grocery run for you
- Share your grocery list with friends and family, and mange it together in real-time
- Easily access past shopping list and track your purchases

PERSONALISED SETTINGS
- Fill in your profile details to get personalised nutritional information for recipes
- Set your specific diet preferences and allergies (gluten free, lactose free, pork free, vegetarian, vegan, no shellfish, etc).
- Choose between Metric or Imperial (US) Measurements and set your preferred currency
- An in-built tracker that tracks your achievement and helps you save money and reduce food wastage.

Still wondering if KitchenPal is for you?
- Visual, easy to use interface that our users love
- Easily add items by scanning barcodes, voice input or text input
- Customise your kitchen layout and design (food cupboard, fridge, freezer, bar, household supplies, etc)
- Manage your pantry inventory and track fridge food expiry: reduce waste and save money
- Create a new grocery list in seconds, based on an automated pantry check: no more extra grocery runs
- Manage and Share Shopping List or Kitchen with other family members 
- Easily find tailored healthy and delicious recipes to cook and eat, linked to your food inventory or if you want, search recipes by ingredient
- Save recipes to your Cookbook and even Upload your own

If you have any questions or feedback, please write to us. We started KitchenPal based on the problems we faced while cooking and shopping, and which other grocery and recipe apps didn't seem to address. Our aim is to build an app our users love and absolutely can't live without.

comments: After a while, the barcode scanning functionality (and certain other features) gets hidden behind a paywall. You need to use WiFi to access your shopping list in a grocery store. It doesn't save your sorting method between sessions. If you just want to delete an item, it still gets added to your shopping list and you'll need to delete it there, too.

So far so good, though I'm concerned by the comments about a paywall... I am putting the effort in to load my pantry info and allowing them to use the info, I hope I don't get paywall blocked halfway through...

This app is okay and kind of fun. But I have two pet peeves. So far I haven't figured out a way to add my own categories. For instance, I would like a separate category just for baking. Also it doesn't group things together by item. what I mean is I have four cans of black beans. Because they're all four different brands. They are located in four different places. so instead of saying that I have four cans of black beans, it says I have one of this brand, one of that brand, etc etc.

The closest pantry app 2 what I've designed in my head 2 meet my needs but could not execute since I'm not a programmer. Barcode scanner is best part! I agree w/some other reviews about crashing, grouping items like corn together rather than having each brand listed separately. There are some logistical issues I'd like to see improved & I'll email developers bcz app is useful enough 2 me that I paid $12 for a year of premium & I feel the developers want to keep improving the app, & will. :-)

I'd been looking for the perfect kitchen organizer app for years. Kitchenpal isn't perfect, but it's the closest one I've found and has the most potential. I love the automatically adding low items to my shopping list & the expitation date warnings. You'll spend a couple of hours getting your food scanned into the app, but it is worth the effort. Not everything you scan is in the database, but it's also easier than most apps to add or modify items.

title: Sugar Free recipes for free app offline with photo
description:
People are different. What works for one person may not work for the next. Some people don't want to eat low-carb, others don't feel good doing it or simply don't need it. Also, those who are physically active and do a lot of anaerobic work like sprinting or lifting weights need more carbs in their diet to function optimally. The sugar-free, wheat-free diet is comparable to a paleo diet but combined with full-fat dairy and healthier carb sources. The focus is on quality food ‚Äî choosing good sources of fat, protein and carbs.

Try to explore the variety of offline available Sugar Free recipes. Our experiences inspire home cooking, celebrate the food you make and let you share your successes with friends, family and followers. You can try your hands on the Sugar Free app for free! Easy as that! Cooking doesn‚Äôt have to be complicated and our Sugar Free food offline app can help you to prepare some awesome meals. We are confident that there is something for everyone and are both suitable and tasty enough to be eaten by anyone without food allergies, as part of a normal diet. Perfect mixture of spices and ingredients will help you to create the right magic regarding the dish.

Looking for sugar-free recipes? Sugar Free recipes has more than 300 trusted sugar-free recipes complete with cooking tips.

- Step by step instructions. Recipe book offline free.

title: Daily Blends Recipes
description:
Daily Blends is created by SimpleGreenSmoothies.com, the #1 online resource for green smoothie recipes and creator of the best selling book, Simple Green Smoothies. All recipes are vegan, gluten-free and 100% plant-based awesomeness.


DAILY BLENDS FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Quickly access 200+ vibrant green smoothie recipes that focus on energy, beauty, kid-friendly, detoxing, workouts and desserts. 
‚Ä¢ Filter recipes based on ingredients you have on hand and food aversions or sensitivities
‚Ä¢ Browse through beautiful high-resolution recipe photography
‚Ä¢ Easily search for recipes thanks to ingredient keywords or by recipe title
‚Ä¢ Mark your favorites for easy accessibility
‚Ä¢ Custom shopping list based on your favorite recipes
‚Ä¢ Swap guide within each recipe. Not a fan of bananas? Just swipe right to see what else we recommend!
‚Ä¢ Access to shopping staples like the Dirty Dozen list + our meal prep guide
‚Ä¢ First dibs on new recipes thanks to in-app notification
‚Ä¢ App access to our Simple 7 Experience recipes, 30-day challenges and smoothie guides.

------------------------------------

ABOUT SIMPLE GREEN SMOOTHIES
Jen Hansard is the co-founder who struggled with exhaustion and a serious Starbucks addiction in 2011. She was forced to take matters into her own hands when her family hit hard times - unemployment, WIC and no health insurance. Armed with a daily green smoothie she made in her kitchen, her family boosted their immune system, had more energy and thrived during the most difficult time of their lives.

At Simple Green Smoothies, we believe YOU were meant to do great things. We also know that in order to have the energy and confidence to make this a reality, you have to fuel your body properly. And it starts with a daily green smoothie. Simple Green Smoothies helps by creating and sharing delicious green smoothie recipes + plant-based meal plans to inspire and encourage you along the wellness journey.

We're artists, leaders, hikers, runners, parents, peacemakers, adventure seekers, lovers, dreamers, doers, star gazers, community builders, travelers, entrepreneurs, gardeners, foodies‚Ä¶ united with our commitment to eat + drink more plants and whole foods.

We're over 1 million strong‚Ä¶and we believe that drinking a daily green smoothie kick starts you need to feel your best physically, mentally, socially, and beyond.

We're the rawkstars of Simple Green Smoothies.

summary: Tasty smoothie recipes to lose weight, gain energy and boost immunity.
recentChanges: Updated to allow access to 7-Day Smoothie Challenge.
comments: Easy to use. Lots of great recipes.

I have had the smoothie book for a few years and absolutely love it, so when I saw the app I was super excited. It is a good app and has some great recipes, but I am a little disappointed that not all the recipes from the book are in it.. I had actually expected it would have more that had been created after the book being published. A few of the sections also don't work, such as where you tell it what ingredients you have and it tells you what recipes you can make.

I'm having a few issues with the app. I bought the smoothie bowl recipes and for a while now I can't view them because the app is asking me to purchase it again. When I first got the app, I could view the seasonal challenge recipes which was my favorite part of the app. Now the app is asking me to purchase 20+ recipes for each season before I can see the in app recipes. I don't want to buy the other recipes. I have emailed them about this a few days ago and I haven't gotten a response yet.

It's a beautiful app that doesn't work correctly and is killing my battery. The app crashes with every use and it stays on in the background. No good. I'm having to force a shut down or keep my phone on a charger. I don't suggest purchasing the app until it's repaired. The company should be offering returns at this point.

It has been 30 minutes since I purchased this app, still I cannot even dowload it. It keeps on downloading process. Very dissapointed. I am clicking on refund button at present. Thanks to process the refund.

title: Spanish Recipes: Find Easy To Cook Food Recipes
description:
Spanish recipes app offers you many healthy and tasty recipes. These include dinner recipes, snacks recipes, one pan recipes, tortilla recipes, lunch recipes, rice recipes, recipes for appetizer and recipes for soup.

Festive recipes
We have created the ultimate Spanish recipes collection to celebrate Chinese New year, American super bowl. Enjoy this valentine's day with romantic Spanish recipes.

Popular traditional Spanish recipes of the month
Recipes like mushrooms and broad beans with a poached egg, baked spaghetti, Spanish flan, pipirrana, jamon iberico, ajo blanco, Spanish eggs and potatoes and mushroom & potato soup are popular in January & February.

Simple healthy Spanish recipe instructions with picture
Every traditional Spanish recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many light recipes for free in our Spanish recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Spanish recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite healthy Spanish recipes
Add your favourite traditional Spanish recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved healthy Spanish recipes offline. You can also create traditional Spanish recipe collections on the basis of cuisine, non-vegetarian, Espanol, lunch ideas, Spain food etc.

Healthy Spanish Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for traditional Spanish recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover healthy Spanish recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have traditional Spanish recipes for people following paleo, gluten-free, vegan and keto diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have egg-free recipes, peanut-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, dairy-free recipes and lactose-free. Nutritional information like fat, calories, cholesterol and carbs are available in the Spanish recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be easy and quick with Spanish recipes. Start eating healthy Spanish recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.

We offer lots of traditional Spanish recipes:
Cook tasty healthy Spanish recipes at home using sherry wine, paprika, from sustainable sources & tomatoes. Recipes for classic traditional Spanish dishes like one pot spanish chicken and potatoes, Spanish chicken skillet, broccoli soup, Spanish sofrito recipe and gazpacho are available in the app. Our favourite healthy Spanish recipes include albondigas, grilled chicken, celery soup : low calorie, and Spanish paella with chorizo and seafood.

Our traditional Spanish recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for ajo blanco, dessert, picadillo etc. Now that you've our healthy Spanish recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

title: My Salad Bar - Healthy Food Shop Manager
description:
Healthy eating is the new hot trend!

Cash in on it by opening your own healthy vegetarian restaurant. Prepare delicious low fat dishes with the best organic ingredients and manage your time wisely to cater for all your vegan and vegetarian clients!

VEGGIE HIGHLIGHTS
ü•óRUN a healthy and trendy salad bar and cook the most delicious meals to all your veggie customers through many exciting time management levels!
ü•óSERVE the finest recipes of vegetarian and vegan cuisine. Prepare colorful organic salads and generously filled wraps with the most savoury seasonings and enthrall people with your healthy cooking skills!
ü•óSURPRISE customers with refreshing detox and grapefruit juices and great, low-sugar desserts like the green tea cheesecake and the gluten free apple muffin! Pure, low-fat vegetarian bliss!
ü•óUPGRADE  and CUSTOMIZE your shop with environment-conscious equipment and decorations and make your healthy salad bar the trendiest veggie spot in town!

Delight your first customers with your balanced dishes and efficient service and your restaurant will have vegetarian and vegan crowds lining up for tables in no time! If you can manage your time and cook like a pro, your salad bar will be the go-to place for customers with healthy diet plans!

Exotic guacamole, delicious cream cheese...the best organic ingredients for a balanced nutrition are at your disposal to enchant clients. The more of them you serve, the more money you make and the closer you get to having the most famous vegetarian restaurant in town!

Prove the world that healthy food can be delicious food! Open your trendy salad bar now!

Please note! This game is free to play, but it contains items that can be purchased for real money. Some features and extras mentioned in the description may also have to be purchased for real money.

title: talabat: Food & Grocery Delivery
description:
Looking for the quickest food delivery? That‚Äôs easy with our new talabat appüì±üçîüçü. Whether you want a pizza, burger or groceries, choose from thousands of markets and restaurants in your city and put your hunger to an end. We‚Äôve got it all ‚Äì fast delivery, unlimited options, easy online payment and vouchers all at your fingertips.

Order your favorite food and get it delivered to wherever you are, but also get your groceries delivered to you around Cairo with more cities to come. Your needs, done - simply download our app, choose your food or groceries and pay in a few taps via card or cash upon delivery. 

‚úÖtalabat is the new otlob 
Otlob has turned orange and is now talabat. Browse a multitude of restaurant menus and order from countless stores. With our filters and smart search functions, you can find the exact menu or product you want in no time, available to personalize at your request.

Pay online üí≥ or in cash
Add info to your account on our new talabat app to speed up your order process. Pay in cash or save card details to pay online, reorder your favorites anytime and save addresses so you‚Äôre ready for delivery wherever you are. Like planning ahead? Pick what time you want us to deliver to avoid hunger kicking in.

Track your order from start to finish ‚è≤Ô∏è
That‚Äôs right; follow your delivery from the moment it‚Äôs confirmed to the second we hand it to you. With notifications, you'll always be updated and our help center will answer any questions about your delivery ‚Äì we‚Äôve got you.

Find exclusive deals
Downloading the Talabat app makes you a part of our fam. We‚Äôre more than food delivery; discover vouchers, promotions and deals and treat yourself to that midweek pizza or Friday night burger more often. By opting in for notifications, we'll also share new restaurants, supermarkets and stores in your area, so you‚Äôll never miss out on the latest offers again.

Find us in Kuwait, the United Arab Emirates, Bahrain, Oman, Qatar, Jordan, the Kingdom of Saudi Arabia, and now in Egypt.

Happy ordering.

title: Celiac Disease
description:
Choose This not That for Celiac Disease. This colorful  app provides comprehensive and actionable nutrition guidelines for how to cope with Celiac Disease or gluten sensitivity and avoid its symptoms & complications. If you rather tackle health issues and risks through proper nutrition and lifestyle changes as opposed to prescription drugs and other typical medical treatments, then this app is for you! Last update: Nov. 2019.

Highlights of a number of powerful, unique and interactive features and what makes this app so different and superior to others in the market:

‚Ä¢ Is this food good for me? This feature answers the common question about suitability of various food items for your personal situation. And it does so in an easy to understand and colorful graphic form.

‚Ä¢ Recipes. Most popular recipes on leading web sites.

‚Ä¢ Health issues often come our way in groups of two or more. They are often caused by other health complications or result in other illnesses and risks. This publication is the only one in the market that (in addition to Celiac Disease) offers dietary guidance for the COMBINATION of Celiac Disease and the following most likely health issues: Allergy to milk & dairy products, Anemia, Anxiety, Canker sores, Depression, Diabetes Type-1, Diarrhea, Excess weight, Fatigue, Gas/Flatulence, Lupus, Osteoporosis, and Stress.Also included are comprehensive guidelines on autoimmunity including detoxification, anti-inflammation, leaky gut, Microbiome health and Specific Carb Diet (SCD).

‚Ä¢ Top-5 items to do or eat, and the top-5 things to avoid.

‚Ä¢ Food Suggestions. You can ask for suggestions on the best food choices within a food group, based on your personal profile. An extremely valuable tool when at restaurants or when grocery shopping.

‚Ä¢ ACTIONABLE information on what is good, what is bad, and what is neutral for your condition(s). We single out specific food items, and give you an ordered list of helpful and harmful foods within each food group.

‚Ä¢ Suggestions on appropriate life style choices, alternative therapies and herbal remedies, when such options are promising and available to you.

All the material and suggestions presented in this app are based on the content licensed from Personal Remedies, LLC. The primary sources used by Personal Remedies are US government sources such as USDA (US Department of Agriculture) and NIH (National Institute of Health), and leading clinics & universities.

Personal Remedies is the publisher of the largest collection of health and nutrition apps for chronic conditions in the market. Its patented software & knowledgebase can enable organizations such as healthcare providers to deliver apps for personalized and actionable nutrition guidance to their patients suffering from one or more chronic conditions. Personal Remedies is based in metro-Boston, home to the highest ranking healthcare providers and academic institutions in the world.

‚ÄúProper nutrition and other alternative treatments show great promise in preventing and treating many of the illnesses that we deal with every day. I encourage all my patients to follow appropriate nutrition and research other options for themselves. The Choose This Not That series are an excellent step towards improving people‚Äôs knowledge in this area.‚Äù
Shahin Tabatabaei, MD
Mass General Hospital; Harvard Medical School

‚ÄúThe Choose This Not That series of apps provide dietary recommendations focused on common chronic health problems. They are easy to understand and thus easy to implement into daily life. Most doctors would find it difficult to discuss dietary recommendations at the level of detail found in the series. They should serve as a valuable complement in helping people manage chronic illnesses through dietary and lifestyle modifications.‚Äù
Andrew S. Lenhardt, MD 
Lahey Clinic, Hamilton, MA

title: Japanese food recipes
description:
Japanese recipes app offers you many quick and light recipes. These include cake recipes, noodles recipes, udon recipes, tempura recipes, okonomiyaki recipes, shabu shabu recipes, recipes for ramen and recipes for dessert.

Festive recipes
Get an ultimate Japanese recipes for this Chinese New year, American super bowl, Celebrate this season of romance with tasty valentines day recipes and much more...

Popular traditional japanese recipes of the month
Recipes like pho, pineapple & pork skewers, asian vegetable broth, creamy mushroom soup, chinese hot & sour soup, japanese-style sesame green beans, natto and cucumber subomono are popular in January & February.

Simple japanese slow cooker recipe instructions with picture
Every healthy japanese recipe has easy step by step instructions with a photo. Get many easy recipes for free in our Japanese recipes app. Unlike other recipes app, Japanese recipes can be used offline. This makes our free recipes app for Android a perfect fit for your kitchen.

Collect favourite japanese food recipes
Add your favourite traditional Japanese recipes to the app's favourites section. You can use the saved Japanese slow cooker recipes offline. You can also create healthy Japanese recipe collections on the basis of cooking and prep time, lunch ideas, non-vegetarian, dinner ideas, cooking style etc.

Japanese Food Recipe search
Find recipes by simple search with the name of a recipe or by ingredients used. You can search for traditional Japanese recipes with the ingredients you have. We also have Thanksgiving recipes, Christmas recipes, Halloween recipes and other recipe categories for special occasions.

Convert ingredients to a recipe
Our food recipes app lets you cook with ingredients you have. Cook by ingredients feature lets you search and discover Japanese slow cooker recipes you can cook with ingredients in your kitchen/refrigerator.

Tastes, allergies and diets
We often have healthy Japanese recipes for people following vegan, keto, paleo and gluten-free diets. If you're suffering from any food allergies, we have dairy-free recipes, wheat-free recipes, seafood-free recipes, egg-free recipes and peanut-free. Nutritional information like carbs, cholesterol, fat and calories are available in the Japanese recipes app.

Create Meal plans
Meal planning is going to be healthy and tasty with Japanese recipes. Start eating Japanese food recipes with proper meal planning and grocery shopping.

We offer lots of traditional Japanese recipes:
Cook tasty Japanese slow cooker recipes at home using mushrooms, fish sauce, cornflour & prawns. Recipes for classic healthy Japanese dishes like tempura, teriyaki sauce and marinade, yakiniku, yakitori and grilled chicken are available in the app. Our favourite Japanese food recipes include fish soup, okonomiyaki, tsukemono pickle, and gyoza.

Our traditional Japanese recipe app gives you lots of free cooking recipes for soup, appetizer, mochi etc. Now that you've our Japanese slow cooker recipes app, you no longer need to carry around bulky recipe books.

Start cooking with our free recipes app today.

comments: One of my favorite recipe apps. Even without premium, you can find so many different recipes. I was even able to find a recipe I thought was only passed through my family! Very accurate recipes, and premium is cheaper than the average price of a cup of coffee. Definitely going to continue using it for a while! ‚ù§‚ú®
Before even seeing the main screen, I got 3 ads popping. I get that you need to make money out of your app and it's fine, but I still want to be able to use the app before being bombarded by ads.

I really like this app because not only can you cook tatsy Japanese cuisine but you also can change the language to Japanese and study recipes in Japanese. It's really good practice. Plus it's easy to use.
Pretty nice app for a collection of YouTube videos for the recipes
This has app has helped me to become very knowledgeable about different recipes and ingredients

title: Celiac recipes for healthy eating
description: Unfortunately, in the last few years celiac disease rates have skyrocketed all over the world. In this application we bring you recipes for celiacs, gluten-free dishes, bread without wheat, step by step you will learn recipes and healthy habits for these people. Receive guidance for a daily food without wheat. With natural products suitable for coeliacs that you can cook in your own home. You will find information for a celiac diet with easy to find ingredients with which you will make some menus suitable for the whole family, fried, cookies, bread, pasta. Because there are plenty of dishes without the need to use wheat. Only following a proper diet and eliminating the wheat, with hygiene advice a celiac person will not have complications or intestinal damage. You can eat everything. In addition you will find in these videos quantity of meals of expert chefs. The celiacs will enjoy a delicious gluten-free meal, which even they can cook themselves. We give you a list of wheat-free products for a good diet. With this app, eating without wheat will no longer be an excuse to savor a good dish.

title: My Paleo Cafe - Easy Diet Plan
description:
My Paleo Cafe is a complete weight loss and maintenance solution that does not require counting calories, carbs or fat. All of that is done for you in a brilliantly designed and perfectly executed app. Get started with a FREE trial!

Deciding what to eat on your paleo diet is super easy with My Paleo Cafe. You‚Äôll get complete daily gluten-free menus with breakfast, lunch, dinner, and a snack designed to help you lose and maintain weight, all within the framework of a well-constructed paleo lifestyle. We help you gradually add back healthy gluten-free carbohydrate foods to your diet as you get closer to your goal weight. Maintain that healthy weight with more daily paleo meal plans!

title: Times Food App: Indian Recipe Videos, Cooking Tips
description:
The Times Food Recipes App is your perfect cooking companion! Get access to 10,000+ easy recipes, healthy recipes i.e. Gym diet recipes, keto diet recipes, low-carb diet, etc. recipes in Hindi, step by step recipe videos and food articles from Celeb Chefs and more!

Times Food offers thousands of healthy recipes with an ever-increasing community of celeb chefs, food bloggers & home cooks. Explore recipes based on dietary needs, cuisines and connect with a buzzing community of chefs & foodies.

What we offer: 
Articles & Food Hacks: From the latest food trends, diet essentials & gourmet news, we have thousands of kitchen hacks, tips & suggestions from chefs, bloggers and experts in the shape of interesting articles. Get all the recipes i.e. Indian, Mughlai, Chinese, Continental, Italian, Bengali, Gujarati, Marathi, Malayalam, Regional to International, and many more cuisines.

Videos: Get scores of interesting recipes and food videos featuring hacks, tips & brilliant solutions to your daily kitchen woes. 

Make your own recipe book: Tired of jotting down recipes in bits of paper, old diaries & then not finding them when you want to cook? Here, you can make hassle-free collections and go back to them with the click of a button. Organize your recipe book and share it with friends & family!

Festival collection: Wondering what to cook on festivals, explore Times Food App and find a dedicated collection of recipes for festivals be it Holi, Deepawali, Christmas, Id, etc., we have amazing ideas for you to try at home.

Special dinner & lunch menu: Find ideas for house parties and surprise everyone with your yummy home-made food menu. Times Food presents an interesting party dinner & lunch food ideas and easy homemade recipes that will leave your guests spoilt for choice. 

Recipes basis your dietary needs: We have a huge collection of recipes basis your dietary plan. Be it gluten-free, paleo, low carb, vegan, diabetic diet or any other diet, we have a collection of recipes that suit your nutrition preferences. You can make your own customized diet plan using our active filters. 

Cuisines galore: From regional to international, Times Food has a collection of recipes from varied cuisines & cultures.

Shop your ingredients: Make a list of your recipe ingredients and shop directly through our partners and get your ingredients delivered at your doorstep!

Why Times Food?

Win prizes: Times Food is the most happening food app with numerous quizzes & contests where you can win hundreds of attractive prizes every month.

Become a food blogger: Always wanted to have your own food blog, but didn‚Äôt know how to go about it? Times Food gives you a creative platform where you can make your own profile and upload your recipes & videos. We will promote your recipes on our homepage and social media pages and its free!

Follow celebrity chefs & bloggers: Stay updated on what the celebrity chefs like Nisha Madhulika, Amrita Raichand, Ranveer Brar, Saransh Goila, Manju Malhi, Nita Mehta, Ripudaman Handa, Nisha Madhulika, Shipra Khanna, Rakhee Vaswani, Pankaj Bhadouria and food bloggers are cooking. We have a bright constellation of food connoisseurs as part of our community and you can follow them on Times Food.

Step-by-step Recipes & Videos: Thousands of recipes with step-by-step images and easy methods can turn anyone into a professional cook! 

Quick & smart search: The app has an intelligent search mechanism that can be customized based on your dietary needs, cooking time, ingredients, cuisines and calorie count.

Daily recommendations: Based on season, festivals, a day of the week and even weather, the readers get a daily suggestion on what should be on your menu today. 

REACH US 
If you enjoy using the app, do give us a rating & review!
To share your valuable feedback, ideas & get help, email us on recipes@timesinternet.in 
Privacy Policy: http://recipes.timesofindia.com/privacy-policy-app/articleshow/59560960.cms

title: Sirved - Restaurant Menus
description:
View over 450,000 menus on Sirved ‚Äì Finding your food has never been easier.

Sirved is a restaurant discovery tool that focuses on helping people find restaurant menus. Sirved provides a FREE food menu app that connects people to their ideal restaurant anywhere they go in North America.

Sirved is the best menu app on the market because of its powerful menu-based search engine. Sirved makes it easy to find your food by location, cuisine, craving or restaurant. You can also search by dietary needs which makes our iOS restaurant app unique amongst our competition. Sirved will provide critical restaurant information such as distance, address, contact info, photos and more. Read reviews and browse photos from multiple sources, so you can make an educated decision on where to eat, all in one app.

‚Ä¢ Use the discover tiles to browse restaurants by: Patios, Delivery, Gluten Free, Vegan or Vegetarian, Late Night, Breakfast, Drinks, Walking Distance and more.

‚Ä¢ View search results in 3 unique ways: 1) Our photo driven list view 2) Map view 3) Just the photo itself (no reviews, no logo, no distractions) 

‚Ä¢ Customize your experience with the Profile page. Tell us what foods you like, and we‚Äôll use it to make searching easier.

‚Ä¢ Favourite any restaurant you‚Äôd like to visit in the future by making curated lists that are specific to you. Or search different cities for restaurants to favourite and make lists for future trips.

‚Ä¢ View ratings from multiple sources, so that you can compare and make educated decisions.

All of these features are neatly packed into the perfect menu app for all occasions. Maybe you‚Äôre looking to spice up your dining experience locally. Perhaps you‚Äôre out of town and don‚Äôt know about the local hidden gem restaurants. No matter where you are in North America the options are limitless, so be sure you download the best restaurant app available in the iOS app store.

title: Dog Food Recipes - Homemade Dog Food Recipes
description:
Your dog is a member of the family and you want him to eat just as well and healthily as you do. Don't make the mistake of assuming you can just feed your dog whatever you're eating, though. Dogs have different nutritional needs than people, so you'll need to understand what makes a balanced diet for your pet. Once you understand that nutritional balance, start making and feeding your dog delicious home-cooked meals.

It includes vegetarian, gluten-free and special occasion dog food recipes, BARF diet advice, general dog health and nutritional considerations, including what you should never feed your dog to keep it happy and healthy. 

Check out the recipes for diabetic dogs, dogs with heart conditions, food sensitivities and allergies, and learn how to make tasty dog biscuits, stews, fishcakes, cinnamon apple crisps, dehydrated food, christmas and thanksgiving dog food recipes, and many more recipes your dog will absolutely love. This book will even show you how to make natural shampoo and conditioner for your best pal.

Written by a chef and dog-lover, the "Beg Worthy" recipes in this cookbook will have them beggin' for more!

Every good dog deserves to be spoiled. This book goes out to all the loyal companions out there that give so much but don't expect much in return - only love, and hopefully, some tasty food! - Charlie Fox

Understand the difference between the diet of your dog and a dog in the wild. Yes, wolves or wild dogs can survive in the wild without balanced meals. But, their average lifespan is considerably shorter. They also eat very differently than your dog is used to. While you might feed your dog pure protein, dogs in the wild eat organs like kidney, liver, brain, and the contents of the guts. This makes for a more complex nutrition than simply feeding meat (protein) and rice (carbohydrate) from the store.
If you feed your dog an unbalanced home prepared diet, it can take years for the problems to appear. This is because it's the micro-nutrition (vitamins and minerals) that are probably lacking, instead of the calories.
For example, a dog might do fine for weeks or years, but some time later the dog may get a fractured leg because of long term calcium deficiency in his diet.

*The Healthy Delicious Homemade Dog Food Cookbook has recipes for all dogs

*The Healthy Homemade Dog Food Cookbook

*The Healthy Homemade Dog Food Cookbook has recipes for all dogs - including healthy dogs as well as dogs with various health conditions.

*How to Prepare Home Cooked Food for Your Dog

*The Best Homemade Dog Food Recipes

GUIDELINES TO CREATING BALANCED HOMEMADE DOG FOOD RECIPES

*Ingredients For Dog Food Made At Home

*Home Made Dog Food The Easy Way!

*Home Made Dog Food - The Basics

*What Should and Shouldn‚Äôt Go Into Your Recipe

*How to Make Your Own Dog Food

Why You Should Make Your Own Dog Food
If that story wasn‚Äôt enough for you, there are many other reasons to ditch the bag and make your own dog food.

Homemade Dog Food Recipes
I know that was a lot of information and you‚Äôre probably overwhelmed. But really all you need to do is pick a diet plan and then choose a recipe that you like from the list we‚Äôve compiled.

Many of these meals can fit into multiple categories (like a grain free puppy food that can be made in a crockpot) so be sure to scan through them all.

If you like this Application please consider leaving a positive review and/or rating for it in the store. 

Do not hesitate to make your comment, suggestion, advice and so on via kzapps88@gmail.com

descriptionHTML:
Order a famous made-from-scratch Casey‚Äôs pizza, for carryout or delivery, with the all-new Casey's app. Browse our menu, see the best deals, customize your pizza, and place an order fast! And when it's time to order again on Friday, you can reorder your favorites with just a few taps.

Download the Casey's app today ‚Äì and create an account to join Casey‚Äôs Rewards ‚Äì so you can earn points, save your favorite order, set a default credit card, and search for nearby gas prices.
summary: Order pizza and earn points
recentChanges: This Casey‚Äôs app update is all about our 3 million Casey‚Äôs Rewards members! Quickly see how many points you‚Äôve earned for each transaction with the new Points History screen. You‚Äôll also be able to browse your offers with an all-new category sorting feature, making it even easier to find the offers you‚Äôre looking for. Enjoy!
comments: I like the food ordering options but other functions are pretty clunky. As far as rewards and needing to save them, why not just have it tied to your phone # instead of having to electronically 'clip it'? I'm turning off push messages too........way too many of them. I get it, you're selling pizza but not everyday is pizza day. Loll

I like Casey for convenience and has a good variety of what they carry including gas. Their employees are always very courteous and friendly. I do wish their new app that they want you to update but I do not have enough space to do this on my phone. I think we should still receive our points until we can get our phone corrected. Our Cellphone Company is having problems getting their help to the customer so I am stuck. The store itself is great in El Paso and we go to alot of Caseys because we dr
Easy to place my order, see daily deals and save deals and view my points so I can choose to use them or to wait until I accumulate more points.

Seems mostly okay, but has one bizarre flaw - I arrived well before the scheduled time, tapped the "I'm Here" button, and instead of acknowledging that information and maybe reminding me of the promised completion time, I got a baffling message instructing me to try again closer to the promised completion time. It is impossible to even fathom the motivation behind that insane response, so I must assume it is a software glitch or a practical joke.

When I first downloaded and used the app several months ago it owrked fine. Now I cant log in or order anything. I have uninstalled the app and reinstalled to no avail. It appears that other users are having the same problem. For now I have stopped using the app or trying to order pizza. Your loss.

title: mobiCeliac [XL]
description:
WARNING: This app ONLY includes gluten-free info for SPAIN.
--------
Are you going gluten-free and visiting or spending some holidays in SPAIN? Then this app may help you.

mobiCeliac [XL] is an app for your device that allows you to get gluten-free food info for SPAIN:
- Use your device camera as a reader of barcode labels (EAN13, UPC, etc) found in packaging of food & drink products and drugs/medicines you can find in SPAIN.
  This app checks automatically whether or not it is included in the Food and Drink Directory and in the Medicines Directory of gluten-free products in SPAIN.
- Learn to recognize all Food Categories and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Learn to spot all product Ingredients and identify the gluten risk or gluten content level
- Gluten-free Food Directory (food and drink products) including 3 different search methods: by name (brand, manufacturer or product name), by scanning the barcode or by using your voice
- Coeliac-friendly Venues Guide (shops, groceries, restaurants and hotels) including location in a map

mobiCeliac is the only gluten-free target app for Spain appearing in the "European Directory of Health Apps" promoted by the European Commission (http://www.mobiceliac.com/2013/directorio-europeo-de-aplicaciones-medicas/)

After installing the app, you will need to:
- Purchase a subscription fo data updates that includes a 7 day free trial period to access the full database
  Just select the main option "Settings"  > "License Management" and get your subscription
- Download the database
  Select the main option "Data Update", tap the "Download" button and wait until the data download finishes successfully.
Now you can access more than 20,000+ gluten-free food & drink barcodes and all medicine barcodes that are distributed or sold in SPAIN and more than 2,000+ venues (shops, groceries, restaurants and hotels)

This app is targeted to help people suffering from Coeliac Disease (CD) or other gluten-sensitivity diseases.
The Info Guides are compatible with other Spanish Societies gluten-free products list (ACySG, SMAP and FACE)

title: Dough and pizza recipes
description:
Pizza recipes are one of the most delicious meal for all of us, it was originally created in Italy, but nowadays it could be find almost everywhere. It is one of the most famous meal of the Italian cuisine. Pizza recipes are easy to prepare, you just need an oven and some tasty ingredients. Thanks to this application you could cook over 40 meals really straightforward. It is not junk food any more, with this homemade recipes you could enjoy preparing healthy and tasty meals. Enjoy this recipe app and taste all the Italian cuisine recipes! 

In this recipe application you will find over 40 pizza recipes, it includes step by step explanations and high definition images to let you cook really easily. You can save your best recipes in a favorites list or filter depending on the category: Classic meals, Special recipes, Diet, Doughs, Sweet... It is not just a classic recipe App, it includes awesome choices that you would never imagine!

What could you find in this application?
‚òÖ Browse through more than 40 pizza recipes.
‚òÖ Italian food Recipe book.
‚òÖ Create your own list of favorite recipes.
‚òÖ Recipes classified into categories to facilitate the search for main ingredients.
‚òÖ Share recipes with family and friends!
‚òÖ Tagg ingredients during the preparation of the recipes.

title: Diabetic Recipes app
description:
Get tasty and healthy diabetic recipes, with step by step recipe instructions, recipe videos, nutritional information and more. 

Start cooking these diabetic recipes for free, with Cookbook's Diabetic recipes app. Your search for healthy and easy diabetic recipes ends today. Learn to cook tasty diabetic meals from recipe collections of the finest diabetic recipes in the world. You can download diabetic recipes to create an offline collection of healthy diabetic recipes. Diabetic diet means that the diet eliminates the sugar content and reduces the load on your pancreas. 

For people affected by diabetes, this helps to cope with the low insulin content produced by the pancreas. Get your diabetes under control by eating healthy diabetic-friendly meals with our diabetic recipes app. 

The diabetes diet contains healthy carbohydrates, fibre-rich food, fish and good fats.

 We designed the diabetic recipes app with features like:- 

1. Choose your favourite recipes from diabetic recipe collections. 
2. Daily recipe planner for diabetics. 
3. Diabetic Recipes for free 
4. Make a shopping list for diabetic-friendly grocery shopping. 
5. Send the diabetic recipe shopping list to your partner. 
6. Send diabetic recipes to friends. 
7. Get diabetic recipes offline without internet. (No internet required) 
8. Diabetic recipe finder by ingredients. 
9. Diabetic recipe search by ingredients, occasions, dietary preferences, cooking difficulty etc. 
10. Get popular diabetic-friendly food recipes from around the world.

 Diabetic recipe categories:-
> Diabetic breakfast recipes
> Diabetic lunch recipes
> Diabetic dinner recipes
> Diabetic snack recipes
> Diabetic side dish recipes
> Diabetic dessert recipes
> Diabetic condiment recipes
> Diabetic smoothie recipes

 Our diabetes recipes app focuses on:- 
+ Healthy carbs like fruits, vegetables, whole grains, legumes (beans/peas) and low-fat dairy (milk/cheese). 
+ Fibre-rich food moderates digestion and helps in controlling blood sugar. 
+ Good fats like avocado, nuts, canola oil, olive oil and peanut oil.

A lot of people with diabetes ask us -
1. How can I control my sugar?
2. Can I keep my sugar levels in check with intermittent fasting?
3. Does maintaining a diabetes logbook help me reduce my sugar levels?

We designed the diabetic diet app to help answer various problems faced by diabetes patients. The diabetic diet app's carb counter helps to measure the carb/glucose intake. The diabetic recipes ensure that glucose levels are maintained within normal levels. By reducing glucose levels by carb counting, healthy diet & intermittent fasting you can control your hba1c.

Download this free diabetic recipes app today and get started on your diabetics journey. Enjoy the best diabetic recipes app

recentChanges: Diabetic free dinner and cakes added.
comments: Only taken a look and saved some favourites but looks pretty good so far. Had a look at a few diabetic apps but this looks most usefully laid out with extra benefits so dont mind the subscription fee. Would be better if your free trial was longer, say 14-28 days to give us a chance to use the app in practice. That might also appease some of the bad reviewers

I just opened the app. So far so good. There are alot of different recipes broken into nutrition, carbs in the food. Waiting for more updates and quick recipes. As a newbie to the diabetic world. This app is great and quick.

Would get more stars if it didn't keep sending me messages to buy premium at reduced rates. I already have premium! Also now sends notifications for recipe groups which when you click on them say nothing found. Has happened multiple times since last update. Sort it out

Wonderful app for diabetic recipes! This app helped my friend who was going through gestational diabetes. Cooking delicious recipes without compromising on taste was easy with diabetic recipes app by her side. Satisfied taste cravings and healthy too..Thank you!

Awesome app!!! I found this app easy to use and healthy. Snacks are healthy and easy to cook. The recipes are tasty and sugar free diabetic diet recipes. This will help me to manage my diabetes for the long run.

title: TheFork - Restaurants booking and special offers
description:
10‚Ç¨ discount on your next meal!
Make a 1st booking on the app with the code APP19 and receive 1000 Yums. These can be converted into a 10‚Ç¨ discount on your next meal*.

Book your next table with the app, FREE & SIMPLE 
No need to call the restaurant to get a table, you can book online and you will even receive a confirmation by mail & SMS.

Enjoy exclusive offers up to 50% off your meal 
A lot of restaurants have special offers up to 50% off your meal. No surprise, the offer is directly applied on the bill.

Find the best restaurants around you 
Brunch, pizza, romantic setting, with friends, etc. choose your table among 55 000 restaurants thanks to detailed information on the restaurant (photos, menus, price, reviews).

You are traveling around? Don't worry, you can find our service in most European big cities like Madrid, Geneva, Barcelona, Roma, Brussels, Stockholm or Copenhagen. You can also find the best restaurant around you by enabling your geolocation!
 
Let us guide you with our 4 million of reviews 
Rely on a foodie community with more than 11 million reviews and 40 000 food pictures to make up your mind. 
On TheFork, you are the guide! Only the clients who went to the restaurant can leave a review and post food pictures.

Your fidelity rewarded! 
Win Yums at each booking.
1 booking = 150 Yums
1000 Yums = 10‚Ç¨ discount at a partner restaurant!
2000 Yums = 25‚Ç¨!

Please continue to send us your comments and remarks to contact@lafourchette.com

*Exclusive and personal offer valid after entering the code APP19 at the moment of the booking. This code is valid only for the person who never made a booking through the app (Android). The code APP19 is valid once and only on the app TheFork (Android). 7 days after the meal date, 1000 Yums will be credited in your personal fidelity space. These 1000 Yums can then be converted into a 10‚Ç¨ discount in a partnered restaurant.
